147a7(rgyud): rtsir son pa'o// slar yang grwa bzhi po rnams su// ji lta'i rim pas dgod bya ba// rnal 'byor ye shes de kho na// thar pa'i rgya mtsho g.yon skor du'o// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro//
147b1(rgyud): reg dang chos dang yid dang sems// kun kyang rgya mtshor shes bya ste// g.yon dang g.yas kyis dgod par bya// sa dang nam mkha' lce dang ni// rna ba thams cad rgya mtsho ste// ye shes zhes
147b2(rgyud): bya'i rgya mtsho dag/ sngon gyi rim pas dgod par bya// sgo skyong ma yi lha mo che// g.yon bskor du ni dgod bya ba// glang po rgya mtsho rta rgya mtsho// seng ge rgya mtsho ma he rgya mtsho'o// grwa la gnas pa'i lha
147b3(rgyud): mo ni/ sgyu ma rgya mtsho rmi lam rgya mtsho ma// gsang snang rgya mtsho snang ba'i rgya mtsho ma// kha dog 'khor lo gzhan gyi bzhin// byang chub chung ngu bdag nyid che'i// dkyil 'khor de yis shes par
147b4(rgyud): dur khrod brgyad kyi rim pas ni// sgrub thabs rim pas bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs kyi zhal nas ni// pad+ma'i yu ba nges par 'thon// kha dog dkar po 'bar chen po// pad+ma 'dab ma
147b5(rgyud): stong phrag can// de yi dbus su bsgom bya ba// mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho bde mchog ste// phyag stong pa ni rnam par sgom// zhal ni sum cu rtsa bdun no// zhabs bco brgyad kyis gar du mdzad// spyan gsum
147b6(rgyud): pa la sna tshogs mdog/ ral pa'i cod pan can gyi gzugs// sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed can// rgyab tu dbang phyug chen po 'dzin// lhag mar dpa' bo dpa' dbang mo// bcu gnyis bdag nyid can 'khor lor/
147b7(rgyud): ji ltar bdag gis sngon bshad pa'o// shes rab phyag g.yon du bshad de// g.yas par rgyan du thabs yin no// khyab 'jug drag po de bzhin tshangs// gshin rje dang ni log 'dren dang // bden bral
148a1(rgyud): dang ni thags zangs ris// dbang po tshogs bdag kar+Ni ka/ sgra gcan zla ba nyi ma dang // bla ma skyob pa bla de bzhin// nor rgyas dang ni skyes bu me// myos pa zhabs kyis gnon pa ste/
148a2(rgyud): rang rang khyim thabs yang dag ldan// mdog dang mtshon cha yang bya'o// phag mo yis ni 'khyud pa ste// de'i gzugs can nam phyag gnyis skyes// sna tshogs gzugs 'dzin rab myur ma// slar yang //
148a3(rgyud): rang 'dra'i gzugs can ma'o// 'dab ma stong du bsgom bya ba// rang bzhin rnal 'byor ma kun te// bcom ldan kha dog gang 'dra ba// de 'drar de rnams mtshon par bya// thung ngu ring po yon tan 'phal
148a4(rgyud): a yig la sogs sde brgyad de// phyi mo bcu gnyis kyis phye ba// stong phrag rnal 'byor ma'i yang ngo // ka rdo rje sogs shes bya ste// khams kyi rkyen gyi yid kyis so// 'khor lo drug bdag rnal

148a7(rgyud): med bdag/ thams cad sdom pa'i sgrub thabs su// ji lta'i rnal 'byor gzhan bya'o// de ltar byed bzhin pa nyid kyis// phyag rgya'i dngos grub skye bar 'gyur// gzhung thams cad ni blta bar bya// gzhan
148b1(rgyud): pa'i rnal 'byor dmigs mi bya// dam tshig gi ni spyod pa tsam// sdom pa chung ngur rab tu bshad// thams cad sog ma bzhin dor la// thams cad sdom pa gzung bar gyis// mche ba rnam gtsigs rab sbyor/
148b2(rgyud): bas gzhu 'gengs rim pas 'ong bar gyis// de yi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yang // sngon gyi sbyor bas bsgom par bya// 'og dang steng nyid mche ba gnyis// bde mchog mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho dag/ rang
148b3(rgyud): ming brjod pa'i gsang sngags la// hUM phaT yi ge mthar sbyar gyis// yang dag ting 'dzin rdo rje yi// gsang sngags thams cad la bya'o// thams cad rgyan ni rab bshad pa'ang // sngags rig pa
148b4(rgyud): sngon bzhin no// bdag gi bdag pos rgyud 'di ni// gsungs pas yang dag dga' bar 'gyur// nyid dang lhan cig bya ba byas// phyag rgya 'og ste ji ltar lags// khyod kyis 'og dang steng phyag rgya// rab bshad
148b5(rgyud): bya yi lha mo nyon// mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho shes rab che// thabs ni sdom pa rgya mtsho'o// 'og dang steng du snyoms 'jug pas// de ni phyag rgyar mngon brjod 'gyur// zhal las nges par 'thon yu ba// ngag gis
148b6(rgyud): bsgom pa'i bdag nyid do// de ni mkha' 'gro spyod de yang // rnam par shes dang thams cad 'ong // zhu ba'i gzugs ni snying ka ru// 'od kyis thams cad sdom par gyis// de ni theg pa cher sdom pa/
148b7(rgyud): bdag nyid chen po ye shes gzugs// de ltar gnyis su byar med gzugs// de ni phyag rgyar mngon par brjod// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje
149a1(rgyud): mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho che// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'o// de nas lha mos mchod byas nas// phyag byas nas/
149a2(rgyud): ni 'di skad gsol// sems can rnams kyi sdom 'byung ba// bcom ldan bdag po nyid kyis gsungs// lha dgra yi ni rab sbyor bas// rab bshad bya yis lha mo nyon// byang chub sems kyi cha can gyi//
149a3(rgyud): bde ba 'ong ba'i gang zhig rtsa// sdom pa sems can smin byed pa'i// rnal 'byor der ni rnam par spro// 'dod chags chags bral rnam 'dres pa// sdom pa skye 'gro'i gzugs can no// gang phyir de nyid kyis
149a4(rgyud): sdom pa// sngon gyi spyod pas sdom pa'o// baM yi nam mkha' nam mkhar te// sku gsum rnams kyi yang dag bzhugs// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa// 'thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// gang tshe/
149a5(rgyud): sems ni 'gro bzhin pa// gzugs kyi dbus su bim par gyis// rang rig bdag nyid byang chub ldan// lhan cig skyes pa'i sku thob 'gyur// ting 'dzin skad cig rig med pa// gang gi srid gsum la thim
149a6(rgyud): gyis 'de ni 'byung bar shes bya ste// lus can gzhan rnams kyi sdom min// rnal 'byor rnams kyi gsang sdom pa// de ltar de nyid nges shes bya// nang gi bdag nyid nyin zhag gi'ang // de yis sdom par
149a7(rgyud): bshad par 'gyur// mtshan nyin thams cad yongs ldan pa'i// A li kA li sogs sde tshan// dang po'i yi ge'i cha la sogs// gang du ming ni nges par mthong // rigs ni de ru shes bya ste// ang ka'
149b1(rgyud): sems can yang dag ldan// mtha' yas la sogs kyu gang dang // nyi ma la sogs gapa' de bzhin// mkha' 'gro ma'i ming thog byas nas// ma mo de rnams su rab grags// lha rnams kun gyi bskyed pa dang /
149b2(rgyud): sngags rnams kyi dang rgyud nyid kyi yang ngo // 'jig rten kun gyi ma yin te// de yis mal yang dag brten// rtsa ni dgu po 'gog pa las// srog rgya rnams su shes par bya// a A ka tsaT ta ba dang // ma
149b3(rgyud): sha'i sde tshan yi ge dgu// i I kha tsha Sha tha pa dang // ra Sha gnyis par brjod pa'o// u A ga dza Da da ba dang // las sde tshan gsum pa 'o// e ai g+ha dz+ha D+ha d+ha b+ha dang // wa ha sde tshan bzhi pa'o// oM au aM a
149b4(rgyud): nga ha Na dang // na ma de ltar dgu'i bdag nyid// bzhi po yongs su grags pa ste// nyi can lnga rnams kyis de bzhin// de ltar 'jig rten kun gyi de// bsdus pa dang ni 'byin par gnas// sgyu chen bcu gnyis de
149b5(rgyud): rnams kyis// sa bon gzugs kyis tshogs dran bya// de rnams rA sir yang dag grags// rgyu skar kun dang yang dag ldan// zla ba dang ni nyi ma'i ches// 'og dang steng gi kha de bzhin// brtan pa dang /
149b6(rgyud): ni g.yo ba gnyis// rgyu skar dang ni rA sir bshad// srog zung du ni de bzhin gshegs// ring dang thung ngu rgyal dang pham// steng du de yi rgyal bar bshad// 'og tu 'chi ba mnyam mi mnyam// nyi ma'i rgyu bar so//
149b7(rgyud): pa kun// rgyu skar rA si gza' de bzhin// rA si rnam gsum spyod gang phyir// nyi mar gnas par 'char bar 'gyur// srog 'char ba dang yang dag ldan// rA si kun gyis shes par bya// karka Ta seng bu mo/
150a1(rgyud): dang / bum pa ris drug yang dag ldan// 'char ba 'gyur dang shar ba yang // ji lta'i rim dag gza' kun gyis// bri sh+tsi ka dang rta nyid dang // ri dgas bum par yang dag
150a2(rgyud): ldan cha shas lnga yi tshad kyis ni// gza' shar ba yis 'char bar 'gyur// ri bong lug de bzhin nyid dang // skar da ru ni song de bzhin// cha shas kyang ni bzhi pa nyid// 'char ba 'ong bar 'char
150a3(rgyud): bar 'gyur// zhag gi 'char ba ma lus pa'ang // 'bras bu'i ming dang yang dag ldan// nag mo sogs nas 'jib ma'i mthar// yongs su rim pas nyi shu bzhi// gang dang 'dra ba'i ming de 'dra'i//
150a4(rgyud): de rnams 'bras bur shes par bya// nyis 'gyur longs spyod bris pa dang // dbang po rnams kyis cha dang ldan// thob par rtag tu shes bya ste// bdag gi rtag tu zhag lha mo// bdag nyid kyis ni dgos
150a5(rgyud): kun dang // gzhan rnams la yang de ltar sbyar// de phyir phyi dang nang rnams su// dge dang mi dge'i las shes bya// sdom pa 'byung ba'i dus su ni// rnam rtog med pas mtshon par bya// gza' gang
150a6(rgyud): de rnams dbyangs shes bya// dbyangs gang de rnams rA si'o// dbyangs dang rA si de bzhin skar// rang gi gzugs rnams kyang blta'o// dngos grub 'bras bu ster ba po// yang dag sbyor dang bral na
150a7(rgyud): med pa g.yo ba'i 'char bas g.yo ba'i las// nges par brtan pas g.yo med 'gyur// 'dren ma yis ni 'dren mar 'gyur// sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyis// lha rnams grol ba'i
150b1(rgyud): rgyu nyid pas// lha yi dgra ni bsgom par bya// sum cu bdun bdag nyid 'khor lo// rnal 'byor dngos grub byed pa'i gtso// kha dog dang ni mtshan nyid dbyibs// las rjes 'brangs pas bsgom
150b2(rgyud): par bya// lha 'am lha min sbyin byed kyi// dgra ni 'khor lo sdom pa'o// dpa' bo thams cad snyoms 'jug pas// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro lha yi dgra// bcom ldan 'das
150b3(rgyud): kyis 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa lnga pa'o// de nas rnal 'byor ma thams cad// 'dus par byas nas 'dri ba ni// lha dang sbyin byed sems can gyi// sdug bsngal
150b4(rgyud): snyir po ji ltar lags// gal te kun rang bzhin ston pa// dge dang mi dge de 'dri ba// de nas bcom lha la sogs// sems can kun ster po ci lags// 'di la bdag ni the tsom mchis// gtsom
150b5(rgyud): gsal bar mdzod cig kye// phag mo la sogs mang po yi// lha mo sgyu ma chen mo nyon// rang rang las kyi rjes 'brangs pas// lha dang sbyin byed sems can gyi// bdag gi rang bzhin du ni med//
150b6(rgyud): byang chub chen por zhu las yod// rang gi rang bzhin yon tan nyid// bdag gi las kyi yang dag 'byung // de phyir dge dang mi dge blta// sna tshogs kun rtog 'thob par byed// de yis lha dang sbyin byed//
150b7(rgyud): rnams// gza' dang rA si rgyu skar can// rang gi las 'bras la za ba// ster ro gzhan du ci yang med// ston pa ji ltar grol bar 'gyur// glu 'di yis ni dgyes par byed// a mi tA b+ho dza na~M tA/
151a1(rgyud): sa mA d+hA mA gA mA ga mA d+hA nya/ ma pAtarI b+hU mU nya ri ga mA sA nya mA rI gi ma b+hu ya te/ sa rI re sa ri re sa ri re sa rI rI swA nI sA nya shru ta ni sa mA nya sa nI/ shI ri b+ha ga mA d+ha rmA sA nya pA yA/
151a2(rgyud): pA bA ma da mi te/ 'od dpag med kyi rab sbyor bas// 'di 'dra'i grol ba bsgrub par bya// a pa d+hU ti'i yang dbus su// rnam shes 'gro ba la mtshon bya// srog la sogs pa'i rlung thams cad/
151a3(rgyud): rnam 'gyur byas pa'i bar thim bya// rnam par shes pa 'dres gyur pa'ang // khams thams cad kyi bcud len te// 'thungs pas dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// dbang po rnams bgrod mtshan nyid las/
151a4(rgyud): rkan gyi phyogs su gnas pa'i lce// a ba d+hU tIr de rab bshad// cha shas can gyi tha ma yi// bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni 'dzag par 'gyur// rtsa thams cad du bkang ba ste// yang dag rig pa'i gzugs su thim/
151a5(rgyud): mdor bsdus pas ni khams lnga ste// gzhan gyi dngos po 'dir ma brjod// dbang chen la ni me yis sreg/ chu yi dbus su rab tu thim// myur du zhu nas dro bar 'gyur// rlung ni nam mkha' la gnas so//
151a6(rgyud): chu yi tshogs ni bskams byas pas// de nyid du ni thim nas 'gro// sems ni stong nyid la son bya// stong nyid nam mkha'i khams la'o// nam mkha' ye shes la 'jug bya// ye shes sgyu ma'i rang
151a7(rgyud): mtshan nyid// mkhas pas ye shes shes bya'i bdag/ de ltar 'od dpag med par sgom// rtsibs brgyad legs par brgyan pa yi// shes bya'i 'khor lo 'di bsgom bya// bu me da bri pa mi u ku/
151b1(rgyud): d+ha si me ro ma ka 'drer// rlung du tu kA bi mi dbang ldan du// rA si'i 'khor lo rim ji bzhin// de bzhin 'di la 'di rnams dgod// a i u e o a aHsa bon rnams// bkra shis la sogs
151b2(rgyud): gza' lda ni// shar la sogs par dgod par bya// ring po de nyid du dgod bya// aM aHnyi ma blar shes bya// nyi ma zla ba 'di grol ba// ku li re la nyi ma ze// gza' lhag gdong lnga pa 'dir gnas// mthar
151b3(rgyud): ni gang zhig lhag ma yi// so so'i tshogs za bar 'gyur// rA si rnams kyis brgyan pa yi// 'gro kun la phan 'khor lo de// de ltar do la'i 'khor lor 'gyur// rgyu skar rA si dus dang zhag/ lug
151b4(rgyud): rnams ro hi ta sogs dang // zla ba dang ni nyi ma rnams// 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid mtshon pa ni// mdor bsdus pa yis bshad par bya// rgyu skar dus tshod yang dag ldan// gza' dang nad ni de bzhin te//
151b5(rgyud): do lA rA si'i tshad kyis ni// skye ba'i las su brjod pa yin// kArti ka dang bzang po'i tshe// mig dmar de bzhin smin drug ste// de la 'chi bar shes par bya// gal te rnal 'byor med na'o// mar ga shAr
151b6(rgyud): Shi mgo dang ni// gza' lhag nyi ma la smyo ba// mgul pa'i nad kyis nyin bzhin// khyu mchog la ni rtag tu 'chi// rgyal dang mri ga'i rgyu skar dang // gza' lhag 'khrig pa la 'chi'o// ku li ra mchu'i
151b7(rgyud): tshes brgyad kyi// tho rangs pa sangs la 'chi'o// gre dang ma yi rgyu skar dang // tshes bcu spen pa seng ge la// nub mo 'chi bar shes bya ste// gal te brgya byin mnyam gyur kyang ngo // bu mo gnyis mar gul
152a1(rgyud): mas 'chi// sa gdang ni bcu bzhi dang // gzhu dang phur bu'i ri mo dang // gal te sangs rgyas mnyam gyur pa// srang la 'chi bar shes par bya// sngon dang bcu gcig nag pa dag/
152a2(rgyud): phur bu sdig pa la 'chi'o// chu stod chu smad tshes dgu dang // gro bzhin gzhu dang pa sangs 'chi// gro bzhin tshes bdun zla ba dang // zla ba rgyal dang chu srin la nor med// khrums stod khrums smad
152a3(rgyud): bcu gsum pa// zla ba mon gri bum pas mdzad// tha skar brgyad pa nam gru dang // spen pa dang ni nyi la 'chi// sems can kun gyi skye ba'i rtsis// dus smra bas ni shes par bya// sa bon gcig las
152a4(rgyud): skyes yon tan// gnyis pa skye ba'i dus kyis so// rigs gnyis su ni shes byas nas// de'i dus skye rtsis brtsam par bya// sngon las rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// mkhas pas de'i rigs su skye
152a5(rgyud): 'o de yi 'bras bu shes bya ste// mtshan nyid kyis ni rjes su gnas// rA si sogs 'khor 'brel ba de// rnam shes kun gyi mtshan nyid do// 'od dpag med kyi rab sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor
152a6(rgyud): gsal bar bsgom par bya// dbus su 'od dpag med mgon po// lhag mar mkha' 'gro ma sogs so// de ni rnam shes skye gsal bar// las kyi 'bras bur de dran bya// thams cad bde ba kun
152a7(rgyud): sbyor las// de tshe gnyis med la brten pa'i// 'od dpag med kyi sbyor ldan pa// bcom ldan ston pas 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa drug pa'o// // rdo rje 'od
152b1(rgyud): kyi rab sbyor bas// ye shes de kho nyid bshad bya// lha mos slar yang mchod byas nas// de kho na nyid ye shes zhus// sems can rnams kyi rnam nges pas// 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid gang 'drug
152b2(rgyud): de 'dra bdag gis bshad bya yis// rtse gcig pa yi yid kyis nyon// lus la rtsa rnams mtshan ma ni// de rnams ji ltar gsal bar dbye// rtsa chen sum cu rtsa gnyis te// de rnams kyis ni gtso
152b3(rgyud): bo mchod// bcu gnyis de bzhin du lha mo// dbyangs rnams bgrod pa'i mtshan nyid de// dkar po nag po'i phyogs kyis ni// nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru ni brjod// der ni snying po dgu po mchog/ lus kyi mtshan
152b4(rgyud): ma'i mtshan nyid do// gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni// 'chi ba'i dus lta bur gnas so// dbugs ni rnam par spos tsam gyis// lus can 'pho ba drug gnyis na// snga dr-i ra hi ti yi char// de mi
152b5(rgyud): rtags ni mtshon par bya// sna dang mig gi phyogs dang ni// 'gram pa dang ni rna ba'i rtsar// lce dang mche ba'i mtshams dang ni// mgrin pa rtsib logs de bzhin du// snying gi gur dang lte ba dang // brla dang /
152b6(rgyud): byin pa de bzhin gzhan// mdoms dang ling ga dag de bzhin// mgo bo dang ni spyi bo'i phyogs// mtshams ni de rnams thams cad du// dbugs ni 'chad cing 'chad pa'o// lus kyi mtshan ma dgu
152b7(rgyud): rnams te// 'chi ba'i dus ni bstan pa yin// nyi ma'i tshad kyi grangs rnams ni// 'khor lo dus bdag nyid can dga'// gang tshe nyi ma drug rnams zhon// gcig brjod pa ni brgyan pa yin/
153a1(rgyud): der ni lo gsum 'gyur can te// sum cu drug cu rnams de bzhin// cha shas de ltar gyi ni tshad// mdor bsdus pa yis bshad par bya// nyi ma bdun ni yongs thob nas/
153a2(rgyud): gang tshe rlung ni 'bab pa na// lo gnyis yang dag brjod pa dang // dus kyi grangs can zla ba dang // nyi ma rnams ni bcwo brgyad kyi// gang zhig tshad du yang dag brjod// zhag brgyad rnams su yongs gtong
153a3(rgyud): bas 'a rlung ni gang tshe 'bab pa na// lo gnyis su ni yongs bshad par// de yi 'tsho ba yi ni grangs// nges par de'i tshe 'chi ba ni// de yi zla ba rig byed grangs// nyi ma nyi shu rtsa bzhir bshad// 'tsho ba yi
153a4(rgyud): ni dus grangs so// lha mo nyi ma dgur 'bab na// lo gnyis su ni de 'tsho ste// zla gnyis nyi ma nyi ma yi// tshad ni sbyor ba'i lus can no// lha mo nyi ma bcu rnams kyis// lo gnyis su ni de 'tsho'o// nyi ma
153a5(rgyud): bcu gcig de bzhin du// gang tshe rtsa ni rab 'jug na// lo gcig gi ni lam bcas pas// zla ba yang ni dgu'i grangs kyis// nyi ma bco brgyad rab tu bshad// the tsom med par bshad pa'o// zhag ni bcu gnyis
153a6(rgyud): rab 'bab pas// lo gcig tu ni rab tu grags// zla ba yang ni lo'i grangs can// nyi ma rnams ni dus kyis mdzes// bcu gsum du ni gang tshe rtsa// g.yas su bgrod par 'bab pa na// lor ni yang dag bshad/
153a7(rgyud): bste zla ba yang ni rig byed grangs// nyi ma rnams ni dgu'i grangs na// 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid bshad pa'o// lha mo gang tshe bdun gnyis su// rtag tu rlung ni 'bab pa na// lo ni tshe ru yang dag bshad// bla ba'i
153b1(rgyud): ni sang dag zags rnams ni bcu gnyis so/ de sa 'a ba tsha lanam/ nga che co lnga ma rlung bzhin ba das 'ashA shes bya ba ga gan ga byed
153b2(rgyud): ma mchog ni phan pa yi// gang che brgyad gnyis su 'bab ma// 'tsho ba zla ba bcu dang ni// nyi ma rnams ni mchog grangs kyi// nyi shu rtsa bzhi nyin rnams kyi// tshang du bdag gis bshad pa'o// nyim rnam sa
153b3(rgyud): bcu bdud du// nges par gang tshe rlung 'bab na// de cing yitshad kyis ni// zla ba rnams ni dbu dang ni// nyi ma bco brgyad na de bzhin/ 'tsho ba'i dus la thecom med// nyim bco brgyad rngub yis// thub yangan
153b4(rgyud): brgya ngan dang // nyi ma rnams kyang nyi ma'i grangs// dus kyi grangs ni bshad pa'o// gang tshe gcig dman nyi shur no// dri la zhon pa spyod pa na// nyi ma yang dag bshad bya ba// 'tsho ba zla ba bdun dang ni// nyi ma
153b5(rgyud): rnams ni dus grangs bshad// dus 'di rnams kyis mchog gdong can// gang tshe nyi shu ru ni spyod// zla ba drug na tshe dang 'bral// nyi ma nyi shu gcig rnams su// gang tshe nyi ma rab 'bab na// zla ba lnga ru yongs
153b6(rgyud): 'tsho ste// nyi ma rnams ni nyi ma'i grangs// nyi shu rtsa gnyis gang tshe 'bab// zla ba rig byed na tshe 'gro// nyi ma rnams ni nyi shu bzhi// zla ba rig byed du bshad do// lha mo gang tshe nyi shu gsum// rlung ni rgyun du 'bab
153b7(rgyud): ba na 'di ni zla ba bzhir 'tsho ste// nyi ma dus rnams su dran bya// nyi shu rtsa bzhir rab 'bab pas// zla ba gsum du bshad pa ste// nyin bcu gcig na de bzhin du// 'chi ba'i dus su rnam par brjod// dus kyi
154a1(rgyud): grangs ni mdor bsdus nas// gong du sngon du bshad de'i phyir// bar gyi nyi ma ma bshad gang // bcu gnyis nyid kyi grangs kyis ni// cha yi rim pas de sbyangs nas// bar gyi gsal/
154a2(rgyud): bar byas pa yin// blo dman rnams kyis rtogs don du// dus 'di rnams ni rab tu bstan// rnal 'byor ma rnams shin phra mo'i// 'thun ma dus ni bdag gis bshad// lha mo de rnams kyis yid ches//
154a3(rgyud): khams ni mnyam pa can du 'gro// sna yi sha ni rnams chad cing // steng bltas ma ni de bzhin 'bab// de yis 'tsho bar shes byas pa// nyi ma bdun na the tsom med// mig gi gos ni yang dag chad// gyen kha
154a4(rgyud): bltas ma mchog de bzhin// cha shas dgu la yang dgra zhon// lngas lhag pa na 'chad de bzhin// go dA bar+ya mkhur ba yi// ngos su steng du 'gro ba mo// nyi ma bcu ru shes bya ste// nub gcig gis lhag de bzhin
154a5(rgyud): norna ba g.yas la yongs brten nas// bzang mo steng du yang dag rten// bcu gcig cha shas la zhon te// 'chad pa bco brgyad na de bzhin// bcu gnyis de bzhin du lha mo// lce la ri mo nag po can//
154a6(rgyud): lus can kun gyi 'chi ba ni// nam zla'i mtshan mos shes par bya// bcu gsum so yi bar du ni// gdong nag po ni reg de bzhin// nam zla'i grangs kyi nyi rnams kyis// 'byung po rnams kyi bgrod pa
154a7(rgyud): yin rgyun du mchi ma 'bab gang rtsa// steng bltas mar ni rab tu grags// bcu bzhi pa yi dbyangs la zhon// bcu phyed kyis ni the tsom med// snying ka'i gzeb ni zhom pa dang // steng du lha ma de mchog ma/
154b1(rgyud): gsum dang lnga ru mdzes lha mo// zla ba phyed du the tsom med// skye nga'i dbus su mon lha mo// bcu drug cha bdag can yongs rdzogs// sen mo'i khrag med de bzhin zhag/ nyin rnams ban+d+ha the ts+tsham pa/
154b2(rgyud): bcu bdun pa y-i rtsa yang ni// brla yi stang du bskams pa ni// nyi shu rtsa bzhir yang dag grags// nyon gzhin nyan la the tsom med// byin pa zung gi gang zhig rtsa// steng du bzlas ma de bzhin mchog
154b3(rgyud): brgyad pa ru shes bya ste// nyi ma rnams kyang nyi grangs kyis// gcig gis dman pa'i nyi shu 'doms// 'chi ba'o steng du lngas mchog/ mnyam pas 'chad par 'gyur ba la// 'di yis 'tsho ba the tshom med/
154b4(rgyud): mtshan mar rol ldan mar grags ma// steng bgrod mchog gi dbang phyug ma// bcu gnyis su ni yang dag grags// nyin rnams dus tshod the tsom za// bar gyi nyi ma gang bshad pa// bcu gnyis nyid la/
154b5(rgyud): the tsom med// lo yi rim pas de sbyangs nas// bdun cu rtsa gnyis pa yis ni// drug dang sum cu bco brgyad bcu// 'di na zla bas rim ji ltar// shes bya de ltar lha chen mo// rim gyis rim gyis dbye ba'o//
154b6(rgyud): lhag ma nyid ni bsdus 'gyur bar// 'tsho ba yir ni shes par bya// yang dag cho ga 'di rnams kyis// rdo rje 'od ni bsgom par bya// rab tu sbyor bas srog bkang bas// sangs rgyas lus la 'chi ci smos//
154b7(rgyud): rab tu sbyor ba 'di brten nas// mdor bsdus pa yis 'chad par 'gyur// rdo rje'i lam nas son pa'i srog/ snal ma bcu gnyis mthar bar du'o// sangs rgyas rjes su dran sbyor bas// 'dod pa
155a1(rgyud): shA ldan la za 'gyur// gsang sngags chen po'i 'od la ni// gnas nas kun tu 'gyod par bya// sgyu ma'i bdag nyid 'chi med 'gyur// rnam pa dri za'i rig can no// rtsa yi kun
155a2(rgyud): nas 'grengs bzhin pa// dngos po kun la gnas pa yin// skye bo kun gyi khams rnams ni// ye shes rnam par 'thob par byed// chos bdag med pa 'dzag par 'gyur// gang zag rnams la
155a3(rgyud): rgod par 'gyur// gnyis ka sgyu ma chen mo ste// snying rje'i dbang gis bzhugs pa yin// mthar thug pa yi sbyor bas sems// mtshams rnams kun tu 'chi ba yin// 'chi ba chen po sangs
155a4(rgyud): rgyas gzugs// rnal 'byor rnams la bde ster byed// dkyil 'khor thams cad bzung ba yis// thams cad bde ba'i bdag nyid 'gyur// 'khor lo'i rim pa'i rab sbyor bas// bde ba dam
155a5(rgyud): pa yang dag myang // rdo rje 'od ni bsgom par bya// bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs mtshungs ma// lha ni mngon rtogs gzugs can te// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid can// srog kun yang dag sbyor/
155a6(rgyud): ba las// mchog tu zag med bzhugs ldan pa// de bzhin gshegs pa dus 'khor grags// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bdun pa'o// /
155a7(rgyud): de nas phyag na rdo rje sogs// byang sems de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis// mchod pa byas shing phyag byas te// 'di skad du ni gsol ba'o// gtso bo lha rnams sgrub thabs dang // de rnams rang sdug
155b1(rgyud): bdag la gsungs// gang gis thams cad dbang gyur pa// gang gis rab sbyor nyid kyis lags// lha la sogs pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs// rdo rje gu yi rgyal po nyon// gang gis yang dag rtog
155b2(rgyud): yis 'amyur du dngos grub rab tu 'jug/ dkyil 'khor bri ba byas nas ni// u bsgom bya ba 'dir bshad de// de la ma mo lha rnams dang // bonya 'byung po gapa' de bzhin// lus srul po ni chen po/
155b3(rgyud): dang 'a rig pa'i gsang sngags 'dir brjod bya// dbus ma yi ni nang gnas pa// srid pa dag pas bsgrubs pa yin// dus thams cad du bskyed pa ni// dkyil 'khor du ni rab 'bab can// ma mo dang
155b4(rgyud): chen bsgrub bya dang // lha ni chu yi dkyil 'khor du// 'byung po me la bsgrub bya ba// gza' ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor la// lus srul po ni nam mkha' ste// rdo rje sku yi rab sbyor bar// ye shes dkyil 'khor
155b5(rgyud): cha yis na// a ba d+hU tI 'bab pa yin// dkyil 'khor lha rnams kyi tha ma// de yi dus su gshegs par bya// de bltas nas ni phyi rol tu// ras bris la sogs dkyil 'khor dgod// nag pa'i brgyad dang /
155b6(rgyud): bcu bzhi la// 'byung po'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya// 'bum phrag bzlas pas de nas ni// ster 'gyur mdun du mngon sum du'o// tshangs ma zhi ba mo de bzhin// gzhon nu phag mo de bzhin du// dbang /
155b7(rgyud): mo nyid dang tsA mut+ti// tshogs kyi dbang mo de gdan mo// gnyis pa'i dum bur dbang po dang // gshin rje chu lha lus ngan dang // yi dgas dbang dang me sten can// bden bral dang ni rlung de bzhin// dum bu/
156a1(rgyud): gsum par dgod bya ga// nyi ma klu ba mig dmar dang // gapa' lhag pur bu ba sangs dang // spen pa dang nI rA chu'o// bzhi par tshangs khyab 'jas de bzhin// drag po gzhon du
156a2(rgyud): nges par sbyor// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // 'byung ba chen po'i khams rnams dang // mkha' 'gro mar me 'jib ma dang // kam pa dzaM khyab bdag de bzhin// 'byung po 'byung po'i gzugs kyis ni// ga
156a3(rgyud): tu cho ga bzhin bsgrub bya// dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba yis// kun nas phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri// ri mo sum bskor dbus byin pas// brtul zhugs can gyis mdzes par bya// pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri//
156a4(rgyud): bar bya// lte ba zab po'i spyod yul can// de yi dbus su rdo rje'i sku// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa yi// bzhad pa'i zhal la khro dang bcas// kha dog sngon po drag
156a5(rgyud): chen po// thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// nyi mar gar mdzad ro la bzhugs// sum cu pa rnams 'jigs par byed// stegs gi pags pa'i na bza' 'dzin// bzang po'i gzugs can spyan gsu
156a6(rgyud): pa khrod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// cang te'u gri gug gis ni brgyan// shar dang lho dang nub dang ni// byang du rim pa ji lta bas// mkha' 'gro kam po dza nyid ma// 'jib ma dang ni mar me ma'o// de ltar rdo rje
156a7(rgyud): yi don// mdor bsdus pa yis brjod par bya// lte bar rdo rje'i rnam par 'gyur// pho nya rkang pa drug bgrod ma'i// snying kha gsang ba mgrin pa ru// de nyid rnam pa slar dgod bya// de nas srog ni 'dzin bzhin/
156b1(rgyud): bas bsam gtan sems te gzhan gyis mis/ sams 'od zer bskyed par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor ba rnams rang lus kyis/ las dang tha ma sbyor ba mas/ phyogs bad+ma rnam par spyo
156b2(rgyud): 'gyur// hrI yig las byung ba'i lha mo// phag mo phyag ni bzhi pa ste// gzhu dang mda' ni de bzhin du// rgyal mtshan dang ni thod pa nyid// kha dog sngon po drag chen mo// pag gi gdong can
156b3(rgyud): 'jigs rung ma'o// pheng yig gis bris zhi ba mo// kha dog dmar me 'od chen mo// thod pa dang ni lcags kyu nyid// khyA TA Da ma ru de bzhin// hrIyi yi ges gzhon nu ma/ kha dog ser mo byug
156b4(rgyud): bzhi ma// rtse gsum pa dang ba dan gsum// gzhu dang mda' nyid de bzhin no// hoHyi yi ges tsa mut+ti// kha dog nag mo phyag bzhi ma// kha T+wAM ga nyid thod pa dang // cang te'u chang snod de bzhin na//
156b5(rgyud): oM yig las ni tshangs pa mo// kha dog dkar mo phyag bzhi ma// pad+ma nyid dang thod pa dang // gzhu dang mda' ni de bzhin mchog/ gaM yig las ni tshogs dbang mo// kha dog ljang ku phyag bzhi ma/
156b6(rgyud): rtse gsum pa dang thod pa dang // bgrang 'phreng dang ni la du'o// bI yig las ni khyab 'jug ma// kha dog sngon mo phyag bzhi ma// 'khor lo dang ni thod pa dang // zhags pa ral gri de bzhin mchog/
156b7(rgyud): I yig las byung ba'i dbang mo// kha dog ser mo phyag bzhi ma// rdo rje mdung thung thod pa dang // sdigs mdzub bcas zhags de bzhin no// thams cad 'bar bzhin gyen brdzes sku// sna tshogs rgyan gyis
157a1(rgyud): rnam par grubs// ro la zhon ma spyan gsum ma// rked par sdug gi pags pa dkris// shar snor tshangs pa ni byA ga// kha dog dkar po phyag ba ga// bod pa dang ni bAr+thang
157a2(rgyud): 'phreng dang // spyi blugs pad+ma de bzhin no// byang du de bzhin khyab 'jug ni// kha dog nag po phyag bzhi pa// ral gri de bzhin 'khor lo dang // thod pa dbyug pa de bzhin no// lho ru drag po bri bya ste/
157a3(rgyud): du ba'i mdog can phyag bzhi pa// rtse gsum thod pa de bzhin du// zhags pa 'phreng ba 'dzin de bzhin// nub tu gzhon nu bri bar bya// kha dog ser po phyag bzhi pa// dpa' bo mdung thung dbyug pa
157a4(rgyud): 'dzin// thod pa bgrang 'phreng 'dzin de bzhin// dbang ldan khyu mchog la zhon pa// kha dog dkar po phyag bzhi ste// thod pa dang ni rtse gsum 'dzin// phyag gzhan thal mo sbyar ba'o// dbang po
157a5(rgyud): glang po la zhon pa// kha dog ser po phyag bzhi ste// rdo rje dang ni thod pa dang // thal mo sbyar ba byas pa mchog/ me ru lug la zhon pa ni// kha dog dmar po phyag bzhi pa// me ya~M thab dang thod pa dang /
157a6(rgyud): skrag nas de bzhin lag thal sbyar// gshin rje ma he la zhon pa// kha dog nag po phyag bzhi pa// dbyug pa de bzhin thod pa dang // kun tu skyug nas thal sbyar 'dzin// bder bral mi la zhon pa ste/
157a7(rgyud): kha dog sngo skya phyag bzhi pa// ral gri dang ni thod pa 'dzin// kun nas skrag pas thal sbyar mchog/ chu lha chu srin la zhon pa/ kha dog dkar po phyag bzhi ste// zhags pa de bzhin thod pa dang // thal mo
157b1(rgyud): sbyar ba de bzhin gtam chung sbyar dgas la zhon pa/ du ba mdog can byag ngan sa// bdan dang nathong ba dang / de bzhin b+hal gyur 'dzin pa mchog khrus dan po ga d+hal ma 'don su/
157b2(rgyud): po phyag bzhi pa/ rin pa che dang thong pa 'dzim/ thal sbyar byas pa'i de bzhin gzhan/ thams cad rtswakar dang ni gapa'/ rang dkyil 'khor la gnas pa sgom/ rang gi mtshig las byung ba
157b3(rgyud): rnams rdzu 'phrul ldan stobs che// ma mo rnams dang kun gyi ma// 'byung po rigs ma de bzhin gzhan// de lha'i cho ga'i bya ba yis// de phyir re re bsgrub par bya// dur khrod la sogs gnas rnams su//
157b4(rgyud): sna tshogs dam tshig za rnams kyis// rnal 'byor longs spyod rtag dga' la// pho ny+dza'i las ni yang dag brtsam// zla ba rdo rje'i cho ga yis// rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung bzhin no// sngags kyi rgyal pos bskus
157b5(rgyud): ba yis// de thams cad ni bran bzhin byed// gnas sogs nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru// de phyir rim pas mchod par bya// de nas dri sogs dbul bya zhing // sngags kyi bzlas pa yang bya ste// rang ming brjod pa'i
157b6(rgyud): gsang sngags la// oM hUM phaT sogs nang bcug pa'o// dbus su bcom ldan 'das brjes nas// der ni thams cad bsgrub par bya// de nas gzhan brjes pa'i nang du// bcom ldan gzhan gyi gzugs
157b7(rgyud): can te// ba dan gsum pa 'bar ba dang // rdo rje thod pa rdul can mchog/ gzhu dang mda' ni 'dzin pa nyid// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag gis 'phyar// lhag ma sngon gyi gzugs can te// lus dang zhal/
158a1(rgyud): logs sngon gyu // nges par byas na la 'byor rdzas/ 'gru 'gyur 'das sesas ma// zugs grags / as nA lus sbya sa
158a2(rgyud): thams cad kyi nang bzhugs pa// bcom ldan gzugs kyi 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa brgyad pa'o// de nas 'di ni bde rgyal po// rnal 'byor ma yis sad mdzad/
158a3(rgyud): nas/ rangag 'di yis ni 'dri bar mdzad// blo gros chen po dus ci lags// kye rnal 'byor ma rnams khyed nyid dus// myur gu can gyis skyes pa'o// sna tshogs sa bon sems chen po// myu gu can gyi sbyor/
158a4(rgyud): bas bshad// gza' dang rgyu skar tshes grangs ni// sems kyi dus su mngon par brjod// gzugs med grangs ni de yi dus// rnal 'byor rnams kyi bde ba'i rgyu// 'jig rten gyi ni dus tsam du// thub pa skyes
158a5(rgyud): mchog rnams kyis gsungs// de tshe myu gu can sgom pa// sa bon sa bon gyi mtshan nyid// myu gu sems kyi gzugs can te// sems las byung ba myu gu can// rgyu skar rA si gza' sogs pas// gang zhig tu
158a6(rgyud): ni myu gu skyes// de yis myu gu can nges byas// rang bzhin rang bzhin du sbyang bya// dge ba 'am ni mi dge kun// tshes grangs rgyu skar gza' 'char ba// de rnams thams cad dus rnams su// thams cad bde ba dag/
158a7(rgyud): nyid skyes sgom// ro tri mo ni rnyed byed pa'o// ma b+ha ma nad 'joms pas spangs// kuswa A dus byed gzugs te// tshes grangs de ni yongs su spangs// mo bu ma bzang dang bkra shis so// rabu A 'joms par
158b1(rgyud): byed pa'o// b+ha bu b+ha dus kyi gzugs kyis so// b+ha pA gu rnyed pa byed pa po// mi g+hu d+ha nor la sogs par mdzad// dgu ma dus kyi gzugs can no// thi shu pU dge ba rnams byed do// TI shru bu nad dang /
158b2(rgyud): 'joms pa yin// b+hu b+ha shu gshin rje'i mche can no// klu ma kri grags dang bsod nams 'thob// b+h+ra ma A gdung byed pa po// pu ra ma 'chi ba'i dus can no// me'i gdan can du mi ki ra// slar yang gshin
158b3(rgyud): rje rat+na spang // srin por bco lnga pa nyid dang // khyu mchog chu lhar snang bar bya// sems g.yengs rab tu 'joms nyid du// gter du rmi lam can de bzhin// bzang po mig gsum pa nyid du// 'byung po
158b4(rgyud): nyi ma shar de bzhin// zla ba dang ni nyi sogs chas// de rnams ris mo rab bshad bya// bzang po yugs sa mo de bzhin// sems g.yeng 'byung po'i nyi mar gnas// skye bo kun gyi ma yi ni// cha yi rgyu bar
158b5(rgyud): shes par bya// khyu mchog mi ki ra nyid dang // rmi lam bco lnga pa de bzhin// zla ba'i rgyu bar yang dag grags// rim pa 'di rnams rnam par brjod// nyal me ru yang dag gnas// stong la rlung gi gnas
158b6(rgyud): su'o/ de ltar de'i dbus gnas pa ni// phyogs su gdung byed yang dag gnas// zla ba nyid las byung ri mo// mnyam par lta bas mnyam par 'gro// zhi dang sdig pa bltas pa yis// shes rab can gyi des/
158b7(rgyud): de spangs// mche ba dang 'phrad ma bltas pas// bder par 'chi bar byed pa yin// dus smra ba ni mdor bsdus pa// rA du'i rgyu bar grags pa yin// dkar dang cig shos cho ga yis// blo gros mthar thug pas
159a1(rgyud): shes 'gyur// rgyu skar sogs dang mi mthun par// mongs pa gang zhig smra bar byed// skye bo rang gis byas pa yis// las 'di shes par ma gyur to// las de mas ni dru na/
159a2(rgyud): ni the tsom med par 'byung bar 'gyur// lus kyi tshogs pa ji srid pa// de srid du ni dus rab 'jug/ rnal 'byor pa rnams nyams su myong // yang dag byang chub gnas 'thob 'gyur// de ni myu gu can du grags
159a3(rgyud): kha dog dmar po 'od chen po// myu gu'i myu gu'i gzugs can ni// lte ba'i rtsa bar gnas pa sgom// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo'i nang son pa// gzugs de lha rdzas kyi ni gzugs// ye shes byu gu rnam bsgoms pas
159a4(rgyud): las rnams thams cad mthong mi 'gyur// thams cad bdag nyid sbyor chen las// sngon las rnam par 'joms mdzad pa// rgyu rnams su ni rtag bzhugs pa'i// rdo rje rgyu yis 'di gsungs so// zhes
159a5(rgyud): bya ba ni rab tu byed pa dgu pa'o// de nas rdo rje'i gar byas nas// rnal 'byor mas ni 'di dris so// ji ltar ston pa sems dpa' che// las dang 'brel pas 'byung bar 'gyur//
159a6(rgyud): sngon ni las ni rnam nyams pas// rgyun nyams pas na 'ong med pa// 'di la bdag ni the tsom mchis// snying rje mnyes gshin pas bka' stso la// sems can chen po'i 'byung ba yang // sngon gyi
159a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams gsungs pa/ mdor bsdus pa yis bshad bya yis// khyod ni yid gcig pa yis nyom/ ji rje ral pa can sbyor bas// las kyi nang du sgrub par gyur// dza ri la ni sbyor ba 'i// don
159b1(rgyud): rang byung du gnas so// shin tu dang ba la gnas pas// dbang po thams cad 'du bar bya// de yi ral pas cag 'jig rtem// ral pa'i mang gis 'ching ba yin// dga' ba ban las khyab rkye/
159b2(rgyud): pa'i 'ardo rje'i sku khyod 'thob par 'gyur// de phyir bag chags thams cad dang // dge ba'i las las zad par 'gyur// skye bo chen po de 'byung ba// gcig nyid lam gyis 'thob par 'gyur//
159b3(rgyud): rtog pa med las rtog par 'gyur// rtog pa yis ni rtog med 'byung // dril bu'i sgra ni thob byas nas// de rnams mtshan nyid bshad par bya// rtse dgu rtse mo gcig pa dang // rtse lnga rtse mo gsum
159b4(rgyud): pacan// de ltar la sogs dril bu che// rtse mo stong gi bar du'o// sgra brjod pa yi dngos po yis// spros pa med cing yi ge med// rnal 'byor pa yis mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho dag/ de yi sgra las rtog pa yang
159b5(rgyud): dag byung // de nyid kyis ni rtog pa med pa'i bdag/ gnas rnams gang la nges par zhugs pa yin// sngon bshad rtse can de rdo rje// gang du yid ni rnam 'phro ba// chos dang sprul pa'i ris sku can// de nyid du/
159b6(rgyud): ni gsor bar bya// phyi yi dril bu'i mtshan nyid ni// dpa' bos gsungs pa bshad par bya// dril bu rtag tu cha gsum can// lha yis yang dgra brgyan par byas// re re yi ni lha'i bdag po// ting 'dzin
159b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du ji ltar// rnal 'byor rnams kyis lhag mos pas// de bzhin thams cad zhal bya'o// lha mo de rnams kyi ni gdan// dril bu de la pad sogs bya// ji ltar de rnams kyi ni brgyan// de
160a1(rgyud): bzhin dril bu'i ma rags so// ldan no dang garnams sa// phyogs brgyad rnams su bya bas// lta rnal 'byor ba'i mtshanaH// rnams nal sa kyi sgo 'dzin// rnam pa
160a2(rgyud): sogs dang zhal gnyis la'ang // steng du rang rigs mtshan ma can// 'di 'dra ba y-i dril bu che// tshad ni gzhan du bshad pa yin// de ni nang gi gzugs can bdag/ de phyir sgra ni rnam mtshan na/
160a3(rgyud): thig le'i gzugs ni khyab bdag che// rdo rje'ang de dang mnyam par bya// de ltar ral pa'i sbyor ba las// sems can thams cad bsgrub par bya// ral can dril bur yang dag grags// rdo rje rdo rjer brjod
160a4(rgyud): par 'gyur// rdo rje ral can bdag nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor du yang bsgom par bya// rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro kun// de tshe nang du mngon par gzhug/ thams cad gnyis pa yongs sbyor las/
160a5(rgyud): rdo rje ral pa can byung ba// rdo rje dril bu yang dag brten// bcom ldan dpa' bos 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu pa'o// de nas gzhan gyi sbyor ba che//
160a6(rgyud): dpa' bo chen po'i rab sbyor bas// bdag gis mngon sum du bshad kyis// rnal 'byor ma kun mnyan par gyis// lus can kun gyi lus gang la// gdan ni stong phrag gnas pa ste// de rnams
160a7(rgyud): la yig dgos pa ni// kau sogs ha yig mthar de bzhin// yon tan la sogs dbyangs rnams yig/ khams re re la yi ge rnams// slar yang phyi mo bcu gnyis kyis// mkhas pa rnams kyis
160b1(rgyud): dbyebar bya/ gtum mthong drag bdag nyid cam brtsams can tu ni gnas pa 'bar khams thams cad kyi bde gnas lus dpa ba'i longs spyod 'thob par shArnam das
160b2(rgyud): kyis bkug pa// byang chub sems dpa'i rigs chen po// bdag med pa yi bdag tu bzhag/ gnyis med chos 'thung nung du'o// de sar stong phrag gon lnga// dpa' bo chen po'i go 'phang gnas
160b3(rgyud): sman thams cad dang nye ba'i yin// sbas pa'i bcud len gsungs pa'o// phyi rol rnams kyi'ang yi ge bdag/ de'i ming nyid du shes par bya// me tog 'bras sogs sde tshan gyi// dang pon
160b4(rgyud): ming ni sdong phrag can// de rnams kyis ni bcud len sgrub// gzhan du 'bras bu med par 'gyur// ji lta'i rim pas rims sogs kyi// ka sogs thams cad sman chen te// las smra ba yi rgyud
160b5(rgyud): gzhan du// der ni nges par gsal rig bya// dang po'i mgon po rnam bsgoms nas// rtags rnams thob par bya ba yin// yang na grub rnal 'byor rnams kyis// bcud kyis len ni gang mthong ba/
160b6(rgyud): des kyang mthong ba tsam gyis ni// bla med dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur// sde tshan rnam pas yongs sbyor las// bdud rtsi'i tshogs mtshams gzugs ldan pa'i// grub pa'i sman rnams rang bzhin
160b7(rgyud): can bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu gcig pa'o// de nas rnal 'byor ma dpa' bo// 'dres pas mchod pa byas nas ni// grong khyer/
161a1(rgyud): gsas rgyung byu ga ltun pa ma ma skye gas// dug+sa gargyags kyis byan pa lags// byung du du pa la gas sang /
161a2(rgyud): ni bstan par byas// lha dang lha ma yin dang mi// ci yi dag gis 'gro dang 'ong / mngon par tshogs mtshams mtshan nyid na// sngon gyi ji bzhin bshad du gsol// mngon par tshigs mtshams mtshan nyidani/
161a3(rgyud): ji lha'i rim pas bshad kyis nyon// shin tu zab mo'i don chen po// sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyis ma shes// sems can rnams kyi rang snang can// bdag gis nges par mdor bsdus pas// rdo rjesam
161a4(rgyud): 'od gzhan nyid du// khams dang mtshan mar gnas min can// lus dang ngag sems dag pa yi// grong khyer gsum rnams su byung ba'o// sngon gyi dngos por khyer nas 'ongs// nges par las chung//
161a5(rgyud): bar 'gro'o// yang na dus rnams thams cad du// ji ltar me long la bzhin mthong // sngon du nyan pa thob byas nas// sems kyang de yi gnas la'o// rdo rje la sogs ting 'dzin gyis// lha la sogs
161a6(rgyud): pa de rnams rmongs// de yis rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi// rab tu sbyor bas rtag tu sprul// rdo rje'i rtse mor 'jig rten sprul// 'od zer lcags kyu spro ba ste// hUM gi yi ge'i sgra yis ni// ston pas 'khor lo can ston byas/
161a7(rgyud): chos 'byung bang pa brtsegs pa ru// nyi shu'i lhan cig skyes gdan du// ngag gi spyod pas mnyan par byed// der song nas ni de la thim// de ltar rnal 'byor dbang po yi// slob dpon khyab bdag ches shes bya//
161b1(rgyud): rdo rje la sogs de'i ming nyid// de yi mtshan nyid bshad par bya// sems can kun la phan bdag nyid// mi 'jigs pa ni ster nyid dang // sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes// sbyor ba bzo dang sgyu rtsal sogs//
161b2(rgyud): mthun pa'i ngag dang thams cad la// bu gcig pa ltar mthun pa dang // gtong ba sogs la rtag tu dga'// bsam gtan ting 'dzin de mchog gzhol// ji ltar smras pa de bzhin byed// 'tshe ba med cing bden pa'i
161b3(rgyud): dga' sems can kun la thugs brtse dang // lam du 'dzud pa de mthar phyin// kun mkhyen yon tan dang mnyam dang // bstan bcos kun gyi pha rol som// mgon med rnams kyi pha dang ma// phyag rgya brdan bye/
161b4(rgyud): pa po de sogs yon tan rnams kyis gang // skye ba 'di la de bzhin gshegs// rnal 'byor ma 'khor lo dbus su// rdo rje hUM mdzad sgom pa yin// dkyil 'khor byang chub sems kyi ste// bde ba'i rgyal
161b5(rgyud): bo rnal 'byor ma// sgra rnams su ni sgra ye shes// rdo rje hUM mdzad can khyab bdag/ 'phos pa'i lhag mar gyur ye shes// dang po'i mgon po'i rgyu yin no// sems kyi nyams su myong ba ni// de phyir phra mo'i rang bzhin
161b6(rgyud): can spar sha'i khams su yang dag grags// de nyid kyis ni khyer nas 'ongs// mkha' 'gro rgya mtshor rtag nges par// sa gsum de yi rang bzhin byas// de ltar sbyor ba mchog gtso bo// shing srin bzhan na
161b7(rgyud): sog ma bzhin// 'di yis bgrod pa ma shes pas// byis pa mi shes pa yis bcings// mtha' yis bde ba gsung ba po// bstan bya ston pa rdo rje 'chang // lhan cig skyes gzugs ston pa po// bcom ldan
162a1(rgyud): ye shes kyis 'di gsungs// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas gang gis sgrub pa po// 'grub pa'i bsam med sbyor bshad bya// den shin
162a2(rgyud): bzang rab sbyor bas// spyod dang brtul zhugs bshad par bya// lhun gyis grub 'gyur de'i spyod pa// dngos grub 'dod rnams kyis shes bya// phyi rol gnyis med sbyor bdag nyid// spyod pa de ni rab tu bsngags//
162a3(rgyud): kun gyi bdag nyid yid bzang la// dbang po'i grong khyer yang dag rten// grong de rnams su spyod pa dang // yid kyis brtul zhugs bstan par bya// srid dang zhi ba'i gzugs rnams kyis// gang der bdag nyid
162a4(rgyud): kyis 'gro bya// bdag nyid gzugs kyi rang bzhin can// yang dag me long la mthong 'gyur// zhu ba'i sems la brten byas nas// lus ni lus la thim par gyis// sdom par bdag nyid kyis bsdams pas/
162a5(rgyud): phyag rgya chen por yang dag grags// phyag rgya lnga sogs lus la gnas// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM 'dzin// bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa za// lhan cig rnal 'byor ma rol ldan// chags pa'i sems kyis bsgom pa ste/
162a6(rgyud): mi 'dod kyang ni de phyir 'gro// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po yis// yid 'di la ni gos pa med// 'jigs med rnam pa'i sems kyis ni// mtshan mo dur khrod sogs par 'gro// sa gzhi gang du spyod pa na/
162a7(rgyud): rnam shes brgyad du shes par bya// blo ldan spyod dang brtul zhugs ni// bde ba can du de rtsen to// dang po'i sbyor bar yongs brten nas// phyi nas yid kyi rab tu bshad// srog thams cad ni mnyam sbyor bas//
162b1(rgyud): dbang po'i grong khyer bde ba yis// ye shes spyod pa'i brtul zhugs 'dzin// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu gsum pa'o// de nas skye ngon
162b2(rgyud): rigs kyi ni// khyad par bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// rdo rje bzang po'i rab sbyor bas// de rigs 'dir ni nyams par 'gyur// de la dang po lnga dang bdun// brgyad dang bcu gsum bco lnga dang // bcu bdun
162b3(rgyud): dang ni nyi shu gnyis// nyi shu rtsa bdun de bzhin mchog/ tha skar la sogs shes bya ste// lha rnams tshogs su dran par bya// bzhi pa dang ni shar ba gsum// gnyis pa dang ni drug de bzhin// byang phyogs pa rnam
162b4(rgyud): de bzhin gsum// mi yi tshogs su dran par bya// gsum pa dang ni bcu nyid dang // dgu pa dang ni nyi shu gsum// bcu bzhi pa dang bcu drug pa// bco brgyad pa dang bcu dgu pa// nyi shu rtsa bzhi de grags pa// srin
162b5(rgyud): po'i rigs su dran par bya// ra rigs gsum dang brgyad pa dang // klun bani dang lnga pa'o// drug pa nyi shu rtsa dgu pa// khyi yi dngos por bshad pa'o// bcu dang bcu gcig byi ba ste// byi la de bzhin dgu pa'o//
162b6(rgyud): bcu bzhi pa dang bcu drug pa// rtag tu de ltar brjod pa'o// bcu gnyis pa dang nyi shu lnga// khyu mchog gi ni rigs 'thob bo// thog ma tha ma bong bu yi// rigs su de rnams rab tu grags// bcu gsum pa dang bcom
162b7(rgyud): ba 'di ni ma her mngon par brjod// thog ma dang ni nyi shu drug garta yi rigs su rab tu brjod// nyi shu pa dang nyi shu gnyis// spre'u zhes bya bar brjod pa'o// gnyis pa dang ni mtha' de bzhin// glang po yin rigs
163a1(rgyud): su 'gro// ha thAgasus dang ni bu ba'i// mi sa spobs na che ba yim/ kyi shu gcig pa sam // mdor bsdus pa yis rab tu bshad slong pa dang bangs byed pa'i rnas pa
163a2(rgyud): bshad kyis da lta mnyan par gyis// mi rnams srog ni rgyas sa// gzhan du rab tu 'thob pa yin// kAr mar dus kyi sa son par// 'dzin pa po ni nges par 'bru lug dang srang dang kakuH// chu srin
163a3(rgyud): mthon po la dran bya// kI Ta bum seng khyu mchog ni// brtan pa'i bya bar rab tu bstan// nya dang 'khrig pa de bzhin 'dir// gzhu dang bu mo 'dres ma la'o// bla ma nyi ma sa'i skyes bu// ngan spong rA du
163a4(rgyud): bud med// gza' lhag bkra shis ma ning ste// mkha' dkyil 'khor la gza' gang yin// de ltar rigs rnams so gzhan du// byang chub sras po mi 'gyur ro// rdo rje bzang por de bshad de// rab sbyor rnam
163a5(rgyud): pa'i sems kyis ni// g.yon pa'i rtsa ru son pa'i sems// dbu ma'i tha ma'i sbyor bar ldan// byang chub sa bon rnams 'bab pa// byang chub sems rnams kyis rig pa'o// snying rjer son pa'i yid kyis/
163a6(rgyud): ni las kyi nyi ma 'dzag pa yin// yang dag rab ster rtag tu ldan// rigs med rigs can yang med do// srid par rtsed mo tsam du ni// bsam gtan rnam pa'i lus son pa// me long gi ni yul
163a7(rgyud): la gzugs// gang 'dra mthong ste de med do// de 'drar byang chub sems dpa' rnams// bsam gtan sbyor ba'i gzugs can no// de yi nang du zhu ba'i sems// de dang mnyam pa gzhan yod min//
163b1(rgyud): nges par dkyil 'khor rnams dbus su// rdo rje bzang po bsgom par bya// shes rab thabs kyi chog yis// gsang sngags mchod pa sngon gyi can// dus dang dus min tsha'i bdag nyid// dngos med ma tshan/
163b2(rgyud): bye por bzhugs/ byang chub gzugs kyi bdag nyid ce/ bcom ldan sems dpas 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu bzhi pa'o// de nas gsang ba'i sbyor gang /
163b3(rgyud): gis ba kun bdag nyid du skyed bshad// don dam pa mi sbyor ba yis// de bzhin nyid du rab 'jug bya// 'jigs byed chen po'i rnal 'byor gyis// sngags kyi 'phreng bar rang nyid ston// bani bcun brgya
163b4(rgyud): pa nyid ni// sa rnams la ni rab tu bshad// 'khor lo drug dbyibs ri mo ni// sa yi dbus su bya ba yin// thams cad du ni gsang sngags tshig/ bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad bri bar bya// de rnams sngags kyi
163b5(rgyud): gzugs rnams ni// srog ni yi ge'i rnam pa can// yi ge'i cha rnams bzang po ni// spangs nas dbus ma'i gnas pa yin// stong par nges par thim byas nas// 'og dang steng du blta bar bya// rkang pa'i
163b6(rgyud): mtha' nas mgo bo ru// rnal 'byor dbang phyug de srid byed// khams kun rab tu zhugs pa la// sems kyi spyod pa can ci smos// de ltar gsang ba gyen gnon pa// dpa' bo chen po'i don can no// dbus
163b7(rgyud): mar rab tu zhugs pa yi// bsnyun dang sgrub pa la sogs spangs// 'thor rlung 'dzin bzhin pa yis ni// nyi ma dang po zad med can// rdo rje'i lam nas langs pa'i sems// gang phyir brgyud nga'i rim/
164a1(rgyud): bas so// de ltar sgyu ma'i bzlas pa 'dir// sa nga'i sngags sogs bu mig cam dpa' bo kun m+b+hi du mig rnams// thugs kyi 'khor lor dgod par gyu/ nga badzin gro 'tshan
164a2(rgyud): dpa' bo rnams// bcu gnyis rnams kyi'ang 'khor long son// gang zhig gang gi ming sngon gyis// de dang de yi gnas su bri// gzhan gyi sngags kun 'di rams la// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni 'byung bar/
164a3(rgyud): 'gyur// sku la sogs pa'i bzlas kun dang // de bzhin dgra sogs bzlas pa can// sems sogs bzlas pa thams cad dang // de bzhin ye shes sogs bzlas can// sngags kyi rgyal bris bcum
164a4(rgyud): ba yis// de nas dpa' bo 'byung bar 'gyur// 'jigs byed chen po dbus rnams su// me yis gzugs can bsgob par bya// shes rab rigs kyi nus pa yis// 'byung po'i tshogs de kun
164a5(rgyud): spyod bya// zhi ba dang ni rgyas dang dbang // drag po rengs par byed yi ge / las dang rjes mthun gzugs bsgoms te// 'bar ba'i rnam pa sogs dgod bya// 'chi ba slu zhing de nyid kyis// rnal 'byor
164a6(rgyud): dang ni ldan par 'gro// nA da nA dar 'dzom bya zhing // thig le thig ler thim par bya// de ltar cho ga'i bya ba yis// gsang sngags bzlas nas phur bus gdab// 'di rnams sngags kyi gtso bo yis// rkang
164a7(rgyud): pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad de// oM hUM hUM phaT kyi yi ge mtha'// ji lta'i rim pas 'di kun la'o// na maHshrI badz+ra DA ka ma hA bI ra bI re shwa rA ya/ tri b+hu wa na ka pa kaM pa ba nA ya/ daMSh+Tot+ka Ta b+hI Sha Na b+he ra bA ya/ sha tas/
164b1(rgyud): mAn sa/ bdung ba rgyas/ gsums sa thar/ thums/ rnam pa man la ldan la/ ba tha sa 'ashul la/ u N+Da 'ams pa 'as pa nga gA/
164b2(rgyud): par bu la ng+gA sa tsu pa mar+tha ka ra sa/ d+hu d+huk+Sha tsAr u wA la/ hA shAn thigs/ sas b+huHs+t+wa~M trAs da~M kA ya mang+geg rten rjem/ nags pa/ g+had+hA la/
164b3(rgyud): pA la shU la sbyin na d+hang \u0f7f/ mthus su rnga ma la lA ya/ b+hUk+Sha tsab+h+ram pa ra d+hA ra d+he/ be tA la sa~M b+hA mad+ha nA kA rA yA/ ma hA badz+rAn da riH/ sha dz+nyAn s+'ur+b+ba ka ra ya/ dz+has ha sa mahAs pa se ka ra m+b+ha ba ldan na/
164b4(rgyud): sha ta sa ha swa mu khA ya/ dz+nyA na sA ga ra pra b+hA ya/ ma hA pi sha~M ta ru d+hi ro ba sa hr-i ra Ne/ sarba mA ra ba le d+h+waM si te/ siSh+Ti saM hA ra kA ra kA ya/ sarba nA gA nA~M she Sha Na stam+b+ha na bi drA ba nA ya/ an+t+ra mA la d+hA ri Ni/ su me ruH
164b5(rgyud): bi tA nA dA ya/ kro d+ha bi gra ha d+ha ra Na ya/ ma hA kA sha ti la kAt+pa Ne/ bud+d+ha ko Ti sa ha sra kA d+hA ni ya/ dz+nyA nA mr-i ta b.rU pa NA ya/ sarba karma pra bar+d+ha nA ya nAM/ ban+d+ha na ka rA ya/ sarba bi kalpa b+hany+dza na ka rA ya/ mud+b+ha ba la~M
164b6(rgyud): lag na sha rI rA ya/ ba ra kri ta yan+ta man+ta nA sha nA ya/ ma hA ra k+ShA ka rA ya/ duSh+Ta nAM bi dA la ne/ d+harmo da ya da ya ka rA ya/ kro d+ha s+pha ra s+pha ra NA ya/ in+da dz+wa laM sarba satwA ta ma ne/ grasta bA da pra bA da ma hA ma tai/ de ltar
164b7(rgyud): la sogs gsang sngags gang // rab tu mang ba rgya che'o// sna tshogs rnam pa du ma'i ming // sems can ming gis shes par bya// sngags rnams thams cad mnyam sbyor bas// khams gsum rnams su yongs/
165a1(rgyud): bzhugs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis mo// bcom ldan sdugs pas 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcos pa'o// de nas migs/
165a2(rgyud): sogs dbang po// kun gyi mngon shes chog bshad// mig mi bzang gi rab sbyor bas// rdo rje gsum ni rab bsgrub bya// gang du byang chub sems gnas pas// der ni mig gis nges par smra// rnal 'byor/
165a3(rgyud): rnams kyi zag med chog/ sems ni mig tu shes par bya// rnams kyinor ba sbyor bas// so sor rlung ni dbab par bya// gang nyid du ni skyes dus su// de sa dus su bris nas 'gro// de ni mngon shes
165a4(rgyud): ga mas kyi// rnams 'dams ni 'gro bar 'gyur// u 'gro'i nang du son pa'i gzugs// myong gyis ldananyan par 'gyur// gyo nga 'di ba'ochos // spyan marji rungs mtshan pa//
165a5(rgyud): byor bas/ blan dga' ba dang ngas gas// khros don shes la brten nas/ ma phyo skyes pa yas/ lus kyi ga par rnam pasas/ mtshas suman pa de byung bya/ thos
165a6(rgyud): sa sa sa ma pa sa bya
165a7(rgyud): so sa bu chun kyi ma/ yong du sa pa gyur gyi / zhing kyi pang cig lung ma dang / mag zungs byang ring/ sol rtags par shes byas
165b1(rgyud): dbugs rgyu'i mngon par shes pas so// pha rol phyin drug tshul dag gis// chos kyi dbyings ni mtshon par bya// dus dang dus min sel ba'o// mig mi bzang ba bsgom par bya// mtshon cha mtshan nyid rnal/
165b2(rgyud): 'byor ma'o// dkyil 'khor nang du byas pa nyid// sems 'di sna tshogs gzugs can te// srog chags rnams kyis gar bgrod pa// bdag med rang bzhin 'thob par 'gyur// 'dud pa rnams kyi phra
165b3(rgyud): pas gnas// gzugs su byed 'gyur de'i dngos po// mchog gi dang po bral mtha' can// chos kyi 'byung gnas gang gnas pa// rdo rje mkha' 'gror de shes bya// thur sel lam la rtag brten nas//
165b4(rgyud): slar yang re re'i nang du ste// srog la sogs pa'i rlung lnga yis// mig ni lnga ru shes par bya// 'dzag pa med pa'i sa bon 'dzag/ ye shes mkha' 'gro ma'i sbyor ldan// sa bon lnga rnams thig le yi//
165b5(rgyud): mngon shes byed po sogs lnga pa// de lha'i rnal 'byor mchog yongs rdzogs// rnal 'byor kun gyi mchog yin no// dngos po'i rang shes can ma lus// ring du yongs su spangs pa yin// thams cad
165b6(rgyud): lus su mnyam sbyor las// lhan cig skyes pa'i spyan 'jug pa// dngos kun dngos po med mdzad pa// bcom ldan mig gis 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu drug pa'o//
165b7(rgyud): de nas lha mos phyag byas nas// de bzhin mchod pa chen po byas// stobs po che yi sbyin sreg ni// bdag po chen pos bstan du gsol// mkhas pas rgyun du nang bdag gi/ sbyin sreg bshad kyis mnyan/
166a1(rgyud): par gyis// stobs po che yi rab sbyor bas// khams rnams kun gyis dgang blugs te// bde ba thab tu yang dag 'thob// nyi zla dgang gzar blugs gzar ro// slob dpon
166a2(rgyud): gnyis med de med la// yang dag rig pa'i gzugs su sreg/ sna tshogs mkha' 'gro rnams 'di med// gsang sngags rang bzhin mtshan nyid do// yam shing rtsa ru yang dag grags// gang phyir sA lu
166a3(rgyud): las skyes 'bras// tshil ni rtag tu zho zan yin// 'di ru mar ni byang chub sems// khrag ni sbrang rtsir shes par bya// srog sogs rlung rnams dur ba'o// gcin dang bshang ba dag de ltar// tsan
166a4(rgyud): ngan dang ni gla rtsi'o// me tog rtag tu khrag tu grags// mchil ma lud pa 'bras thug yin// bud shing so sen rus pa'o// mdor bsdus pa yis pags pa gos// me yi thab kyi dbus su ni// sgra dang /
166a5(rgyud): ba spu lha ru 'gyur// sna tshogs phra mo'i khams gzhan ni// sna tshogs 'bru ste de la sreg/ rim gyis mkha' 'gro rdzogs son pa// gang ba'i sreg blugs su shes bya// dbang po thams cad gar byed de/
166a6(rgyud): de ya bag chags glu len no// sna tshogs sgra chen pos rol mo// snying rje sogs pas ston mo yin// srog rnams kun gyi bdag po yi// stobs po che ni bsgom par bya// las thams cad pa'i
166a7(rgyud): sbyin sreg ni// de mnyes pa yis dngos grub 'gyur// 'jig rten mchog gi khams kun tu// yid ni de ru yang dag rol// gang tshe'i dus su bde gyur pa// de'i tshe'i dus su rab tu gnas// sbyin sreg nang
166b1(rgyud): bdag nyid mthong bas// rmod dang rjes 'dzin byed pa yin// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das ye shes// de rnams dbus mar 'thob par bya// mtshams rnams kun tu khong khro ba// sems chen po ni gsod/
166b2(rgyud): par 'gyur// rtog pas sprul pa'i sangs rgyas ni// de las byung ba bza' bar bya// mtshon bya mtshon byed rab bcom pas// gnyis dag shes par 'os pa yin// sgyu ma'i bdag nyid mtshan nyid ni//
166b3(rgyud): de la thim par byed par 'gyur// khams kun yang dag sbyor ba las// ye shes gnyis byar med mtshan nyid// me yi gzugs su rtag bzhugs pa'i// bcom ldan thab khung gis 'di gsungs/
166b4(rgyud): zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas rdo rje pad 'du ba// ji bzhin bshad kyis mnyan par gyis// rin chen rdo rje'i rab sbyor bas// a ba d+hU tI can dngos grub
166b5(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma la yang dag rol// don dam pa yi nyams la gnas// de yi sbyor bas grol bar ni// gnyis med rgyud rnams kyis 'gyur ro// lus kyis nyams su myong bzhin po// byis pa rnams kyi
166b6(rgyud): byang chub 'ong // ha yig drug dang ldan pa yi// sa bon rdo rje'i nor bur dgod// a ba d+hU tI'i rtsar dbab ste// steng du kha bltas dpral bar son// srung ba'i dus su blo ldan gyis// rang gi lag pas
166b7(rgyud): rdo rje bzung // byang chub sems la rtsen byed la// rgas dang 'chi ba ring ba yin// srid pa'i skyon las 'goms pa yis// srid gsum de yi rang bzhin 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya'i rab sbyor bas// nyi ma/
167a1(rgyud): re re bsgrub par bya// de yi dus su gang mthong ba// dngos po kun la ltung bar bya// 'dod chags chen po'i tshul bdag nyid// rtag tu bdag nyid la 'byung 'gyur// rnal 'byor
167a2(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyu'i don du// bstan bya ston pa por 'gyur ro// rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud kyi ni// sems can don ni nges par bya// sku bzhi po yi rnal 'byor gyis// bden min bdag gis bshad mi bya/
167a3(rgyud): rin che ni rdo rje'i rang bzhin can// sbyor skyes ye shes gyen du bgrod// pho nya rnams kyi gtso nyid bya// 'dod chags me yis dgyes par bya// byang chub sems ni rtag gzung ba// lce yi bya yis lag
167a4(rgyud): pas min// lhan skyes 'phros pa'i mtshan nyid ni// mkha' lding phyag rgya nyid kyis gzung // phyag rgya'i kha nyid du sbyin te// de nas btung bar bya ba yin// stobs thams cad kyang bza' bar bya// sA /
167a5(rgyud): skyes sogs 'bad pas so// sbyin sreg kun kyang de nyid kyis// dbang la sogs pa gang gang byed// de de'i thod par bya ba ste// de nas sa bon gdab par bya// de rnams rdzas kyis spang ba dang // gtor ma
167a6(rgyud): dang ni bsrung bar bya// de yis bcings pa tsam gyis ni// de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs 'jug 'gyur// ril bu 'am ni skud pa ni// dpa' bo rang nyid kyis gsungs pa'o// b+ha ga'i dbus rnams su bsgom/
167a7(rgyud): pa'o// rin chen rdo rje can de sman// dkyil 'khor khams rnams kun gyi ste// spangs pa rab tu bstan pa yin// gang dang gang gi las kyi ni// de dang de'i ming can sngags so// sa bon kun gyi yongs
167b1(rgyud): sbyor las// de ni rtag tu sman rnams te// bcom ldan las kyi phyag rgya ni// rtag tu 'ching bas 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas 'khor ba'i
167b2(rgyud): mthar gnas pa'i// mkha' 'gro'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya// rta mgrin gyi ni rab sbyor bas// pho nya'i mtshan nyid bsgrub par bya// ha yig skyes gnas dbus su ste// ya yig mgo bor gnas pa'o//
167b3(rgyud): gri yig dbu ma'i pad+mar te// wa yi yi ge snying kha ru// rnal 'byor che la 'dzin bzhin pa// dbyangs can ma dang 'dra bar byed// rmongs pa nyid ni thams cad 'phrog/ gang phyir gzhung ni rjes 'jug 'gyur/
167b4(rgyud): mgrin par rtag tu tshigs bcad ni// mgrin par ngag tu gnas pa nyid// 'tsho ba rta yi dbyibs 'dir ni// gnas pa rnal 'byor lhag ma yin// de yi sbyor bas 'gro 'gyur ba// sngon du nyi ma'i gdan du//
167b5(rgyud): 'o2nyi de rdo rje sems dpa' ste// khams gsum por ni skor bar 'gyur// nam mkha' nyi mas 'dzegs byas nas// byang chub yid kyis 'gro bar 'gyur// phyogs kyi 'khor lo ma lus rtogs//
167b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma yi chu skyes mchog/ sems can kun gyi rmongs nyid dang // lam mthong ba ni thams cad la// de nyid nyi ma rtag snang bar// mtshan mo mun pa drag po 'phrog/ rnal 'byor ma 'khor dbus
167b7(rgyud): son par// rta yi mgon po bsgoms pa yin// gang gi sangs rgyas su 'gro ba// sgrub thabs yan lag 'char bar 'gyur// bgegs rnams rnam par nyams 'gyur te// sprin la sogs pa'ang nyams/
168a1(rgyud): par 'gyur// kun gyi sdig pa'ang 'phrog par byed// rang gi dga' ba shar mtshan nyid// mchod sbyin dus kyi 'jig rten du// thams cad skad cig la sgrub 'gyur// khams bdun/
168a2(rgyud): rnam par bzung ba yin// de tshe sa 'og dngos grub 'gyur// bdag med 'di rnams de lha mo// yan lag gcig gis rol par byed// sngags kyi bzlas pa mi bya ste// sbyin sreg A ga sogs de bzhin//
168a3(rgyud): ji ltar bde bas rtogs bya ste// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid 'thob 'gyur// 'dod chags kyis ni 'dod chags bsgo// me yis tshig la gdung bar bya// de bzhin 'dod chags kyis 'dod chags// bsten par gyur pas/
168a4(rgyud): mi 'ching ngo // de nyid thabs so yid kyi las// dge ba'i mtshan nyid can bya'o// nang du byed pa ma yin te// gus pa'i yid kyis dbu mar gnas// phyi rol ye shes can rnams kyi ye shes// de nyid sangs
168a5(rgyud): rgyas rdo rje 'chang ba sogs// sems can 'jig rten sogs 'byung ba// de rnams spangs pas sangs rgyas med// mu stegs can dang sangs rgyas par// kun tu dbye ba yod ma yin// lung thams cad ni//
168a6(rgyud): 'gal ba ste// tshad ma pa rnams tho co can// thams cad tshig ni rnam shes pas// ye shes can rnams de'i phyi shes// mkha' 'gro thams cad mnyam sbyor las// nam mkha' rnams su bzhugs pa yi// bcom
168a7(rgyud): ldan 'jig rten 'jig rten par// rtag tu bzhugs pas 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa bcu dgu pa'o// de nas rab tu 'joms yon tan// bshad kyis sgrub pa po rnams
168b1(rgyud): nyon/ nam mkha'i snying po'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje rlung gi mtshan nyid de// chags pa dang ni 'jig rnams su// gang zhig stong pa de srog chags// khams rnams de 'drar shes bya ste// dul ba'i sbyor bar yang /
168b2(rgyud): dag gnas// zla ba'i gzugs su yongs grags pa'i// rang gi rang bzhin las skyes 'dzag/ rnal 'byor lhag ma'i ye shes kyang // de ni rab 'joms la brjod do// dus thams cad du g.yo ba med/
168b3(rgyud): g.yo ba'am 'dir ni mi mthong ngo // de ni thams cad bdag nyid rlung // bsam pa thams cad rab 'jug pa'o// do lA hA ra sogs sbyar bas// rnal 'byor rnams kyi thar ster po// sgra dang thig ler
168b4(rgyud): de shes bya// 'od gsal ba dang snang ba gsum// de phyir nam mkha'i snying po yang // mkha' 'gro'i sbyor rnams kyis shes bya// nang gi dbu ma'i sbyor ba yi// srog de'ang rab tu bsngags pa yin/
168b5(rgyud): de yang kun gzhir shes bya ste// me long du yang rab tu bshad// chos kyi sku la sogs pa'ang de// dmyal sogs 'gro ba de bzhin te// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi// gnas ni rdo rje'i dkyil
168b6(rgyud): 'khor ro// zla ba'i lam du gang tshe mkha'// rnal 'byor rnams kyis lhag med 'pho// de'i dus rnam par gzhag med 'gyur// rnal 'byor byis pas bgrod bya min// nam mkha'i khams rnams
168b7(rgyud): thams cad kyi// de yi snying por rab tu bstan// de dag shes rab thabs gnyis so// gnas skabs kyang ni gnyis nyid do// srid pa rnam par 'phro ba nyid// dbang po'i dbus su sbyar bar bya//
169a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'jig rten mtha' yas rnams// sa yi nang du rtsen par 'gyur// de ltar rnam bcas de nyid dang // rnam pa med pa'i go 'phang bzhugs// sems dang rnam par
169a2(rgyud): shes pa'i rgyun// gnyis po nyid ni gnyis med 'gyur// dbu mar lha rnams kyis 'grub ste// ye shes der 'di rdzogs pa'o// gal te sangs rgyas rjes chags yod// chos dge 'dun la de
169a3(rgyud): bzhin mchog/ gal te mu stegs mkhas pa yi// tshul chen chos de 'dod pa dang // gal te shes rab thabs rnal 'byor// stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid can// gal te thams cad mi rtag bdag
169a4(rgyud): tshul 'di bsgom par bya ba yin// 'dir mang smras pas ci bya ste// chos dbyings gal te 'dod kyang ngo // nam mkha'i snying po'i gzugs can gyi// sangs rgyas sprul pa bsgom par bya// shan pa smyig
169a5(rgyud): ma mkhan la sogs// gsod pa'i don la yongs gnas pa// de kun de'i gnas nyams dga' bar// lam rjes skyob rnams kyi grol 'thob// nges par dkyil 'khor dbus rnams su// gzugs su
169a6(rgyud): bsdoms pa bsgom par bya// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// rmongs pa'i bdag nyid dngos grub 'thob// rnam shes kun gyi sbyor bdag nyid// stong nyid snying po gcig pu pa// bcom ldan rab 'joms rnam
169a7(rgyud): pa yi'i rnal 'byor la bzhugs pas 'di gsungs// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa nyi shu pa'o// / de nas lha mos mchod byas te// phyag byas nas ni 'di gsol to// rang gis rig pa'i
169b1(rgyud): mtshan nyid ni// bcom ldan rdo rjes gsung bar mdzod// rang rig ye shes las byung ba// ji lnga'i rigs pas bshad par bya// dpal he ru ka'i rab sbyor bas// rnal 'byor zla ba'i bgrod pa rang // dkar po'i
169b2(rgyud): tshes gcig la sogs nas// ye shes rgya mtsho 'phel bar 'gyur// thog mar ye shes skye bar 'gyur// gnyis par nam mkhar 'gro ba'i gzugs// gsum par mda' yi dbyibs dang 'dra// bzhi par
169b3(rgyud): 'bem gyi gzugs can no// lnga par rtse mo lnga'i bdag nyid// drug par khams drug 'byung ba yin// bdun par rgya mtsho yi ni gzugs// brgyad par pad+mar brjod pa yin// dgu pa ru ni bcud len te// bcu par
169b4(rgyud): lhan skyes gzugs kyis so// bcu gcig pa la zhi ba'i gzugs// bcu gnyis pa la 'khor lo'i gzugs// bcu gsum pa la nyi ma ste// bcu bzhir zla ba de bzhin no// bco lnga pa nyid rA hu ste// thig le/
169b5(rgyud): zhes byas bcu drug pa// rnam pa bcu drug mtshan nyid ni// rang gis rig par shes par bya// dpal he ru ka'i sbyor ba yis// 'khor lo bzhi rnams su bsgrub bya// rgas pa med cing 'chi ba med// nad dang /
169b6(rgyud): mdze sogs spangs pa yin// lte bar shrI yi yi ger 'gyur// he yig snying khar dgod par bya// ru yig mgrin pa'i 'khor lo ste// thod par ka yi yi ge'o// thig le bzhi yi rab sbyor bas/
169b7(rgyud): rang gis rig par 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid rnam pa bcu drug ni// rnal 'byor rnams kyi mchog zag me// gnas dang gnas su 'pho ba nyid// dbu ma'i nang du rab tu gzhug/ 'khor lo bzhi yi//
170a1(rgyud): 'dab son nas// rang gis rig pa mtha' yas mchog/ rigs de rnal 'byor ma rnams kyir// byung bar rnam par shes par bya// sems chen po ni sang bzhin pas// don
170a2(rgyud): yod mthong bas 'thob par 'gyur// rtag tu rmi lam du 'gyur te// dus thams cad du nges par gnas// longs spyod sprul pa'i mtshan nyid du// gnyid log pa yis de tshe mthong // bzhi pa rab mang
170a3(rgyud): bdag med de// de phyir de rnams mtha'i longs spyod// de ltar 'khor lo bzhir gnas nas// nges par lam du 'gro bar 'gyur// shes rab de nyid rtogs byas nas// nyi mas thabs kyi de nyid can/
170a4(rgyud): rdul gyi sbyor ba 'byung ba ste// nag po'i phyogs su gang 'dir yang // bcu drug rnams kyi cha rnams kyi// nyi ma nyid ni bar bar du'o// stong nyid snying rje'i sbyor ba las// rdo rje 'bar ba 'bar zhing 'bar//
170a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i dbus rnams su// dpal he ru ka bsam par bya// mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag ldan// rdo rje'i dga' bar 'gro bar 'gyur// gnas skabs thams cad yang dag sbyor/
170a6(rgyud): gtso bo rang rig bdag nyid can// bcom ldan 'das pa'i bzhi pa'i mthar// rtag tu bzhugs pas 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// /
170a7(rgyud): de nas lus sogs lha rnams kyi// ston mo mngon par bshad par bya// pad+ma gar dbang phyug nyid kyi// rab tu sbyor ba 'di byung ngo // rtsa ni pad+mar yang dag grags// srog gi rlung gis gar byed de/
170b1(rgyud): byang chub sems kyi dbang phyug ste// de rnams kyi ni nang du bzhugs// rang gis rigs pa bza' bar bya// snying rje'i kha yis btung bar bya// gnyis med rnal 'byor ma dang rol// sgyu ma'i
170b2(rgyud): rjes su 'gro rnams 'grub// thams cad de yi rang bzhin du// bza' ba bza' ba med par bya// pad+ma gar dbang bsgom bya ste// ji lta'i rim pas mtshon par bya// pa yig gzhan gyi grong du/
170b3(rgyud): 'gro brtan pa thams cad tam yig sa// na yig g.yo ba'i rnal 'byor te// te yig bde ba'i lha can yin// shA yig rta la sogs pa'i stobs// ra yig dga' rol rgyu can yin// srid dang mya
170b4(rgyud): ngan 'das kun la// de yis rab tu sbyor bar bya// mtshams kyi skad ni 'di rnams kun// bde mchog phyi mar shes par bya// bgrod pa 'di rnams la brten nas// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug rang // he ru ka
170b5(rgyud): dang bde mchog nyid// rdo rje sems dpa' sogs gtso bo// pad+ma gar dbang phyug de yang // sbyor ba kun la shes par bya// pad+ma ye shes yang dag grags// gar gyi dbang phyug rnam shes can// gnyis
170b6(rgyud): po gnyis med yang dag byung // lha kun 'dir ni byung ba yin// shes po thams cad de la gnas// khams gsum du ni gar dbang phyug/ gar byed pa yi sku chen la// de nas rtags ni mtshon par bya//
170b7(rgyud): nam mkha' zhen pa'i sbyor ba yis// mchog tu rmad du byung bar 'gro// rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo dbus su// lhan skyes gzugs kyis rol bar gyis// 'di yis rtag tu dbang gi las// de rnam
171a1(rgyud): kyis ni dga' bar byed// gang dang gang gi las rnams la// de dang de yir bsgom par bya// sgrub po rnams kyi byang chub rtser// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du 'ong // de nas bdud
171a2(rgyud): ni bcom byas nas// gar byed bzhin pas pad+ma 'dzin// sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms shing // tshe son pa rnams gnas par byed// 'dod pa thams cad 'grub 'gyur zhing // rnal 'byor rnams kyi srid pa
171a3(rgyud): sbyong/ rang gi sems kyis dngos grub 'thob// rnam rtog nyid du mi bya'o// gzhan du srid pa'i sbyor bdag nyid// sems can thams cad rab 'jug pa// 'khrul zhing chud zos mu stegs rnams// bstan pa
171a4(rgyud): rnams la rab 'jug bya// bag chags ngan pa yongs spangs nas// phyi nas rang bzhin bstan par bya// bza' ba thams cad mnyam sbyor las// bza' ba med par rtag tu gnas// bcom ldan pad+ma gar mdzad
171a5(rgyud): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi// mtshan nyid bshad kyis lha mo nyon// gzugs las/
171a6(rgyud): 'das pa'i ye shes gang // de ni shes rab chen por brjod// rnam par snang bzhin pa de bzhin// sems dpa' chen po'i ming can no// spu khung rtse mo thams cad las// de rnams nges 'thon stobs chen po// de
171a7(rgyud): rnams bu gar rab zhugs pa// 'khor lo bzhi yi mtsho skyes son// ji ltar mar la mar zhugs pa// de bzhin du ni khams la zhugs// g.yo ba'i 'gog par byas pa yis// de 'drar thams cad mthong bar
171b1(rgyud): 'gyur// gang mthong ba ni de mthong nyid// gdong gis gdong ni blta bar gyis// mi dang mi mo lha sogs kyi// gzugs ni bad+hA'i 'dab chu bzhin// srog chen po der shes bya ste// shi ba'i dus las nges/
171b2(rgyud): par 'thon// a~M gi yi ge yid la bya// dbugs rgyu ba yis mtshon par bya// bdag nyid kyis ni hUM yig s+ho// gsor ba yin rnal 'byor ldan// sems la oM gyi yi ger 'gyur// lus la gnas
171b3(rgyud): par mtshon par bya// haM yig mchog gi dang po yis// ye shes dngos po rnams su sprul// chos kyi dbyings rnams kyi dbus su// rnam snang mdzad kyi sgom pa'o// bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'dzag pa
171b4(rgyud): rnams kyis// sngags pa la ni 'bar bar bya// bye ba stong phrag grangs kyi ni// rnal 'byor ma la 'dod spyod 'gyur// 'dod pa rnams kyis mi 'pho ste// 'dod na bde ba rnam par spro// de tshe rnal 'byor
171b5(rgyud): ma mnyes nas// dngos grub thams cad ster bar byed// sdug dang mi sdug rnam spyod pa// rnal 'byor ma la mi bya'o// myur bar stong phrag rnams kyi gzugs// rnam par snang mdzad du bsgrub bya//
171b6(rgyud): tshogs du ma'i skad kyis chos// de rnams lus ris can gyis nyon// rnam snang mdzod dang mi bskyod dang // rin chen dbang dang A ro li ka/ don yod rdo rje sems dpa' dang // rgyu yi rdo rje 'chang la sogs/
171b7(rgyud): shes rab pha rol phyin sogs kyi// de rnams rnal 'byor ma las rig/ 'gro drug grol bar byed nyid dang // bde 'gro rnams su 'jug pa po// blo ldan so sor sems can don// gnyis med dngos por byed
172a1(rgyud): par 'gyur// mi shes nyon mongs gzhom don du// tshul 'di yang ni bsgom par bya// khams thams cad kyi til mar ni// dogs pa med pas bya ba yin// rnam snang sbyor bas btung /
172a2(rgyud): bya 'am// byug pa'ang de nyid kyis bya'o// de yis bsnun nas sbyin par bya// rdo rje'i lam du rtag tu'o// rdo rje 'chang gi gzugs su 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi yid 'ong // gnyis pa thams cad kun
172a3(rgyud): sbyor las// rnal 'byor mas 'dod thar pa stso la// bcom ldan thams cad dag pa'i sku// rab grol mdzad pa 'di gsungs so// zhes bya ba ni rab tu byed pa nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o//
172a4(rgyud): de nas gsang chen bshad bya ste// mdor bsdus pa yis rgyas par min// rdo rje sems dpa'i rab sbyor bas// gnas thams cad du yang dag bzhugs// rdo rje mi phyed ye shes te// sems dpa' snying po
172a5(rgyud): ston pa'o// stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa// snying rje sems dpar rab tu grags// zla ba rdo rje'i rab sbyor bas// gnas rnams bgrod pa bston par bya// pu li raM las lte bar 'bab// dzA lan+ta rar yang
172a6(rgyud): dag gnas// oM r+yan du ni kun tu spyod// ar pur bza' dang btung can no// go dA ba rir rol pa ste// rA me shwa rir rgyal dang pham// de bi ko Ti ri rjes su 'dzin// mA la war rnal 'byor ma'i gtso// kA ma
172a7(rgyud): rU par tshig 'grub bo// oM trer mngon sum dngos grub ster// tri sha ku ner dbang rnams kyi// myur du dngos grub rab tu 'jug/ ko sa lar rnal 'byor dngos grub ster// ka ling kar phra mo'i dngos grub skye/
172b1(rgyud): lam pa ka ru rtag par 'grub// kAny+tsir gsang ba'i dngos grub bo// hi ma la yir mthun pa 'grub// pre ta pu rir rang gi wA ga/ gri ha de ba tar bkas gnang ba// lhan skyes 'pho med so raSh+Ta ra// gser
172b2(rgyud): gling du ni rang don 'grub// nA ga rer gnas kyi dngos grub ster// sin+d+hur stobs 'grub de bzhin du// ma rur 'chi med dngos grub bo// ku lu tar rang bzhin dngos grub tu// de nyid rnal 'byor rnams
172b3(rgyud): la skye rdo rje sems dpa' rtag bsgoms nas// thams cad dngos grub 'gro bar byos// gnas sogs rnal 'byor ma dbus su// khams su gyur pa'i ro chen po// gsang ba'i mchog tu shes
172b4(rgyud): bar bya// mchog ni lhan cig skyes par dran// dgyes pa ye shes shes bya ste// thams cad bdag nyid yon tan gnas// rtag bzhugs gnyis med rnam pa ste// sems can 'jig rten las
172b5(rgyud): ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid kyis// nA da'i dbus las yang dag byung // de nyid du ni thim nas 'gro// gnas par de ni mngon par brjod// de ltar thams cad cho ga
172b6(rgyud): bzhin// dpa' bo mchog rnams kyis shes bya// de nyid nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bdag/ de ni nus par rab tu bshad// skyes pa dang ni skye bzhin pa'i// nus pa thams cad rab 'jug gis// dngos med ma
172b7(rgyud): min pa'i gzugs kyis// dbyangs dang phyi mo gsum spangs pa// thig le'i gzugs ni sems dpa' che// rdo rje sems dpar rab tu grags// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rnal 'byor ma
173a1(rgyud): rnams kun gyi gtso// sgyu ma'i gnas kyi dngos grub ni// 'jug mdzad bcom ldan gyis 'di gsungs// zhes bya ba ni gnas thams cad kyi bdag nyid can gyi rab tu byed pa ste
173a2(rgyud): shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de ltar dpa' bo gtso bo yi// las kyi tshogs rnams shes par bya// nyi shu bzhi bdag nyid nyams dga'// thams cad gas chen gyi gnas su// gsang chen
173a3(rgyud): rgyas par bshad pa can// kun spyod cho ga bshad par bya// sngon bshad khams kyi 'du shes ni// gsum gsum du ni bshad pa yin// nyi shu rtsa bzhi gsum rnam can// de rnams brgyad brgyad shes par bya//
173a4(rgyud): dpa' bo nyi shu bzhi rnams kyi// re re'i nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste// zlum po'i rnam pa'i rnal 'byor du// thig le nyid ni gzhag par bya// de rnams dkyil 'khor phyi rol tu// bskor bas ting 'dzin rdo rjer 'gyur/
173a5(rgyud): shar la sogs pa rim bzhin du// rdo rje'i 'khor lo sogs par 'pho// dkyil 'khor du ni lha thams cad// rnal 'byor ma kun shes par bya// bdun cu drug lhag pa'i lnga brgya// nyin zhag rnams su yongs
173a6(rgyud): 'pho bya// re re yi ni srog 'gyur ba// sum cu rtsa bdun phyed bcas pa'o// nyi khri brgya phrag bcu drug ni// nyin zhag la ni shes par bya// lus can kun gyi rang bsam pa// de rnams kyi dus rab tu 'jug/ rnal
173a7(rgyud): 'byor de dngos bsgoms rnams la// sangs rgyas bsam pa rab tu bskor// 'di rnams kun nyid dpa' bo rnams// gnas sogs nyi shu bzhi can la// thim dang longs spyod bdag byed pas// dus dang
173b1(rgyud): dus chod za bar byed// 'di lta'i cho ga'i bya ba yis// kun tu gnas pa bdag ma yin// rnal 'byor mtshogs dang dpa' bo// de ni bdag dang bdag gi rim bzhin no// sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad/
173b2(rgyud): dung bdag dang bdag gi spyod yul med// yid ches tsam du myang 'das pa// gzhung smra ba la bstan pa'o// de kho na nyid ma rig pa yis 'jig rten rmongs// de kho na nyid rnam par spangs pas dngos grub
173b3(rgyud): mi thob bo// rnal 'byor rnams la rgyud rgyal du// de dang de yis mchog ye shes// 'od gsal sgyu ma bdag gis ni// sgyu ma'i 'jig rten la bshad do// kye lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gcig
173b4(rgyud): pur bstan// lha dang lha min sa gsum 'joms pa la phyag tshol// dbang po dang ni 'jig rten pa yis mi shes te// mchog tu bde ba chen po'i glu yis mchod par gyis// gang zhig las thams
173b5(rgyud): cad pa'i gzugs su bsgom par byos// srid dang mya ngan 'das par ston pa ga la ci// sgyu ma gti mug gis ni ri mor gnas// sems can theg pa da dung nyams par ga la byed// de ltar yongs su//
173b6(rgyud): dgyes pa'i mgur// bcom ldan rang nyid kyis gsungs so// de nyid dkyil 'khor rnams dang ni// byang chub dus su blang bar gyis// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems
173b7(rgyud): dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// 'di ni dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/
174a1(rgyud): de kho na nyid nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag nyid rgyud thams cad kyi don ston pa po gsang chen thams cad pa zhe bya ba'i le'u ste le'u lnga bcu pa'o// / de nas
174a2(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma dpa' bo// rnam pa du ma'i 'khor gyis kyang // rdo rje mkha' 'gro khyab pa'i bdag/ bcom ldan bdag po la bstod pa// khyod ni 'dod chags chen po'i tshul// dngos dang dngos med rang /
174a3(rgyud): bzhin can// dag pa'i rang bzhin gyi ni gzugs// chos rnams bstan pas tshim par 'gyur// chos dang chos min pa yi gzugs// chos dang chos pa khyod gnyis med// bdag gis sprul pa'i
174a4(rgyud): dngos po yis// 'jig rten kun gyi'ang don can te// bdag nyid chen po ster ba po// sangs rgyas 'jig rten 'jug byed pa// khyod kyis dam tshig bstan pa ste// gzhan min dam tshig nyid las byung /
174a5(rgyud): bdag gis bsod nams rjes bsgoms pas// byang chub tu ni yid bsgrubs so// ston pa mchog tu bde la bzhugs// de yis sems can don mdzad pa'i// hUM gi yi ge'i sgra sgrogs pas// nga rgyal
174a6(rgyud): can gyi bgegs skrag 'gyur// khyod kyis nye bar bsten pas ni// de rnams la ni skye 'chi med// bde ba'i rgyal po nyid du rtsen// byang chub kyi ni yid du bgrod// khyod dang thabs cig 'dres par 'gyur//
174a7(rgyud): gong bu gcig tu gnyis med bzhugs// de ltar bstod pas rdo rje che// mchod pa bzhi ni rab ston mdzad// dkyil 'khor bdag dang gnyis med nyid// mchod pa rnams ni gnyis med byed// phyi dang /
174b1(rgyud): nang bdag nyid can rdzas// gnyis pa yi ni mchod par dran// bza' dang btung sogs la rol pa// gnyis med mchod pa gsum pa'o// bzhi pa chos dang rnal 'byor dag / 'dzin pa yi ni mchod/
174b2(rgyud): pa'o/ de lha'i mchod pa la brten nas// thams cad byas pas las rgyal por// 'gyur ro rdo rje mkha' 'gro ni// gru gsum du ni mnyes bya ste// sngon du dkyil 'khor byas nas ni// lag pa g.yon
174b3(rgyud): pas thams cad du// pad+ma yi ni bskor nas snod// sngags pa rnams kyis gzung bar bya// sngon du rnal 'byor ma la ni// skra grol ba yis gtor ma sbyin// rnal 'byor ma kun chu skyes ni// kha yis/
174b4(rgyud): bzung nas dkrug par bya// de yi lag par son pa'i dpal// gang su yis kyang dbrog mi nus// ji ltar bde bas bde ba gzung // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog mnyes bya// rtag tu dam tshig
174b5(rgyud): bskyang bar bya// spun gyi spyod pa'ang bsten par bya// snying rje'i mchog dbang gyur bya zhing // dbang po rnams ni mi rtag par// bsgom bya snang ba med pa yis// rang bzhin dbang du gyur par gnas/
174b6(rgyud): rdo rje pad+ma snyoms 'jug pas// phyag rgya nang gi bdag nyid mchog/ stong nyid gnyis med rnal 'byor pas// dngos po thams cad spang bar bya// don dam can de nyid 'dir bya// rtag tu byang chub sems
174b7(rgyud): dran bya// man ngag gcig ni bsgoms pa yis// man ngag thams cad mtshon par bya// ji ltar sa gcig thob pa yis// sa thams cad ni 'thob par 'gyur// de bzhin man ngag thams cad kyang // man
175a1(rgyud): ngag gcig gis 'thob par 'gyur// byis pa rnams dang rgan po dang // rnal 'byor ma rnams thams cad du// mnyam pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga yis// mkhas pa yis ni bya/
175a2(rgyud): ba yin// mi mnyam pa yis dngos grub 'joms// dmyal ba la sogs lhung bar 'gyur// rgan po yon tan kun gnas pa// de rnams mnyes pas byang chub ster// khyad par mchod pa nyid ni
175a3(rgyud): 'dir// byis pa rnams dang de bzhin yang // gnyis bcas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis// me tog bskor ba la sogs bya// kun tu smod pa'i ngag mi bya// 'dod dang 'dod min sbyor bral bya// ma byin par/
175a4(rgyud): yang blang bya zhing // rtag tu srog chags gsad par bya// sems can rnams la brdzun spa zhing // ma sogs rnal 'byor ma la bgrod// 'khor lo mchod pa rgyun du bya// bza' bya lnga la sogs pa sbyin/
175a5(rgyud): de yi bsod nams kyis 'thob pa// dus thams cad du bgegs med dang // grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma mthong bas// bsam pa gzhan ni rab tu 'jug/ dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems
175a6(rgyud): dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las// bstod pa dang /
175a7(rgyud): mchod pa bzhi la sogs pa gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste lnga bcu rtsa gcig pa'o// // rgyud 'di rab tu byung ba ni// ma byung 'byung bar mi
175b1(rgyud): 'gyur ro// mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs// mtshan nyid med pa thams cad spangs// sum cu bdun bdag nyid rnal 'byor// gnyis med mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho dang gnyis med// rtsa ba'i rgyud ni/
175b2(rgyud): rgyud chen po// 'dus pa'i rnam pa'i gzugs can te// sangs rgyas byang chub sems rnams kyi// dus thams cad du zhal na gnas// yi ge kun gyi za ma tog/ 'bum phrag sum cu drug dang po//
175b3(rgyud): mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rab bshad de// chen po chung ngur gsungs pa'o// ri rab kyi ni rdul tshad kyi// mkha' 'gro thams cad kyis gsungs so// mtha' yas shing ni mu med nyid// rtsod pa'i dus kyis
