175b4(rgyud): nang du// bcom ldan mtha' yas pas 'di gsungs// shAkya seng ges gsungs pa'i rgyud// rnal 'byor pha rol son pa'o// nyan pa ston pa rang nyid de// 'chad po skye bo gzhan yang ngo //
175b5(rgyud): legs par gsungs dang 'chad 'gyur ba'i// de'i rang bzhin du'ang bgrod par 'gyur// bsdu ba mdzad pa sogs rnams kyis// bdag las bgrod pa de thob bo// ma mo thams cad 'dus rnams kyis//
175b6(rgyud): rdo rje'i gnas rnams su bsdus so// gcig la gcig gis bzhed pa ni// gsol ba 'debs shing gsol 'debs mdzad// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa yi// tshig 'di la ni mngon par
175b7(rgyud): dga'// sdig pa rnams las grol bar 'gro// srid pa las ni 'gro bar byos// dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor las// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro de bzhin
176a1(rgyud): gshegs// bcom ldan bdag pos 'di gsungs so// dpal mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las/ rgya mtsho drug la sogs pa la rnal 'byor
176a2(rgyud): dang / ye shes dang / sdom pa dang / bya ba dang / de kho na nyid rgya mtshor gyur pa dang / mkha' 'gro rgya mtsho las 'di rnams dang mi mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
176a3(rgyud): dpal bal yul grub pa'i gnas chen po yu tung lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag khang chen por rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po rdo rje slob dpon rtog ge ba rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bu dus ding sang 'gran zla
176a4(rgyud): med pa// snying rje chen pos thugs brlan pa'i ngang tshul can/ phyogs sna tshogs nas 'dus pa'i skye 'gro rnams la chos dang zang zing gi char gyis tshim par mdzad pa/ dpal rdo rje phag mo'i
176a5(rgyud): zhabs kyi chu skyes kyi rdul la reg pa shAkya'i sras po rgyal ba'i sde'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba shAkya'i dge slong d+harma yon tan gyis mnyan cing bsgyur ba'o// phyis gang zag chos
176a6(rgyud): kyi spyan can dpal mchog dang po'i rdo rje'i bka'i tshul dang yang bstun te zhus gtugs legs par byas so// mkha' mnyam bde rdzogs sna tshogs sprul pa sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku/
176a7(rgyud): des gsungs dri med sna tshogs gdul bya'i bsam dbang gis// gsung gcig gis kyang sna tshogs don mang ston pas dpyad pa dka'// de ltar yin yang ji ltar mi bdag shing rta char
176b1(rgyud): zhugs nas// g.yul ngor 'jug dus rkang gis bgrong rnams 'thab par mi brtson nam// de bzhin sngon gyi mkhas pa chen po rnams kyi rjes 'brangs nas// kho bos gzhan don nus min//
176b2(rgyud): na yang phan pa'i bsam pas bsgyur// 'di la gzhung dang bla ma rang gi blo gros skyon gyis ni// sgra don 'gul bar gyur pa bcom ldan dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams dang // mkha' 'a
176b3(rgyud): tshogs dang bstan dga'i lha rnams mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod par rigs// 'di las thob pa'i dge ba dri med cung zad des// 'gro kun rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang thob gyur cig/ bdag gis
176b4(rgyud): srol btod tsam 'di la// sgra don 'jug pa mkhyen rnams kyis// skad gnyis smra bas gzigs pa na// skyon du gyur snang bcos par zhu// phrag dog sgo nas mi 'phya zhing // rjes su yi rang ba/
176b5(rgyud): yang mdzad// rdzogs so// // rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA saM ba ro da ya tan+da rA dza s+ya nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal bde mchog sdom pa 'byung ba zhes bya/
176b6(rgyud): ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs/
176b7(rgyud): rdo rje'i btsun ma'i b+ha ga la bzhugs te/ 'phags pa dga' bo la sogs pa 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyis bskor cing / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi/
177a1(rgyud): dbang phyug bye ba phrag brgyad cu'i dbus su phyag na rdo rje la gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad pa dang / phyag na rdo rje stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo//
177a2(rgyud): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ lag pa thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ kye rnam pa kun mchog sdom pa yi// bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor mtshan nyid dang // rdzogs
177a3(rgyud): pa yang ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan lha las mnyan par 'tshal// rlung dang me dang chu dang sa// de bzhin nam mkha' ji ltar lags// rnam pa lnga ni ji ltar lha// gtso bo yul drug de bzhin ci// phyi dang /
177a4(rgyud): nang du gnas pa yi// sku gsum byin rlabs ji lta bu// lha yi sku ni ji ltar lags// gtso bos de bzhin lha mo gsungs// zla ba nyi ma ci zhig lha// lam lnga po ni ji ltar lags// lus kyi rang bzhin ji/
177a5(rgyud): lta bur de bzhin rtsa yi gzugs ni ci// rtsa yi grangs kyi tshad ni du// de bzhin lus kyi gong bu ci// sbas pa'i dam tshig gi ni bde// gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol// phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi//
177a6(rgyud): gnas la sogs pa'i brda du zhig/ ji ltar sa la sogs pa 'thob// mtshan ma ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur// khyed kyi las ni bcu gnyis gang // sngags kyi bzlas pa ji ltar 'gyur// bgrang 'phreng dag
177a7(rgyud): ni ji ltar rigs// bzlas pa'i grangs ni du zhig lags// lha yi rnam pa'i rnal 'byor ci// dkyil 'khor bri ba du zhig mchis// sngags kyi dngos grub ci zhig lha// gzhon nu ma yi mchod pa ci/ byang/
177b1(rgyud): bya min nyi ma gang // gtso bo myos byed gtor ma ci// bdud rtsi lnga sogs ji ltar lha// lcags kyu lnga sogs ji ltar 'gyur// dkyil 'khor bri ba bshad du gsol// thig gdab pa ni ji ltar 'gyur/
177b2(rgyud): ji ltar sa ni yongs su sbyang // srung ba'i 'khor lo ji ltar 'gyur// slob dpon gyi ni bya ba gang // ji ltar slob ma yongs su bzung // dbang bskur ba yi grangs ni du// bzhi pa yang ni ji ltar 'gyur//
177b3(rgyud): dus kyi nges pa ji lta bu// de bzhin 'chi ba bslu ba gang // dus bzhi'i ming ni du zhig mchis// gling bzhi pa ni ji ltar lags// dus dang dus min dngos grub ci// spyod pa ji ltar spyad par bgyi// rnal 'byor
177b4(rgyud): ma yi rgyud du ni// rnal 'byor rgyud ni ji ltar 'gyur// mdo sde'i grangs ni ji lta bu// de bzhin pha rol phyin pa du// rab gnas sbyin sreg mchod sbyin dang // sngags kyi dngos grub ji ltar 'gyur// bcud
177b5(rgyud): kyis lan ni ji ltar lha// myos byed btung ba ji ltar 'gyur// gsang sngags ji ltar 'byung 'gyur lha// sngags btu ba ni ji ltar 'gyur// tshar gcad pa ni ci zhig lha// gtso bo rjes gzung ji lta bu/
177b6(rgyud): bcom ldan de nyid rnams ni ci// stong pa nyid kyi snying rje gang // stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ci// ji ltar de bzhin nyid rang bzhin// chos rnams thams cad yongs shes pa'i// sgom pa'i mtshan nyid gtso//
177b7(rgyud): bos gsungs// dpal bde mchog 'byung ba'i rgyud las zhus pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje gsang ba 'byung ba 'di zhus pa/
178a1(rgyud): legs so legs so// de nas de'i phyir bskyed pa yi// rim pa'i sgom pa yang dag bshad// sna tshogs las kyi rang bzhin gyis// skye gnas bzhi po rnams su 'gyur/
178a2(rgyud): sgong skyes mngal nas skyes pa dang // drod gsher dang ni rdzus skyes rnams// ngang pa khrung khrung rma bya dang // ne tso bzhad tshogs sgong skyes te// glang po ma he ba lang rta// bung bu mi sogs mngal nas
178a3(rgyud): skyes srin bu 'bu dang phye ma leg/ nya la sogs pa drod gsher skyes// lha dang dmyal ba'i sems can rnams// de bzhin par de'i srid pa dang // bskal pa dang po la la sogs// 'di rnams rdzus
178a4(rgyud): skyes sems can no// shar gyi lus 'phags pa lang spyod// de bzhin byang gi sgra mi snyan// gling gsum po yi mi rnams ni// longs spyod chen pos yang dag 'tsho// blun rmongs bye brag mi phyed cing //
178a5(rgyud): rtog med rnam par spyod med pa'o// 'dzam bu'i gling du logs skyes pa// las kyi sa par rab tu grags// legs byas nyes par byas pa'i las// mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma rnams// skye ba
178a6(rgyud): sngon gyi rnam smin 'dir// skye bo rnams la snang bar 'gyur// rgyags dang ser sna gadrug sems rnams// g.yo sku mngon pa'i ngartsal dang // chags spang gti mug la sogs kyis// rims dang /
178a7(rgyud): mang la sogs pas gdir// mang ma du mang po'i gtso bo mchog/ yul dbus su ni skyes pa rtse// sngon gyi dag pal bskos nas// dbang pa rno 'bring hrul por 'gyur/ mi du skyes pa 'bras bum
178b1(rgyud): dam pa dang po ste// rang gi khyim nas nges 'byung rnyed pa gnyis pa yin// rab tu byung nas dge ba bsgrub pa gsum pa ste// rtse gcig yid ni thob par gyur pa bzhi par gsungs// sgyum lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin/
178b2(rgyud): mi rnams kyis rab mi shes te// thog med dus kyi nyon mongs kyi// bag chags rab tu bsags byas pas// de phyir sngon byas las kyis ni// skye dang 'chi ba yang dag 'byung // tshogs pa ma rnyed de srid du/
178b3(rgyud): zhag bdun par ngo'i srid par gnas// srid pa bar de'i sems can ni// 'gron po'i bgrod pa ji bzhin du// 'di ltar las kyi zhags pa yis// 'gro ba drug tu rab tu skye// pha ma'i kun tu sbyor sogs ni// srid pa'i
178b4(rgyud): skye bos mthong gyur nas// rtal zhon bzhin rnam shes ni// rlung gi bzhon pa zhon nas su// skad cig thang cig nyid la ni// shin tu myur bar 'ongs gyur na// shin tu dga' dang bcas stobs kyis// kha yi lam
178b5(rgyud): nas 'jug par 'gyur// rtsa ni stong phrag bdun cu gnyis// rab bskul de yi skad cig la// A li kA li zhu byas pas// mchog tu dga' ba yang dag thob// khu ba khrag de'i dbus su ni// thig le'i gzugs kyis
178b6(rgyud): yang dag gnas// dang po'i rnam par nur nur po// mer mer po ni gnyis pa yin// ltar ltar por skyes gsum pa ste// de bzhin bzhi pa gor gor po// rlung rnams kyis ni bskul tsam gyis// sha yi rnam pa lha/
178b7(rgyud): bur 'gyur// zla ba lnga gyur sa bon las// yan lag lnga ni rab tu skye// zla ba bdun na sgra dang spu// sen mo rtags ni skye bar 'gyur// zla ba brgyad na dbang po dang // lus kyi yan lag 'byung bar 'gyur//
179a1(rgyud): zla ba dgun yang dag rdzogs// zla ba btsun sems dang ldan// nur nur rang bzhin mo bskyod pa// mer mer po ni rin chen 'byung // 'od dpag med mgon ltar lhur ro// gor gong/
179a2(rgyud): ni don yod grub// mkhrang 'gyur rnam par snang mdzad de// rnam pa lngar ni bstan pa yin// dri chu khrag ni mi bskyod pa// sa bon rang bzhin 'od dpag med// gong bu rin chen 'byung ldan te// ro gcig 'dras
179a3(rgyud): pa rnam snang bzhugs// skye gnas dbus su rtsa gnyis ni// g.yas dang g.yon na de bzhin gnas// g.yon na khu ba zhes bshad de// g.yas na de bzhin khrag yin no// de dag gcig tu 'dus gyur pa// chos
179a4(rgyud): kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no// las kyi sa bon dbang thob pas// rlung gis yang dag bsgyur nas su// chos kyi 'byung gnas sgo ru ni// gdong ni nges par phyogs par 'gyur// dku g.yas su ni brten nas
179a5(rgyud): su tsog pur mngon par phyogs te gnas// dku g.yon yang dag brten nas ni// shes rab lhor ni mngon phyogs 'gyur// mkhas pas sa bon lhung ba'i rim// dus kyi skad cig yang dag mtshon//
179a6(rgyud): g.yas nas rlung ni rgyu ba gang // thams cad du ni skyes bur 'gyur// g.yon nas rlung ni rgyu ba gang // nges par bud med rnams su 'gyur// gnyis ka'i dbus rgyu'i sa bon gang // rtag tu ma ning 'gyur ba'o// chu
179a7(rgyud): khams pa yir shes par bya// me yi khams ni ma yi'o// pags pa sha dang khrag rnams ni// ma las skyes shes bshad pa ste// rgyus pa rkang dang khu ba rnams// pha las skyes shes bshad pa yin//
179b1(rgyud): drug po 'di dag bsdus pa'i lus// rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa// gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang // 'du byed rnam shes de bzhin te// sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin du// phung po nges par//
179b2(rgyud): skye ba yin// srid pa bskyed pa'i rim shes pas// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob bya'i phyir// 'di ni phung po yongs mkhyen pa'i// de nyid gsungs pa rnams kyis bshad// 'di ni bskyed pa'i rim
179b3(rgyud): pa nges par bstan pa'i rim par dbye ba ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas gang zhig shes tsam gyis// myur du dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'i// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sgom pa ni/
179b4(rgyud): yang dag rab tu bshad par bya// lus kyi dkyil 'khor la brten nas// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim bsgrubs pas// lus kyi dkyil 'khor zhes gsungs so//
179b5(rgyud): dbang po dman pas bskyed rim gyi// dkyil 'khor sgom zhing bsam par bya// dbang po rnon pos skad cig ni// rnam pa sems tsam dkyil 'khor bsam// skad cig rnam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// rdzogs
179b6(rgyud): pa'i rim pa bsgoms pa ni// khams gsum gzhal yas khang bdag nyid// srog chags rnams ni dkyil 'khor pa// de dbus skad cig rnam pa yis// dkyil 'khor bdag po rnal 'byor pa'o//
179b7(rgyud): oM AHhUM gi sngags kyis ni// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor te// mtho ris sa steng sa 'og tu// skad cig gis ni sku gcig 'gyur// skad cig rnam pas rnal 'byor te// skad cig rnam pas
180a1(rgyud): gsang sngags 'don// dbang po kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde ba mchog/ khams bzhi pa dang phung po lnga// de bzhin yul drug bdag nyid ni// khrag 'thung //
180a2(rgyud): lha mo'i ye shes te// de la tha dad mi brtag go// dkyil 'khor de bzhin nyid rgyas btab// de bzhin mkha' mnyam stong pa nyid// sna tshogs de bzhin nyid bdag nyid// thabs ni snying rje'i stobs yin te//
180a3(rgyud): zung du 'jug pa rnam rtog bral// dkyil 'khor snying po mchog yin no// rnam par mi rtog sbyor bsams kyang // de tshe mi rtog bsam mi khyab// de yang rnam pa kun gyi mchog/ bde ba'i dbang po rnam pa//
180a4(rgyud): med 'di nyid dngos dang dngos min bdag/ rtag tu srid pas 'byung bar mdzad// sna tshogs spros pa'i rtog pa med// rtag tu 'byung ba bde ba che// skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin gyis// de las skye ba yang
180a5(rgyud): dag 'byung // bems po min phyir bdag nyid rig/ mi shes rnam par mi mthong bas// gzugs med gang du'ang mi gnas shing // 'gyur ba med cing brtan pa'o// kun rdzob skye ba 'byung bas ni// chad
180a6(rgyud): pa min phyir dngos med min// lhan cig skyes dga' rang dngos su// chos rnams thams cad lhan cig skyes// bdag byin brlabs pa rang byung ba// mi shigs 'jig pa med pa ste// skye ba med pa'i ro myong /
180a7(rgyud): bas sgom pa yang ni de nyid de// stong nyid so sor rtogs pas na// bsam gtan shes rab tu yang 'gyur// chos kun yongs su shes pa yi// sgom pa de nyid sgom med pa'o// rdzogs pa'i byang
180b1(rgyud): chub bde ba che// phyag rgya chen po mchog de bzhin// de nyid chos la 'jug pa'i phyir// de rnams dbye bas rab bstan pa// tha ma dam pa'i man ngag gis// gsal bar 'gyur gyi gzhan du min// sangs rgyas/
180b2(rgyud): kun gyi sdom pa ni// e waM yi ge la rab gnas// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi las// rnam kun mchog gi sdom pa'o// sdom pa byang chub bde mchog ste// bltar med brjod du med pa'o// sangs rgyas
180b3(rgyud): kun gyi gsang ba ni// 'dus pa chen po'i mchog yin te// bdag byin rlab pa'i rim pa 'di// bla ma'i drin gyis gsal bar 'gyur// 'di ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba
180b4(rgyud): ste gsum pa'o// // de nas de phyir 'byung ba bzhi'i// mtshan nyid yang dag bshad par bya// dngos po dag ni ma lus gang // de ni 'byung ba'i rang bzhin te// sa de la ni
180b5(rgyud): dngos po rten// mes ni thams cad 'tshed par byed// chu yis 'ju bar byed pa ste// rlung gis lhan cig spyod par byed// nam mkha' yul gyis stong par gnas// der ni thams cad de las skyes/
180b6(rgyud): gang du gcig ni gnas pa der// bzhi po kun kyang nye bar gnas// rtswa shing ljon pa 'khri shing sogs// bems po lta bu'i rnam shes tsam// gang dag 'gro drug sems can rnams// rnam shes bcas pa/
180b7(rgyud): lta bur gnas// de ltar srid pa'i dngos po kun// blo dang ldan pas shes par bya// sems can rnams ni 'chi ba na// yan lag nyid lag thams cad kyi// rlung ni thams cad skyod par 'gyur// skad cig/
181a1(rgyud): de la me drod 'dor// chu ni rtag tu bskams gyur nas// de nas tshor ba med par 'gyur// lus la sogs pa'i sa khams kyi// sra ba nyid tsam gnas par 'gyur// skye ba dang ni 'chi/
181a2(rgyud): ba dag/ thams cad du ni 'byung bar 'gro// lha dang lha min mi rnams ni// 'byung ba med par skye mi 'gyur// lha yi 'jig rten skyong la sogs// thams cad la ni lhan cig gnas// rig byed grub mtha'
181a3(rgyud): thams cad kyis// rtag tu 'dod cing sgom pa ste// gang phyir thams cad kun tu 'gro// sa stengs skyes pa kun la gnas// 'byung ba bzhi po gtso bo mchog/ bstan bcos kun las yang dag bshad/
181a4(rgyud): rlung ni srog tu yang dag blta// me ni 'tsho ba'i mtshan nyid de// chu ni bdud rtsi'i ngo bo nyid// sa ni zhing tsam nyid du gnas// de la rtag tu gnas pa'i lha// rnam shes mchog gi dbang phyug ste// lha lnga yin/
181a5(rgyud): rnam pa ru// rnam shes de ni yongs su 'gyur// gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang // de bzhin 'du byed rnam par shes/ me long lta bu mnyam nyid dang // so sor kun tu rtog pa dang // de bzhin bya ba sgrum
181a6(rgyud): pa dang // chos dbyings shin tu rnam dag ste// ye shes 'di dag rab tu gnas// rnam snang mdzad dang rin chen 'byung // 'od dpag med dang don yod grub// de bzhin mi bskyod pa nyid de// rnam lngar ro
181a7(rgyud): gcig rdzogs byang chub// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri// ro dang reg bya chos de bzhin// yul drug tu ni shes bya ste// 'di dag rnam par dag par bshad// khams ni bco brgyad shes bya ste// de dag
181b1(rgyud): phung po'i rang bzhin nyid// yi ge mchog ni bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir// mi la sogs pa bsgom bya ste// mig gi dbang po'i rnam shes ni/ thugs kyi rdo rje'i nar 'phrul yin/
181b2(rgyud): ngo bo nyid gsum rnam dag don// 'od gsal ba yi go 'phang 'gyur// sgra dang na ba rnam shes ni// dmigs pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid// sna dang dri dang rnam shes kyang // de bzhin rnam dag shes par bya//
181b3(rgyud): dang lce dang rnam shes ni// don dam nyid du rnam par dag/ lus dang reg bya rnam shes kyang // sgyu ma lta bu'i ngo bor skyes// yid dang chos dang yid rnam shes// snying po nyid du rnam par dag/ rnam shes drug
181b4(rgyud): ni kun gzhi ru// 'jug pas de bzhin gshegs pa yin// 'od gsal ba yi go 'phang thob// he ru ka dpal yang dag gnas// yul dang yul can sbyor ba yis// rnam rtog med pa'i go 'phang
181b5(rgyud): 'gyur// rnam pa kun gyi mchog gnas pas// yul ni rnam dag shes par bya// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// gcig la de bzhin gsum du brtags// skyabs gsum dang ni de nyid gsum//
181b6(rgyud): sku gsum rnam par grol ba gsum// zhal gsum yig gsum lha gsum ste// khams gsum pa yi rang bzhin nyid// dkyil 'khor gsum dang rnal 'byor gsum// lam gsum du ni bstan
181b7(rgyud): pa ste/ dam tshig gsum dang dge ba gsum// de bzhin sku dang gsung dang thugs// shes rab dang ni thabs nyid dang // de yi sbyor ba gsum pa ste// chos kyi 'byung gnas rang bzhin gyis// ji ltar/
182a1(rgyud): gsang gsum mthong ba dang // 'khor gsum mi dmigs sbyor ba yis// sngags gsum gyi ni rang nyid nyid// phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid kyi// rtsa gsum gyi ni rang gi dngos
182a2(rgyud): phyi rol 'jig rten pa yi chos// lha la sogs pa'i bdag nyid nang // phyi nang dag pa nyid kyi phyir// rnal 'byor pas ni sangs rgyas thob// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du// lha ni mngon sum
182a3(rgyud): dmigs par bya// rnam pa kun gyi mchog rang bzhin// lha mor yongs su brtag par bya// dang po'i lha yi rang bzhin du// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bzhugs// gnas dang zhing la sogs pa'i
182a4(rgyud): brda dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma 'dus pa// de bzhin gnyis med mnyam sbyor la// lha rnams yang dag 'phro ba ste// tshad med lha ni 'phro ba las// dkyil 'khor tshad can rnam par brtag/ lha yi rnal/
182a5(rgyud): 'byor bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas rol pa'ang bsam mi khyab// mkha' 'gro dra ba'i gzugs kyis ni// he ru ka dpal yang dag sbyor// de dag mi phyed ngo bo nyid// bsgom par nga yis bshad pa yin// /
182a6(rgyud): de dag thams cad gnyis med thob// gzung dang 'dzin dang rnam bral ba// rags pa sgra zhes bshad pa ste// phra ba sems kyi rang bzhin 'gyur// bsam dang bral ba'i de nyid ni// go 'phang mchog
182a7(rgyud): ces yongs su grags// 'di ni 'byung ba bzhi dang / rnam pa lnga dang / yul drug lha'i rnam par dag pa rim par phye ba ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas zla ba nyi ma yi// rab tu phye/
182b1(rgyud): ba yang dag bshad// g.yas dang g.yon du sbyor ba yis// rim pa ji bzhin rgyu ba ste// g.yon du rkan nas bzung nas ni// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor bar 'jug pa'i// zla ba'i rtsa ni 'og bltas par/
182b2(rgyud): A li zla bar yang dag 'bab// g.yas su lte ba nas bzung nas// rkan gyi gnas su rab 'jug pa'i// nyi ma'i rtsa ni steng gnas te// kA li nyi mar rtag tu 'bab/ sna yi sgo ni gnyis po nas//
182b3(rgyud): gnyis rgyu ba'i mtshan nyid ni// rtsa g.yon 'jug pa'i lam yin te// g.yas par 'byung ba'i lam yin no// nyi shar nas brtsams ji srid de// nub kyi bar ni nyin mo ste// nub pa nas brtsams ji srid
182b4(rgyud): de shar ba'i bar ni mtshan mor 'gyur// nyin dang mtshan mo zhag yin te// me la rtse thun zhes brjod pa yin// thun bzhi nyin mor shes bya ste// de bzhin mtshan mo'ang thun bzhi pa'o// zhag gcig
182b5(rgyud): la ni 'pho ba yi// yan lag bcu drug rnams yin te// thun ni phyed phyed rtag tu rlung // sna yi bu ram yang dag rgyu// yar ngo'i tshes gcig nas bzung nas// nyin zhag gsum gyi thun phyed la//
182b6(rgyud): ba'i rlung ni rgyu ba ste// de nas zhag gsum nyi ma'i rlung // go rims 'dis ni ji srid du// yar tshes bco lnga'i bar du'o// mar ngo'i tshes gcig nas bzung nas// nyin zhag gsum du snga dro ni// nyi ma'i rlung
182b7(rgyud): du grags pa rgyu// de bzhin tshes ni bco lnga'i bar// thun re yi ni bzhi cha rnams// chu tshod du ni brjod pas ni// nyin zhag gcig la rtsa rnams ni// sum cu rtsa gnyis shes par bya// nyin zhag gcig la dbyug
183a1(rgyud): gu yi// drug cu rtsa bzhi'i tshad kyis ni// rtsa dang chu tshod phyed dbyug gu// thun gyi brgyad cha zhes su bshad// sna sgo'i rlung ni 'byung 'jug la// dbugs gcig tu ni rab tu grags/
183a2(rgyud): rlung gi sbyor ba la mkhas pas// dbugs drug srog tu shes par bya// srog ni lnga bcu tham pa dang // dbugs gsum rkang pa'ang de dang ldan// nyi ma byang du rgyu dus kyi// nyi ma dang po'i dbyug gu yi/
183a3(rgyud): nyi ma lhor ni rgyu dus kyi// mtshan mo yang ni de bzhin 'gyur// dbyug gu re re'i 'phel 'grib ni// dus kyi dbye bas shes par bya// dbugs ni drag po bzhi char bcas// 'pho ba so so'i 'phel 'grib/
183a4(rgyud): yin dbugs kyi gsum cha de'i bzhi cha'i// drug chas nyi ma re rer 'gyur// thun ni phyed phyed rgyu ba las// phyin ci log tu 'phos gyur na// rtsod pa la sogs nges 'gyur bas// mkhas pas 'di dag
183a5(rgyud): yang dag brtag/ nyi ma gcig gnyis gsum dang bzhi// lnga dang drug tu gang tshe rlung // phyin ci log tu rtag rgyun// de tshe rtsod pa chen por 'gyur// zla phyed rtag tu log par rgyu// nad ni chen po yang dag 'byung /
183a6(rgyud): zla ba gcig tu log par rgyu// snying sdug gnyen ni brlag par 'gyur// phyed dang gnyis su log par rgyu// zla ba drug na 'chi bar 'gyur// thun mong dus su shes par bya// gzhan yang khyad par bshad bya ste//
183a7(rgyud): mnyam po bdun du nyi ma song // gang tshe skye ba'i nyi zla ba// de tshe rgyas pa zhes bya'i dus// 'chi ba'i nges pa'i dus yin no// mi ni khyim gang las skyes pa// gang zhig gzhan yang bdun de'i phyir// der ni//
183b1(rgyud): nyi ma mnyam bdun song // mnyam po bdun zhes bya bar bshad// nyi ma'i lam nas thams cad du// rlung ni rtag tu rgyu ba dag/ rgyun mi chad par yang dang yang // mkhas pas dus ni mtshon par bya/
183b2(rgyud): dus kyi skad cig gang la rlung // bgrod pa gzhan du 'jug 'gyur na// dus de'i skad cig rdzogs par na// 'chi 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// nyid phyed dang por byas te nyi ma rdzogs dang de bzhin nyon nag
183b3(rgyud): gcig gi bar// de las zhag gnyis zhag gsum dang ni de bzhin zhag ni bzhi yi bar dag tu// rlung ni gang zhig rtsa la brten te g.yas pa min pa'i nyi ma'i lam nas rgyu// de las sa dang nyi ma phyogs dang
183b4(rgyud): bkra shis drug bzhi 'di dag shes par bya// lnga nas nyi shu rtsa lngar nyin zhag 'di dag lnga lngar spel bas bgrod par 'gyur// de las re res spel bas bcu ni sum 'gyur ji srigasum gyis lhag pa'i bar/
183b5(rgyud): de las rgyas pa'i dus su gsum mig zla ba'i lo dang drug gsum zung zla'i zla// lhag ma tshes dang phyogs mda' yon tan zung dang zla ba'i zhag tu 'tsho ba yin// re'u mig sum cu bdun bcas pa'i// 'kho/
183b6(rgyud): lo rim gsum bris nas ni// tshe dang srog gi rlung dag dang // nyin zhag mtshan ma rim bzhin bri// zhag lnga nas ni nyi shu lnga'i// bar bar gyi ni nyin zhag la// grangs ni bcu drug ma bshad gang //
183b7(rgyud): de rnams tshangs par brjod par bya// zhag ni drug bdun brgyad dgu yi// rim pas gal te rlung rgyun// yon tan ldan yang nyin zhag ni// nyer bzhis ma tshang lo gsum na'o// drag po nyin ma yan
184a1(rgyud): lag sa'i// zhag ni rim pas rgyun ni// yon tan ldan pa'ang nyin zhag ni// nyer bzhis ma tshang lo gnyis na'o// zhag ni bcu drug de bzhin du// bcu bdun dang ni bco brgyad
184a2(rgyud): dang lngabacu dgu yi ni rim pa yis// rlung rgyu yon tan can yang zhag/ bcu gnyis gnyis 'gyur ma tshang ba'i// lo gcig na ni skyabs med gang // de ni gshin rje'i grong khyer du// the tshom med par
184a3(rgyud): 'gro bar 'gyur// nyi ma nyi shu gcig gnyis gsum// nyer bzhi'i rim pas rlung rgyun// yon tan ldan pa'ang zhag drug ni// mo tshang zla ba drug na 'chi// re'u mig sum cu gnyis ldan pa'i// rim gnyis
184a4(rgyud): 'khor lo bris nas ni// der ni tshe yang yan lag rlung // grangs kyi mtshan ma rim bzhin bri// 'chi ba'i rtags ni 'di dag kun// rnam pa thams cad shes byas nas// blo ldan 'chi ba bslu ba yis/
184a5(rgyud): gal te brtan pa'i go 'phang 'dod// rtsa ni yang dag sbyangs byas pas// de srid rlung ni sbyangs 'gyur te// so so'i rim bzhin rnal 'byor pas// yang dang yang du mnan par bya// g.yon pa'i bu gar
184a6(rgyud): bcug nas ni// rtsa ni bsdams nas mnan bya zhing // de bzhin du ni g.yas par rlung // bkug ste dal bus mnan par bya// sems can rnams kyi zhag gcig la// rgyu ba'i dbugs kyi grangs kyi
184a7(rgyud): tshul brgya phrag drug gis lhag pa yi// stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig go/ dbang chen gyis ni rgyal srid de// chus ni don rnams yang dag 'byung // me yi rlung ni rnam rgyu bas// bkres skom dub dang
184b1(rgyud): sdug bsngal nang // bya ba thams cad nyams 'gyur zhes// rdorje 'dzin ma mchog gis gsungs// rlung gis rtsod dang sgro dang rmongs// nor nyams nyon mongs par byed// dbang chen nor dang 'brul
184b2(rgyud): sogs// rnyed pa thob dang sdud byed pa'o// chu yi rlung ni rnam rgyu bas// 'dod pa'i dngos grub kun byed pas// de yi sbyor ba mchog gtso bor// rdo rje sems dpas gang gsungs pa'o// rlung ni bcom
184b3(rgyud): ldan dwe ru ka'o// rang bzhin nyid de gsum du 'gyur// g.yon pa shes rab rang bzhin te// g.yas pa snying rje'i bdag nyid do// gnyis po mi phyed sbyor ba yang // gnyis kanas ni rnam par rgya// de ba
184b4(rgyud): de nyid rig pas der// dge mi dge sogs shes par bya// dug sogs gzhom dang lhag ma ni// bkra shis dpal ni bskyed pa la// shes rab bdag nyid rab tu bsngags// rab tu dpal ldan snying
184b5(rgyud): rje'i stobs// g.yul bsham rol rtsed ston mo dang // gcad pa dang ni dbug pa dang // bsreg dang btso ba'i las la ni// snying rje'i bdag nyid rab tu bsngags// gzhan yang gnyis bdag rdo rje
184b6(rgyud): can the tsom 'gyur ba shes bya ste// dge dang mi dge nges med par// rlung rig pas ni 'dir mtshon bya// mgon po ci ste A lir rgyu// 'ga' zhig kA lir gnas 'dri'am// kA li'i rgyu la A li/
184b7(rgyud): gnas// de yi 'dod don nyams par 'gyur// gang nas mgon po de rgyu ba// der gnas 'ga' zhig 'dri byed na// de yi don kun yang dag 'grub// gnyis kar gnas las the tshom 'gyur// rlung gi
185a1(rgyud): #bdag nyid kyis mgon po'i// sku gsum por yang shes par bya// 'jug pa chos kyi sku yin te// gnas pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// 'byung ba sprul pa'i sku zhes bshad/
185a2(rgyud): 'di dag sku ni gsum por bzhed// 'dri ba po 'am rang gi'ang rung // chos skus thams cad dge ba ste// longs spyod rdzogs pa the tsom 'gyur// sprul pas 'thab mor ston pa'o// rnal 'byor pa yi
185a3(rgyud): srog rtsol ni// sangs rgyas lnga yi ngo bor gnas// g.yon dang g.yas kyi gnas gang na// rim pa ji bzhin rnam par rgyu// g.yas nas rnam par rgyu ba'i 'od// me yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te// nas kyi
185a4(rgyud): me tog lta bu'i mdog/ de ni 'od dpag med pa'i lha// g.yon nas rnam par rgyu ba'i 'od// rtag tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor te// kha dog ljang ku ltar snang ba// lha ni don yod mchog yin no// gnyis ka/
185a5(rgyud): nas ni rgyu ba'i 'od// gser gyi 'od ltar snang ba ste// dbang chen dkyil 'khor gyi ni rlung // rtag tu rin chen 'byung ldan rgyu// 'og nas dal bar rab rgya bas// kun da zla ba lta bur dkar// chu yi dkyil
185a6(rgyud): 'khor rgyu ba ste// 'od chen rdo rje mgon po'o// lus kun la ni rjes 'gro'i rlung // sems kun rab tu 'jug byed pa// mgon po rnam par snang mdzad ni// 'byung bar rab tu grags pa yin// rnal
185a7(rgyud): 'byor ma ni mnyam bzhag pas// 'jug pa'i rlung ni bgrang bar bya// ji srid 'bum la sogs pa'i grangs// sgra dang bral ba rtag tu bzla// sgrub pos sgra dang bral bar ni// 'bum bzlas yongs su
185b1(rgyud): rdzogs pa ma nyams pa yang lo wAn/ 'tshu bar 'di ni ba tsom med/ nag tu nang par langs nas rlung // slong brag gcig tu bzang byas// de bas rlung gnal 'byor la// rtag tum sa
185b2(rgyud): gzhag gnas par bya// yang na bum pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// rtag tu 'chi bdag las rgyal bya// bdag nyid rig pas rkang mthil bar// kun tu rlung gis dgang bya ste// bum pa can la brten byas
185b3(rgyud): nas/ dbye ba gsum gyis gzhom par bshad// tha ma sum cu rtsa drug tsam// de yi nyis 'gyur 'bring de bzhin// sum 'gyur chen por shes bya ste// bum pa can des rgyal bar bya// bum pa
185b4(rgyud): can lngar shes byas nas// bdag nyid skyil mo krung bcas te// lag pa lan gsum mnyes nas ni// de nas lan drug se gol brdab// ji srid sum cu rtsa drug par// de srid bum pa can
185b5(rgyud): gyis byas// sum 'gyur chen pos gzhom pa ni// brgya las rtsa brgyad lhag pas so// brtan pa'i go 'phang 'dod pas ni// brtson pas de nyid kyis rgyal bya// bum pa'i sbyor bas rgyal bas na//
185b6(rgyud): 'chi bdag las ni ring du 'jug/ bum pa can ni shes byas nas// 'gog la brtan par gnas pa na// de la bskal pa stong du yang // 'chi bdag nye bar 'ong mi 'gyur// snying gi chu skyes
185b7(rgyud): dbus son rlung // hUM yig dkar po'i rnam par ni// gang gis mnyam par bzhag bsams na// de la yul sogs dmigs mi 'gyur// rlung gis 'khor ba'i steng du 'gro// mya ngan 'das
186a1(rgyud): pa'i 'og tu bgrod// snying ka yi ni chu skyes la// mi gnas mya ngan 'das par gnas// steng dang 'og tu rgyu ba'i rlung // kha sbyar du ni yid kyis byas// de yi sbyor bas/
186a2(rgyud): goms byed na// des ni brtan pa'i go 'phang 'thob// rlung gi rnal 'byor mi shes pa 'am// gang zhig shes kyang mi byed pa// de ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal tshogs// du mas gtses pa'i
186a3(rgyud): srin bur 'gyur// gang zhig 'gro dang 'ong ba'i rlung // blo dang ldan pas rtag bya ste// rlung gis thams cad byin gyis brlabs// rlung ni kun tu 'gro 'gyur ba'o// 'di ni zla ba dang nyi ma'i man
186a4(rgyud): ngag gi rim par phye ba ste lnga pa'o// / de nas lam lnga bzang po mchog/ rnam par nges par rab bshad bya// bdag gzhan don ni phun tshogs pa'i// sgrub pos dge
186a5(rgyud): dang mi dge brtag/ me dang rlung ni nyid dag dang // de bzhin dbang chen dang ni chu'i// dkyil 'khor yang dag rgyu ba las// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang dgug/ de bzhin gsang dang bskrad pa yi// mtshan
186a6(rgyud): nyid mkhas pas brtag par bya// de yi sbyor ba mi shes pa// de ni ngal ba don med 'gyur// mes ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba ste// rlung gis nor rnams nyams par 'gyur// dbang chen gyis ni rgyal srid
186a7(rgyud): 'gyur// chus ni nor dang 'bru rnams bsten// g.yas pa nas ni rgyu ba'i khams/ byin za'i dkyil 'khor nyid yin te// kha dog dmar zhing gsal ba ni// pad+ma'i mgon po'i 'byung ba'o// g.yon pa/
186b1(rgyud): nas ni rgyu ba'i khams// rlung gi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te// kha dog ldang zhing gsal ba ni// las kyi mgon po 'byung ba'o// gnyis ka nas ni rgyu ba'i khams// gser gyi mdog ltar
186b2(rgyud): gsal ba ni// dbang chen dkyil 'khor nyid yin te// rin chen mgon po'i rgyu ba'o// dal zhing rgyu ba med pa'i khams// chu yi dkyil 'khor nyid yin te// dag pa'i shel ltar snang ba
186b3(rgyud): ni/ rdo rje mgron po'i rgya ba'o// khams rnams kun ni yang dag bsdus// rten dang brten pa'ang yang dag 'dzin// rnam snang mdzad ni rlung chen te// 'chi ba'i lus las rnam par rgya// rlung
186b4(rgyud): gi de nyid mi shes par// las dang las min mi 'grub ste// rlung ni thams cad bgrod 'gyur bas// rtog ge ba yis mi shes so// rlung gi de nyid sngon 'gro bas// sngags kyi de nyid bsgrub par
186b5(rgyud): bya// sems can rnams kyi srog gyur pa// rlung zhes bya ba las kun byed// 'di ni rnam shes bzhon pa ste// sangs rgyas go 'phang 'thob byed pa// rgyud rnams kun gyi gsang ba ste// byang chub
186b6(rgyud): rgyu yi thabs yin no// 'di ni lam lnga nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste drug pa'o// de nas rtsa yi 'khor lo ni// rim pa bzhin du rab bshad bya// lus kyi rjes
186b7(rgyud): su 'gro ba'i rtsa// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis 'gyur// rtsa rnams dang ni nye ba'i tshe// de dag gnas la brten pa ste// brgya las nyi shu lhag pa'i rtsa// gtso bo zhes ni bya bar brjod// rtsa yi gnas
187a1(rgyud): dang yul rnams ni// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i grangs yin te// de rnams dbus kyi rtsa gsum gang // thams cad khyab cing brten pa'o// mgor ni pul+lI ra yin te// so dang sen mo
187a2(rgyud): 'bab par gnas// spyi gtsug dzA lan+d+ha ra ste// skra dang spu ni 'bab par gnas// aur+ya na rna ba g.yas pa'i rtsa// pags pa dang ni dri ma 'bab// mgo rgyab ar pu da yin te// sha ni yang dag 'bab
187a3(rgyud): pa'i rtsa// go bar+ya rna ba g.yon// rgyus pa yang dag 'bab pa'i rtsa// smin dbus rA me shwa ri ste// rtag tu rus pa 'bab pa'o// mig ni de bi ko Tir gnas// mchin pa 'bab pa'i rtsa yin no// mA la
187a4(rgyud): wa ni dpung pa gnyis// snying 'bab pa yi rtsa gnas so// mchan khung kA ma rU pa ste// rtag tu mig ni 'bab pa'o// nu ma gnyis ni o tre ste// rtag tu mkhris pa 'bab pa'i rtsa// tri sha ku ne lte ba ste/
187a5(rgyud): rtsar ni glo ba 'bab pas gnas// sna rtse ko sa la yin te// rgyu ma'i 'phreng ba 'bab pas gnas// kha ni ka ling ka yin te// rtag tu gnye ma 'babs pas gnas// mgrin pa lam pa ka yin te// rtag
187a6(rgyud): tu lto ba 'bab pa'i rtsa// kany+tsi snying ka'i gnas yin te// bshang ba 'bab pa'i rtsa yin no// mdoms par hi ma la ya ste// 'tshogs ma'i mtshams ni 'bab pa'i rtsa// pre ta pu ri mtshan ma ste/
187a7(rgyud): bad kan 'bab pa'i rtsa yin no// gri ha de ba bshang lam ste// rtag tu rnag ni 'bab pa'o// brla gnyis sau raSh+Ta yin te// rtag tu khrag ni 'bab pa'o// byin pa gnyis ni gser gling gnas/
187b1(rgyud): rdul 'bab pa yi rtsa yin no// rkang pa'i sor mo na ga ra// rtag tu tshil 'bab rtsar shes bya// rkang pa'i bol ni sin+d+hu ste// mchi ma 'bab pa'i gzugs can ma// ma ru de sha mthe bong ste// rtag
187b2(rgyud): tu mchil ma 'bab pas gnas// ku lu ta ni pus mo ste// rtag tu sna chu 'bab pas gnas// de dag dbus na gnas pa'i rtsa// la la nA ra ni sir+b+ba 'bab// g.yas su khrag ni 'bab pa'i rtsa/
187b3(rgyud): ra sa nA zhes grags pa yin// dbus kyi char ni yang dag 'jug/ snying ka'i chu skyes dbus son pa// chu shing snye ma'i me tog bzhin// 'phyang pa kha ni thur du bltas// til gyi mar me ltar 'bar zhing
187b4(rgyud): byang chub sems ni mnyam 'bab ste// a ba d+hU tIr shes bya ste// lhan cig skyes pa ster byed pa'o// la la nA la sogs pa'i rtsa// rtsa rnams kun gyi gtso bo ste// de bas 'dir ni gzhan bsten pa/
187b5(rgyud): gang gis sin d+hur gzhan 'jug bzhin// gcig gyur kA ka mu kha ste// de nyid skye gnas gzhan ma yin// longs spyod rdzogs sku'i rang bzhin gyis// lus la brten par shes par bya// bud
187b6(rgyud): med rnams la'ang gtso bo gsum// la la nA sogs rtsa rnams yin// shes rab rang bzhin la la nA// ra sa nA ni thabs su gnas// dbus nas a ba d+hU tI'i ni// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam
187b7(rgyud): spangs pa'o// longs spyod rdzogs sku la la nAM// ra sa nA ni sprul pa'i sku// a ba d+hU tI chos sku ste// sku gsum por ni bshad pa yin// rtsa rnams de dag thams cad ni// lus ni dge bar byed/
188a1(rgyud): pa ste/ de yi tshogs las yang dag byung // gong bu lha yi bdag nyid do// gzugs las 'das pa gong bur 'gyur// gong bu las 'das lha nyid du// de phyir bsam mi khyab
188a2(rgyud): sbyor bas// de bzhin nyid bdag kun tu 'gro// sgrub pos cho ga gang gang gis// gong bu las 'das go 'phang gnas// des ni de yi bdag nyid du// gyur pas sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// 'di ni
188a3(rgyud): rtse'i 'khor lo'i thabs rim par bye bste bdun pa'o// / de nas gang zhig shes tsam gyis// myur du dngos grub 'gyur ba yi// dam tshig rnams kyang rim pa bzhin// yang /
188a4(rgyud): dag par ni bshad par bya// rang gi khyim mam gsang ba'i gnas// dben zhing yid ni dga' ba dang // ri bo tshang tshing ri sul dang // rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram dang ni// ma mo'i khyim dang dur khrod dam/
188a5(rgyud): chubo 'dus pa'i dbus suni// tha med 'bras bu 'dod pa yis// dkyil 'khor yang dag za bar bya// yon bdag dang bachen po yis// zhing skyes gnas skyes sngags skyes ma'i// rnal 'byor ma dang /
188a6(rgyud): rnal 'byor ba// slob dpor zhwakun spyan drung bya// khyim pa 'am ni dag tshul lam// de bzhin dag slong slob dpon te// slob dbum pacig 'dag rten pa// bstan la gnas pa'i dge slong ngam// kha
188a7(rgyud): ma ldan pa'is/ rje kyi shes thob papang rung / 'a rnams napan yin padag na// gang sa dang pas 'chog bya lan byin sngon du 'a mas/ dkyil lamang 'a byas /
188b1(rgyud): slob dpon dbang bskur yon tan ldan// 'jig rten rnams kyis ma smad cing // mi dge bcu yongs spangs pa ni// tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i gtso bor bya// rtag tu yon bdag blo ldan gyis// snying rje med
188b2(rgyud): cing khro dang gdug/ khengs dang brkam chags bdag nyid bskyod// mnyam par ma bzhag gis mi bya// gang zhig khyim gnas longs spyod bsten// gzhol 'dzugs dang ni tshong pa dang // rmongs pas dam
188b3(rgyud): chos 'tshong ba ni// tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i gtso bor min// 'di ltar yon tan kun ldan zhing // thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin// dul zhing brtson 'grus yang dag ldan// sred pa med cing nga rgyal
188b4(rgyud): med rtag tu sems can bsten par ni// ltos bcas rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang // thod pa'i rgyan la dga' ba dang // rdo rje dril bu mnyam ldan pa'i// mkhas pas g.yon gyi phyogs su ni// g.yon pa'ang/
188b5(rgyud): rab tu gzhag par bya// 'di ltar yon tan ldan slob dpon// las rnams kun la rab tu bsngags// rim pa ji bzhin slob dpon dang // lha rnams spyan drangs byon pa la// ji ltar rnyed pa'i dri chu
188b6(rgyud): yis// zhabs bkru bas ni gtsang byas nas// sa yongs brtag pa'i gnas su ni// slob dpon sngon du 'gro ba yis// rgan dang gzhon pa'i dbye ba bzhin// zhugs nas gdan la gnas par bya//
188b7(rgyud): skal ba med dang nga rgyal can// de bzhin bla ma smod pa dang // dam tshig ma mthong rang gi bu// de bzhin skyes pa bud med rnams// sgrub po dngos grub 'dod pa yis// dam tshig der ni gzhug mi bya//
189a1(rgyud): gal te phyugs ni de rnams zhugs// dngos grub ring du 'jug par 'gyur// dam tshig smad pas lus sems ni// sdug bsngal de bzhin gnas nyams dang // dpal las/
189a2(rgyud): ring zhing sna tshogs pa'i// sdug bsngal gyis ni nyer 'tsher 'gyur// de ltar shes nas spang bya ste// mchod pa'i spyod yul can rnams bsdu// rgan dang gzhon pa'i rim bzhin du// me tog
189a3(rgyud): bdug spos mar me dang // can dan dris ni khyad par du// blo dang ldan pas rtag mchod bya// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i// gtor ma slob dpon gyis rab brtag/ lha ni bsnyen
189a4(rgyud): phyir mchod bya zhing // yon bdag yid la 'dod pa yi// gang zhig zhi dang rgyas pa'i las// dngos grub don du bris nas ni// gang gang mngon par 'dod pa yi// las de byin gyis brlab par
189a5(rgyud): byang sbrang chung bur chang 'khur ba'i chang // ji ltar rnyed pa dbul bar bya// gtsang zhing dul dang dpa' ba'i sems// srid dang gti mug rnam par spangs// thams cad mtshungs par blta ba ni/
189a6(rgyud): las kyi rdo rje rab tu brtag/ bza' dang bca' dang de bzhin btung // so rtsi dang ni spos de bzhin// dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun nyid du// yon bdag gis ni dbul bya zhing // phyi nas las
189a7(rgyud): rdo rje ni// mkhas pas rdzas rnams yongs su spyad// thog mar lcags kyu mnyam ldan pa'i// dam tshig yongs su spyad par bya// de nas thams cad yongs rdzogs par// slob dpon/
189b1(rgyud): gyis ni byin gyis brlab// gnas dang nye gnas zhing dang ni// 'dus dang dur khrod gnas pa'o// dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma kun la// bdag ni gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// lha mo rnams kyi
189b2(rgyud): tshad ma dam tshig tshad ma dang // des bshad gsung ni mchog tu tshad mar gyur pa ste// bden par gyur pa des na lha mo rnams kyis 'dir// bdag ni rjes su bzung ba'i rgyur ni gyur par shog/
189b3(rgyud): gzhan yang dkyil 'khor mdun du ni// snying kar thal mo rab sbyar te// yon bdag gis kyang smon lam ni// yongs su bsngo ba nyid du bya// srid dang zhi ba mnyam par chags pa bcom zhing
189b4(rgyud): yang dag rtog pa 'joms// khyed kyis dngos po thams cad mkha' dang mnyam pa'i bdag nyid gzigs par ldan// mgon po thugs rje chu yi rjid kyis brlan par gyur pa'i thugs kyi chus/
189b5(rgyud): bdag la mchod cig lha mo rnams kyis shin tu rjes brtser mdzad du gsol// rnal 'byor bdud rtsi ro gcig gsol bas thugs ni rnam par dag pa ste// gnas la sogs pa'i yul du bgrod
189b6(rgyud): pas sku ni rnam par dag pa yi// dpal ldan gnas kyi dbus kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo mchog gi mgon po ni// bla ma mchog la rtag tu mgo bos btud de gus pas phyag 'tshal lo//
189b7(rgyud): dpa' bo kun gyi sku ni rtag tu mdzes pa ste// lha mo rnams kyi rin chen sku yis 'khyud pas brgyan// 'khor los gnas mgon lhan cig skye dga' dri med pa'i// rnal 'byor snying po bde mchog/
190a1(rgyud): la yang rtag phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas ku mkhyen shin tu rnam par dag pa'i gnas// lha mo rnams ni lhan cig skyes pa'i gnas kyis mdzes// 'dren pa lhan cig skyes
190a2(rgyud): pa'i dga' ba 'byung ba ste// dri med lhan cig skyes pa mchog bdag la phyag 'tshal// tshigs bcad gsum gyis yang dag bstod// ji ltar bde bar phyag kyang btsal// yid spro ji ltar bde bar ni//
190a3(rgyud): ca co'i spro ba chen po yis// me tog 'phreng rnams kyis brgyan cing // sna tshogs me tog gis mchod lus// chang gi ston mo'i dga' bcas pas// rdo rje'i glus ni dgang bar bya// mchog tu
190a4(rgyud): dga' bas gar bya zhing // gnas kyi mtshan pa'i stangs stabs gar// phyag rgya sngags kyis gar bya'o// der ni phaT ha sogs dang // cang te'u dang ni bkra shis rje// rnga rings la sogs sna tshogs
190a5(rgyud): pa'i rol mo yid 'ong bsgrag par bya// he ru ka bcas dpa' bo dang // rnal 'byor ma mchog g.yon pa ste// de rjes tshogs kyi gtso bo yis// yon bdag gi ni dge ba bsam// rnal 'byor rnal
190a6(rgyud): 'byor ma 'dus pas// skad cig shes pa brjod pa sbyin// bde ba phun tshogs ldan pa dang // nad med pa dang dge ba'i sems// 'dod dang grol sogs yang dag 'thob// dngos grub phun sum
190a7(rgyud): tshogs par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor rnam par spros poni// chog bshad bzhin bsdu bar bya// lhag ma'i gtor ma bsdus nas ni// 'byung po 'chol ba rnams la sbyin// gnas dang zhing gnas
190b1(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma'i// tshogs la dri zhing tshim par bya// spyan drangs dpa' bo thams cad ni// bde ba chen por gshegs su gsol// 'di ni dam tshig gi brda'i cho ga rim par phye ba ste brgyad pa'o/
190b2(rgyud): de nas lag pa g.yon pa'i brda// cung zad tsam ni bshad bya ste// sgrub pos gang zhig shes tsam gyis// myur du dngos grub 'gyur ba'o// gang zhig sor mo
190b3(rgyud): gcig ston pa// de la gnyis bstan legs 'ongs ldan// gang zhig g.yon pa'i sor mo snga mas// bde'am zhes pa'i rgyur shes bya// gang zhig ming med ston byed pa// de la mthe'u chung
190b4(rgyud): bstan par bya// gang zhig gung mo ston byed pa// de la mthe bong bstan par bya// gang zhig srin lag ston byed pa// de la mgrin pa rab bstan bya// gang zhig pa ni sa ston pa// de la rtse gsum
190b5(rgyud): bstan par bya// gang zhig nu ma ston byed pa// de la skra mtshams bstan par bya// gang zhig so ni ston byed pa// de la 'khor lo bstan par bya// gang zhig khro gnyer ston byed pa// de la gtsug
190b6(rgyud): bud bstan par bya// gang zhig dpral ba ston byed pa// de la rol pa bstan par bya// bud med gang zhig g.yon nas 'gro// rnal 'byor ma rtag g.yon nas te// skad cig chen pos rab tu smra/
190b7(rgyud): g.yon pa'i lta bas rnams lta zhing // bud med rnams la dgar smra ba// da ni dam tshig ldan shes bya// bud med rnams la gsol btab na// rigs kyi sa bon rab smra zhing // rigs kyi bya ba mi 'dor
191a1(rgyud): la rang gi rigs kyi rig pa zlos// gang zhig rig pa rnam par 'dri// lag pa g.yon pas rang gi mgor// mgo la 'phrug par byed pa dang // sgrub pa pos ni khyad par du//
191a2(rgyud): de yi rang rigs dran par 'gyur// mkhur ba 'am ni kos sko 'am// sna dag tu ni sor mo ston// zur gyis blta bas dus rtag tu// rang gi rigs la rnam par lta// bden 'byung 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor/
191a3(rgyud): ma rnyed dka' nges par dam tshig can// rang gi khyim du thod pa dang // dgra sta ral gri rgyal mtshan dang // 'khor lo dang ni rnga yab dang // rtse gsum bris nas dga' byed cing // rtag tu sha dang chang
191a4(rgyud): la dga'// 'jigs dang ngo tsha 'joms byed gang // mkha' 'gro ma'i rigs yang dag 'byung // lhan cig skyes ma zhes byar bshad// yul dang yul du mngon par skye// sgrub po rnams kyis
191a5(rgyud): rtag tu bsten// gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang ni// de bzhin zhing dang nye ba'i zhing // tshan do nye ba'i tshan do ha// 'dus pa nye ba'i 'dus pa dang // dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod de// 'dzam bu'i gling na
191a6(rgyud): yang dag gnas// gnas ni pul+lI rar grags te// de bzhin dzA lan+d+ha ra'ang gnas// oM r+yan de bzhin gnas yin te// de bzhin ar pu da yang gnas// nye gnas go dra bar+ya ste// de bzhin rA me shwa
191a7(rgyud): ra'i ming // de bi ko Tir mngon brjod dang // mA la ba yang nye ba'i gnas// zhing ni kA ma ru'i ming can te// oM trer mngon par brjod pa'ang zhing // nye zhing tri sha ku ni ste// ko sa la yang nye ba'i
191b1(rgyud): zhing ka ling ka dang laM pa ka'ang // de bzhin tshan do ha yin te// kany+tsi hi ma la ya ni// khyad par nye ba'i tshan do ha'o// 'dus pa pre ta ba si ni// gr-i ha de ba yang de bzhin// sau rASh+Ta dang gser/
191b2(rgyud): gling gang // nye ba'i 'dus pa gnyis yin no// pa til pu tra dur khrod de// sin+d+hu'ang de bzhin dur khrod do// ma ru ku lu ta gnyis ni// nye ba'i dur khrod gnas su bshad// de ltar phyi rol gnas
191b3(rgyud): su grags// nang gi gnas nyid lung du brjod// rang lus rtsa yis gzugs la 'dir// gnas kyi ming du rab tu grags// de gzugs lha yi rnam pa ste// des na nang gi bdag tu gnas// de phyir
191b4(rgyud): de yi gong bu'i dngos// lus 'di sangs rgyas kun mtshungs pa'o// gnas ni rab tu dga' ba'i sa// de bzhin nye gnas dri ma med// zhing ni 'od byed sa yin te// nye ba'i zhing ni 'od 'phro ba/
191b5(rgyud): mngon du gyur pa tshan dor shes// nye ba'i tshan do sbyang dka' ba'o// 'dus pa ring du song ba ste// mi g.yo bar grags nye 'dus pa// dur khrod de bzhin legs blo gros// nye ba'i dur khrod chos
191b6(rgyud): kyi sprin// gnas sogs sa yi rnam dag pa// rim pa ji bzhin bshad pa yin// gnas dang nye gnas sogs bsten pas// mi nem dri ma med par 'gyur// blo ldan rnam rtog med pa ni//
191b7(rgyud): rgyu zhing mtshan ma yang dag brtag/ sna tshogs gzugs dang 'jigs gzugs ma// drag cing mi bzad dgod brtags la// rang 'dod lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// hUM gi sgra ni bsgrag par bya//
192a1(rgyud): the tsom thams cad rnam spangs nas// sgrub pos seng ge bzhin du spyad// mthong ngam reg la thos pas kyang // myur du dngos grub rab 'gro 'gyur// 'di ni brda dang gnas/
192a2(rgyud): la sogs pa'i brdas sa rnams nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste dgu pa'o// de nas gang zhig bris tsam gyis// sgrub pos dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'i//
192a3(rgyud): zhi ba la sogs rab sbyor ba// yang dag rab tu bshad par bya// gur kum tsan dan bsres pas gang // yar ngo yi ni tshes la bri// 'khor lo rtsibs drug bris nas ni// yi ge bdun
192a4(rgyud): pa'i sngags sbyar zhing // phyi rol rdo rje'i 'phreng bas bskor// dbus su ming ni rnam spel ba'o// dar ram ras ni gtsang ma 'am// yang na kham phor kha sbyar la// gsang ste las na
192a5(rgyud): bris nas kyang // srad bu dkar pos dkri bar bya// kha dog dkar pos shar bltas te// me tog dkar pos mchod par bya// mdun du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bsgrub bya gnas par
192a6(rgyud): bltas la/ bum pa dkar po zla ba'i bdud rtsi chus gang bas dbang bskur bar bya'o// the tshom med pas thun gsum du// yi ge bdun pa'i sngags bzlas na// de ma thag tu zhi ba dang // bde
192a7(rgyud): legs sgyid dang tshe ring 'gyur// rims nad dug dang mche ba la// lag pa g.yon par bsgom bya ste// 'khor lo tsan dan gyis bris la// me tog bdug pas mchod par bya// bsgrub bya shar
192b1(rgyud): du kha bstan te// mkhas pa yis ni sbyar bya ba// gtor ma chu dang de bzhin me// de yi dbus su dur ba 'am// rma bya'i sgo 'am ku sha'i chun// khyad par du ni de la bya ba// gsang sngags 'di ni/
192b2(rgyud): gtso bo mchog/ zhi sogs cho ga rim bzhin byed// gur kum dri bzang bsres pa yis// rgyas pa'i 'khor lo bri bya ste// swA hA'i yi ge dang spel bar// kham phor gnyis la bris nas ni// srad
192b3(rgyud): bu ser pos dkri byas la// mar dang sbrang rtsi'i nang du bzhug/ byang du kha bltas bun gsum du// kha dog ser por bsgom byas la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ser po la// bsgrub bya gnas par mkhas
192b4(rgyud): bas bsam// bdud rtsi ser pos dbang bskur zhing // me tog ser pos mchod par bya// rnam par mi rtog sems kyis ni// rgyas pa'i bsam pas bzla bya ste// che ge mo puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/
192b5(rgyud): bo ShaT sngags kyis spel bar bya// nor dang 'bru rnams 'phel ba dang // dpal dang bkra shis mnyam par 'jug/ las kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rgyas par 'gyur te gzhan du min// tsan
192b6(rgyud): dan dmar dang sen rtsi dang // ming med kyi ni khrag bsres te// ras sam gro ga'i 'dab ma 'am// kham phor so ni ma btang bzung // yi ge ho dang spel ba yis// 'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam par/
192b7(rgyud): bri/ srang bu dmar pos bcings nas ni// me tog dmar pos mchod par bya// mar dang sbrang rtsi'i dbus bzhag la// nub kyi phyogs su kha bltas te// kha dog dmar por bsgoms byas la//
193a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dmar po la gnas pa'i// bsgrub bya chags pa rnam par bsam// rtag tu yig bdun 'byung ba ni// rgyun mi chad par bzlas bya ste// myos par 'gyur bas
193a2(rgyud): zhabs drung lhung // de ni grub par rnam par bsam// gal te dbang du 'ong bar ma gyur na mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bral ba'i 'khrul 'khor seng ldeng gi mdag ma la gdung bar byas na/ gang su'ang skal ba/
193a3(rgyud): ngan pa'ang skal ba bzang por 'gyur te// gzhan du ma yin no// dur khrod kyi ras sam/ zla mtshan 'dzag pa'i ras la/ rgya skyegs kyi khu ba dang ldan pas yi ge dzaHhrI dang spel ba'i 'khrul 'khor bri
193a4(rgyud): ba 'am/ kham phor ram/ bud med kyi thod pa la grub pa'i 'khor lo bris la/ srad bu dmar pos dkris te/ me tog dmar pos mchod la/ bsgrub bya'i snying ka nas lcags kyus dbug cing mgrin
193a5(rgyud): pa nas zhags pas bcing bar bya'o// gang gis de ltar bsams kyang bsgrub bya nam yang 'ong bar ma gyur na/ seng ldeng gi shing las me sbar la bsros pas 'khrul 'khor tshar gcad par bya/
193a6(rgyud): zhing rnga che ge mo a kaR+Sha ya hrI dzaHzhes bya ba des bsgrub bya skad cig tsam de nyid la dgug par bya ste/ rkang pas dgug pa bla na med pa'o// de nas gzhan yang mnan pa yi// cho ga bla med bshad
193a7(rgyud): par bya// ri mo brgyad brgyad mnyam sbyar bas// re'u migo bzhi bcu rtsa dgu ste// mkhas pas de yi bar gyi ni// re'u mig bcu gsum stong par bya// zur dang zur du re'u mig dgu// grwa bzhi la ni ya
193b1(rgyud): dag gnas// grwa bzhi kun gyi dbus kyi ni// re'u mig stong pa nyid byas la// dur khrod ras la zhal bzhi pa'i// sngags ni yang dag sbyar te bri// yung ba ldong ros bsres pa'i chus// 'khor lo gnyis
193b2(rgyud): la bsgrub bya'i ming // yi ge laM dang spel te bri// ri rab zur brgyad gnas bris pa'i// kham por kha sbyar nyid du bya// ri rab steng du dbang chen gyi// dkyil 'khor dbus su laM gyis ni// mtshan
193b3(rgyud): cing sna tshogs rdo rje yis// steng na mnan par rnam par bsgom// srad bu ser pos rnam par dkri// he ru ka ni phyag gnyis pa'i// rnam par dag lus yang dag bsgom// rnal 'byor pas ni lhor
193b4(rgyud): bltas te// kha dog dmar por rnam par bsgom// bsgrub bya ri rab dbus gnas shing // ri rab kyis ni mnan par bsgom// de stengs sna tshogs rdo rje yis// yongs su mnan par rnam par bsgom//
193b5(rgyud): rang gi gnas su de byas na// dgra yi kha ni gnon pa dang // dpung rnams kun kyang gnon par byed// dgra yi snying yang gnon pa'o// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+hA ni huM hUM phaT/ laM lhas byin staM b+ha ya/ oM grah+Na
193b6(rgyud): gr-ih+Na huM hUM phaT/ laM lhas byin staM b+ha ya/ oM grah+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya huM hUM phaT/ laM lhas byin ste b+ha ya/ oM A na ya ho bi d+yA rA dza huM hUM phaT/ laM lhas byin sta~M b+ha ya/ sngar bshad rim bzhin 'khor lo ni/
193b7(rgyud): de nyid kyis ni nges par bri// me tog ser pos mchod bya ste// ngag gi gnon pa'i mchog yin no// rtag tu dur khrod ras la no// 'khor lo gnyis ni mngon bris te// yi ge baM ni bsgrub bya yi// ming
194a1(rgyud): dang spel bas kha bcings pa// dbang chen dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// ga'u kha sbyar byas pa yi// lug gi snying khar bsgrub bya ni// rab tu zhugs par rnam par bsams//
194a2(rgyud): sngags ni rgyun mi chad par bzla// nges par lkugs pa nyid du 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang nges par ni// gsad pa'i cho ga mchog bshad bya// lan tshwa ske tshe tsha ba'i mar// nim pa'i lo ma de bzhin dug/
194a3(rgyud): dur khrod sol ba d+ha du ra// rang gi sdigs mdzub khrag kyang rung // rdzas 'di dag ni snag tshar bya// lho phyogs kha bltas sbyor bas ni// khwa yi gshog pa'i smyu gu yis// bsgrub bya de yi ming bzung ste//
194a4(rgyud): yi ge hUM dang rnal spel ba'i// 'khor lo gnyis ni yang dag bri// khro zhing drag po'i nga ro dang // g.yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// bskul pa'i me 'dra zhal
194a5(rgyud): rnam 'gyur// sngo zhing mi bzang hUM gi sgras// mgur ni gang bar rnam par bsgom// gyo mo khrod kyi sar bsam pa 'am// dur khrod sol ba yi ni dbus// 'di la sogs pa'i sa phyogs su// bsgrub bya
194a6(rgyud): gnas par mkhas pas bsam// rid cing dri ma dang bcas pa// gos rdul gyon par rnam bsam ste// yan lag kun dang mgo bo dang // snying kha dang ni dpung par yang // sngags kyis phub par
194a7(rgyud): bsam par bya// bsgrub bya'i lus la gnas pa'i lha// rang gi lus la rab tu gzhug/ khyim stong lta bur bltas nas ni// phyag ni sna tshogs mtshon cha can// khro bo'i tshogs ni spro byas la// mtshon
194b1(rgyud): chas gsod par rnam bsam ste// dum bu drug tu gtubs nas ni// tshil dang rkang dang zhag dang sha// za dang 'thung bar byed pa dang // de bzhin du ni khrag kyang 'thung // ral gri dbyug to gtun
194b2(rgyud): shing dang // dgra sta 'khor lo tho ba yis// bsgrub bya la ni rdeg cing 'thub// dum bu brgyad ni gshog par byed// khwa dang 'ug pa bya rgod dang // ce spyang srin po mkha' 'gro ma// de rnams khros
194b3(rgyud): pa'i yid kyis ni// za ba dang ni 'thung bar byed// yoM gau hUM phaT dang spel ba'i// sngags dang de yis bzlas byas te// dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed pa'i// dgra yi tshogs rnams gsad par
194b4(rgyud): bya e ma ho gang phyir bsad pa'i las// bsad par gyur kyang ma bsad de// 'khor ba'i rnam par rtog pa tsam// de bzhin nyid du yid kyis rtogs// de nas yi ge phaT spel ba'i// 'khor lo
194b5(rgyud): gnyis ni bris byas te// bsgrub bya'i ming ni yang dag blang // sngags kyis sbyar te bri bar bya// rta dang ma he mnyam zhon pa'i// bsgrub bya bltas te yang dag bris// thod pa kha sbyar nang gzhag ste//
194b6(rgyud): srad bu sngon pos dkri bar bya// khro ba'i sems kyis nyi phyed dam// mtshan mo de yi khyad par la// rab tu gtum pa'i bzhi mdo 'am// dur khrod 'jigs pa'i dbus su ni// gsang nas bsgos te
194b7(rgyud): gzhug par bya// sngar bshad cho ga bzhin du mchod// rta dang ma he dag 'thabs pas// de yi mod la 'byed par byed// gnyis ka khro zhing khro bas 'jigs// g.yul 'gyed pa yi bdag nyid che// phan
195a1(rgyud): tshun rtsod pa byed pas ni// rnam par sdang 'gyur gzhan du min// yi ge hUM phaT rnam spel ba'i// cho ga 'di nyid kyis 'dir bri// sngags dang bsgrub bya mnyam ldan pa// dur dro//
195a2(rgyud): ras la bris nas ni// thod pa kha sbyar nang bzhag ste// srad bu nag pos dkris nas ni// he ru kar ni bsgoms nas su// ro bsregs sa brkos sba bar bya// mdun du yaM las byung ba'i rlung /
195a3(rgyud): gzhu yi dbyibs can dbus gnas shing // kha dog sngon po rnga mo zhon// lho phyogs su ni bskyod pa dang // khro ba'i tshogs kyis khrid pas na// sa stengs smyon pa bzhin du byed// yi ge hUM phaT sbyar
195a4(rgyud): ba yi sngags ni rgyun mi 'chad par bzlas// gang gi cho ga ci byas pa// de yi mod la slong bar 'gyur// sgrub po lhor bltas khros pa yis// ra khrag dur khrod thal ba dang // dug dang lan tshwa 'bru
195a5(rgyud): mar che// myos byed 'dab ma'i khu ba ni// ske tshe mnyam par yang dag sbyar// dur khrod ras la de bzhin du// 'khor lo gnyis po nyid rim bzhin// cho ga rdzogs par bri bar bya// gsad pa gshin rje'i
195a6(rgyud): mnan pa ri rab dbus te dgug/ sha ra b+ha yi seng ger gnas// 'di ltar las ni brtag par bya// las ni dag dang bral ba'i las// bsgrubs kyang des ni mi 'grub ste// bla ma'i man ngag med pa'i las//
195b1(rgyud): stong pa bzhin du 'bras med 'gyur// 'di ni las rab 'byam 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rim par phyed pa ste bcu pa'o// de nas sngags kyi bzlas pa yi// mtshan nyid gsang ba bshad/
195b2(rgyud): bar bya// ri bo tshang tshing ri sul dang // rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram dang ni// bzhi mdo dang ni 'dun khang gnas// dur khrod dam ni yid dga' ba// sngon du dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// phyi nas lha yi bdag nyid
195b3(rgyud): kyis sngar bshad cho gas yang dag par// sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs bya// ri 'am ri bo'i gnas su ni// snying po'i sngags ni bzla bar bya// oM shrI badz+ra he ru ka huM hUM phaT swA hA/ 'bum phrag gcig tu
195b4(rgyud): bzlas nas ni// bcu cha yi ni sbyin sreg bya// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das dngos grub// myur du 'grub ste gzhan du min// tshang tshong ljon shing bshams par ni// rtag tu dkyil 'khor bris nas su//
195b5(rgyud): nye ba'i snying po'i sngags rtag tu// rgyun mi 'chad par bzla zhing sgrub// oM hrIHha ha huM hUM phaT/ 'bum phrag gsum du bzlas nas ni// bzlas pa'i bcu cha'i sbyin sreg bya// char dbab pa dang gter
195b6(rgyud): dang ni// ngag gi dngos grub bsgrub par bya// ri sul dri med chur bcas par// dkyil 'khor dge ba'i bris nas ni// rgyun mi 'chad par sngags bzlas te// zhal bzhi pa yi gsang sngags bzlas/
195b7(rgyud): oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha ni huM hUM phaT/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na huM hUM phaT/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya huM hUM phaT/ A na ya ho byid+yA rA dza huM hUM phaT/ rnal 'byor pa yis bzhi 'bum bzlas// bcu cha yi ni sbyin sreg bya// zhi dang
196a1(rgyud): rgyas dang bcud kyis len// de bzhin sems can don sgrub pa'o// rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram song nas// dkyil 'khor yang dag bris nas ni// lha mo'i sngags ni khyad
196a2(rgyud): par du// 'bum phrag gsum ni bzlas nas su// ji skad gsungs bzhin cho ga ni// rdzogs pas bcu cha'i sbyin sreg bya// oM badz+ra bai ro tsa ni ye huM hUM phaT swA hA/ 'jig rten dngos grub thams/
196a3(rgyud): cad dang // de bzhin mkha' spyod dngos grub bo// dur khrod du ni sngar bshad pa'i// cho ga'i rim pas dkyil 'khor bri// yi ge bdun pa'i gsang sngags ni// 'bum phrag gsum du bzlas la sgrub//
196a4(rgyud): bcu cha'i sbyin sreg byas nas las// rnam par nges pas bsgrub par bya// dbye ba dang ni bskrad pa'i las// khyad par du ni gsad pa'i las// rdo rje sems dpas gang gsungs bzhin// bzlas
196a5(rgyud): patsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// bzhi mdor dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// mnan pa'i cho ga bsgrub par bya// mkha' 'gro ma yi gsang sngags ni// khri bzlas pas ni 'grub par 'gyur// oM nA
196a6(rgyud): ki nI ye huM hUM phaT/ bcu cha'i sbyin sreg bsgrubs na ni// 'byung po ro langs 'grub par 'gyur// gtsug lag khang ngam 'dun khang du// dkyil 'khor mchog ni bri bar bya// lA ma'i sngags ni
196a7(rgyud): nges par yang // 'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas nas ni// lha mo bcu char sbyin sreg bya// oM lA me huM hUM phaT swA hA/ mig sman dang ni rkang mgyogs dang // de bzhin dbang du byed pa ni// 'grub par 'di
196b1(rgyud): mamachom med/ dbem zhing nyams dga'i gnas sun// rtag tu dkyil 'khor bu byas la/ 'ad+d+ha rgya sogs sngags kyis/ chog sngon bzhin bsgrub par bya// oM bat+tAr tsaN+Da d+hA \u0f7f
196b2(rgyud): 'bum phrag gnyis ni bzlas nas kyang // bcu cha yi ni sbyin sreg bya// rgyun mi 'chad par sngags bzlas te// gnod sbyin gnod sbyin mo rnams sgrubs// gzugs can ma yi gsang sngags ni/
196b3(rgyud): nges par 'bum phrag bzhi bzlas nas// lha mo bcu tsha'i sbyin sreg bya// 'grub par 'gyur bar the tsom med// oM rU pi NI ye huM hU~M phaT swA hA/ me tog dang ni spos dang dri// lha bshos gtor ma de
196b4(rgyud): bzhin te// bza' dang btung bas khyad par du// dkyil 'khor mchog ni mchod bya zhing // glu dang gar gyi khyad par gyis// phyag rgya sngags ni bsgrag par bya// yid 'ong dam tshig rnyed nas ni//
196b5(rgyud): phyogs su bzhag nas bsgrub bya ste// las ni gang gi khyad par gyis// de yi rigs sogs brtag par bya// lha yi rnam pa la gnas te// cho ga ji bzhin bzlas shing mchod// dus gang tshe na mi
196b6(rgyud): zhing / 'dir ni sngon du bsnyen pa bya// myos byed gtor mar mnyam ldan pas// sngags kyi nus pa bsgrub bya ste// brgya dang stong dang 'bum gyi bar// der ni grangs nyid mtshon par bya// grangs med
196b7(rgyud): sngags ni bzlas pa yis// bla na med pa'i dge ba 'byung // de dag nges par sbyor ba yis// bsgrubs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// 'di ni sngags kyi bzlas pa'i nges pa bstan pa'i rim/
197a1(rgyud): par phye ba ste bcu gcig pa'o// / yang dag cho ga gang gis 'dir// grub par the tsom med pa yi// bzlas pa'i 'phreng ba'i mtshan nyid ni// gnod//
197a2(rgyud): sbyin bdag po legs par nyon// gser dang dngul dang zangs ma dang // de bzhin shel dang dung la sogs// zhi dang rgyas pa dag la sbyar// zhi la ril bu brgya pa ste// ril bu brgya rtsa brgyad pa ni// rgyas
197a3(rgyud): pa'i las la rab bsngags te// mkhas pas rgyal srid ched dam dpal// bde spro phun sum tshogs phyir bzlas// dbang dang dgug pa'i rab sbyor la// gur kum la sogs dri'i ril bu// b+ha ru tsan dan/
197a4(rgyud): dmar po'i 'bru// rtag tu ril bu lnga bcu'o// ru rak+Sha dang lung tang 'bras// de bzhin mi rus rnga mo dang // bong bu ma he'i rus pa ni// drag spyod lkugs dang mnan pa dang // dbye bas dgra ni tshar gcad dang /
197a5(rgyud): gsad dang bskrad la sbyar bya ste// las kyi khyad par ji lta bar// bzlas pa'i 'phreng ba'ang bya ba yin// bong bu rnga mo'i spu dang ni// khwa yi sgo ni bsre byas la// mnan dang bskrad pa'i las la ni// de yi srang/
197a6(rgyud): bus brgyu bar bya// rta dang ma he'i spu yis ni// rnam par sdang la srad bu bya// dur khrod sgra yi srad bu dang // khyi yi spu ni bsre bya ste// de yi srang bu drug po yi// las la bsngags phyir sbyar bar bya/
197a7(rgyud): dge ba'i las la gzhon nu mas// bkal ba'i srad bus brgyu bar bya// zhi ba la ni mdzub la gzhag/ rgyas pa rtag tu gung mo yis// ming med kyis ni dbang zhes gsungs// tha ma yis ni mngon spyod
197b1(rgyud): yin// mthe bong lha yi rang bzhin gyis// las kun las ni sbyar bar bya// ril bu dgra bcom mdo 'dzin ni// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin te// bzlas pa'i 'phreng ba'i khyad par gyis// mnyam
197b2(rgyud): gzhag sgom zhing bzlas par bya// rdzogs ldan dus su gcig bzlas pa// gsum ldan dus su nyis 'gyur bzlas// gnyis ldan dus na sum 'gyur bshad// rtsod dus bzhi 'gyur du ni bkra/
197b3(rgyud): sngags kyi grangs ni bzhi po yis// rgyun mi 'chad par gsang sngags bzlas// bzlas pa'i 'phreng ba sogs bsdus pa// 'di ni ngag gi bzlas pa ste// lha yi gzugs su dmigs pa yis/
197b4(rgyud): spro dang bsdu ba'i bdag nyid can// sngags kyi de nyid brda yis ni// 'gro dang 'ong ba yang dag gsum// mtha' gsum las ni rnam grol ba// don dam de bzhin nyid kyi don// 'di rnams sngags
197b5(rgyud): kyi bzlas pa yi// cho ga'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa yin// 'di ni sngags kyi bzlas pa'i bgrang 'phreng nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu gnyis pa'o// de nas
197b6(rgyud): gzhan yang bshad bya ba// lha yi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba ste// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa can// dngos grub yon tan kun gyi gnas// 'dod pa'i yon tan kun khyab pa'i// sa phyogs mkhas
197b7(rgyud): pas yang dag brtag khrag 'thung phyag gnyis sbyor ldan pas// phung po lnga sogs nga rgyal bya// zhal bzhi pa yi sngags brjod pas// phyogs ni bcing zhing ra ba ste// oM suM b+ha ni suM b+ha nits+tshadz+dza
198a1(rgyud): phaT shar du'o// oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hu hUM phaT/ byang du'o// oM gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya huM hUM phaT// nub tu'o// oM A na ya ho bi d+yA rA dzA hu~M hUM phaT/ lho ru'o// phyogs su se goH/
198a2(rgyud): brdabs pa yis// gdug pa'i bdud ni bskrad par bya// snying ka'i chu skyes huM yig las// 'od zer 'phreng ba spro bar bya// de yi snang bas mdun du ni// bla ma sangs rgyas sogs bltas la/
198a3(rgyud): phyag btsal me tog bdug sogs pas// mchod de rjes la sdig pa bshags// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro zhing // byang chub sems ni rnam par skye// gzhan la phan pa'i sems ni byams
198a4(rgyud): pa ste/ gzhan gyi sdug bsngal 'joms byed snying rje yin// gzhan gyi bde bas tshim pa dga' ba ste// sems can kun snyoms btang snyoms rnam par bsam// oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA
198a5(rgyud): ba shud+d+ho&haM zhes bya bas/ sems tsam nyid la rnams gnas shing // byang chub tshogs ni bsgom par bya// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ rten dang brten pa'i gzugs su ni// b+hai raM b+ha
198a6(rgyud): la sogs pa bsam// yaM las byung ba'i rlung dkyil 'khor// gzhu 'dra kha dog sngon po ste// de yi steng du raM las ni// me yi dkyil 'khor gyi ni gzugs// kha dog dmar po zur gsum pa// rdo rje rtse/
198a7(rgyud): gsum gyis mtshan pa'o// de yi steng du baM byung ba'i// chu yi dkyil 'khor zlum po dkar// de yi steng du'ang laM byung ba'i// sa yi dkyil 'khor zur bzhi pa// kha dog ser po grwa bzhir ni// de
198b1(rgyud): bzhin rdo rje rtse gsum mtshan// de yi steng du suM byung ba'i// zur bzhi pa ni ri rab steng // rin chen bzhi yi bdag nyid mdzes// rtse mo brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o// de yi steng du hUM byung ba'i// sna tshogs
198b2(rgyud): rdo rje rnam par bsgom// de yi steng du pad+ma ni// lte ba ge sar ldan par bsgom// de dbus A li kA li yi// dag pa'i sbyor ba bsgom par bya// de yi dbus su yi ge hUM// rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin
198b3(rgyud): las 'a nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus bzhugs pa'i// dpal he ru ka rnam par bsgom// dpa' bo zhal gsum phyag drug pa// g.yas brkyang ba yis gdan la bzhugs// rtsa ba'i zhal ni nag po
198b4(rgyud): ste g.yas pa kun da lta bu ste// g.yon pa dmar po cher 'jigs pa'o// ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa// 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag/ mnan cing bde ba chen por bzhugs// rdorje
198b5(rgyud): rnam snang mdzad mas 'khyud// thugs rje'i chags pas shas cher dgyes// phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu ni// mnyam par ldan pas yang dag 'khyud// gnyis pa'i phyag ni mchog gnyis kyi// glang chen
198b6(rgyud): pags pa gos su 'dzin// g.yas kyi gsum pas cang te'u ni// chos kun ngo bo nyid sgra sgrogs// g.yon gyi phyag ni gsum pa yis// kha T+wAM ga rte nathong pa bsnams// thod pa'i 'phreng bas thod du
198b7(rgyud): mdzad// zla ba phyed pas rnam par brgyan// dbu la sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan// rigs kyi bdag pos cod pan mdzad// zhal ni rnam 'gyur cher 'jigs pa// sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'o//
199a1(rgyud): stag gi pags pa'i na bza' can// mi mgo nyi shu'i phyed kyis brgyan// lha ni phyag rgya lnga 'chang zhing // gar gyi nyams ni dgu dang ldan// de la 'khyud pa'i bcom ldan/
199a2(rgyud): ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis spyan gsum ma// gcer bu ban du ka yi mdog/ dum bus brgyan pa'i sku rags can// skra grol ba dang rnam par gtsigs// khrag la dgyes shing 'dzag pa'o//
199a3(rgyud): phyag g.yon 'khyud pas gdug pa yi// bdud sogs khrag can thod pa 'dzin// g.yas pa sdigs mdzub rdo rje can// bskal pa'i me 'dra'i sku chen ma// byin pa gnyis ni mnyam 'khyud cing // rtag
199a4(rgyud): tu bde ba cher dgyes pa'o// mkha' 'gro de bzhin lA ma dang // khaN+Da ro he gzugs can ma// dngos grub kun gyi bde 'byung ba// pad+ma'i phyogs kyi gnas su dgod// gnag dang ljang dang dmar ba dang //
199a5(rgyud): ser skya'i mdog can spyan gsum ma// zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis ma ste// kha T+wAM thod pa'i phyag ldan ma// g.yas pas rdo rje gri gug rtse// gcer bu g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs// skra grol mche ba
199a6(rgyud): gtsigs pa'i zhal// phyag rgya lngas ni rnam par brgyan// mtshams kyi 'dab ma bzhi la ni// byang chub sems la sogs pa'i snod// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa dang // glu dang gar gyi dga' bdes mchod//
199a7(rgyud): sgo bzhir lha tshogs gnas pa ste// rtag tu lha rnams bsgom par bya// shar gyi sgor ni khwa gdong ma// phyag gnyis sngon mor bsgom par bya// byang gi sgor ni 'ug gdong ma// ljang ku skra ni grol ba mo/
199b1(rgyud): bzhin gyi gdong ma ni dmar// nub kyi sgor ni yang dag gnas// phag gdong ma ni ser mo ste// sgor yi dgas gdan la gnas// me dang de bzhin bden bral dang // rlung dang dbang ldan mtshams
199b2(rgyud): su ni 'ag shin rje brtan ma po nya mo// gshin rje mche ba 'joms ma ste// de bzhin zur gnas lha mo ni// yid 'phrog gzugs ni gnyis ma ste// yi dgas la gnas drag mo che// phyag rgya lngas ni rnam
199b3(rgyud): brgyan pa'o// g.yon na thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ g.yas na rdo rje gri gug ste// rnal 'byor ma ni de rnams kun// dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ba'o// de nas go cha gnyis shes nas// ye shes 'khor lo//
199b4(rgyud): rnam par sgom// sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis// dam tshig 'khor lor mnyam par gzhug/ de nas cho ga gnyis bshad par bya ste/ oM ha snying khar ro// na maHhi mgo bo la'o// swa ha hu s+thi
199b5(rgyud): gtsug tu'o// bo ShaT he phrag pa gnyis la'o// hUM hUM ho mig gnyis la'o// phaT haM yan lag thams cad la ste/ mtshon cha'o// dang po rdo rje sems dpa' ste// gnyis pa rnam par snang mdzad bzhug/
199b6(rgyud): gsum pa pad+ma gar dbang ste// dpal he ru ka bzhi par grags// lnga pa rdo rje nyi ma yin// drug pa de bzhin rta mchog ste// go cha drug po rnams kyis bsrungs// oM bo ni rdo rje rnam snang mdzad ma'o// oM haM/
199b7(rgyud): mo no gshin rdzo'o// oM rngo mon rmongs byed ma'o// e dro tron spyod byed ma'o// a hU d+hu ni skrag byed ma'o// phaT phaT ni gtum mo lus thams cad la mtshon cha ste/ lte ba dang / snying ka dang / de bzhin du la/
200a1(rgyud): dang / mgo bo dang / spyi gtsug la de bzhin du ni mtshon cha yin no// oM yo ga shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHyo ga shud+d+hoHhaM/ lag pa g.yas pa dang g.yon pa snying kar bzhag skye
200a2(rgyud): pad+ma'i rgyas pa'i gar bya'o// snying po'i phyag rgya la sogs lha// bskor ba mkha' 'gro dra ba'i sdom// rnal 'byor 'di ni gtso bo mchog/ lha yi rnal 'byor rnam par bsgom// chos dang longs
200a3(rgyud): spyod rdzogs sprul pa// bde chen 'khor lo sbyar bar bya// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i rtsa rnams ni// lus kun dag par byed pa ste// gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi yis// lus ni sdud cing 'dzin pa yin// lus 'di
200a4(rgyud): dpa' bo'i rang bzhin te// 'di ste sangs rgyas kun mtshungs pa'o// gnyis med rnam pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// bsam gyis mi khyab go 'phang bstan// rjes mthun rnal 'byor sems kyis ni//
200a5(rgyud): go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya// 'di ni dpal he ru ka'i bskyed pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu gsum pa'o// de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor ma// mchod pa yang dag rab bshad bya/
200a6(rgyud): gnas sogs bgrod par mi nus na// phyi yi rnal 'byor ma mchod bya// rang gi khyim du rnal 'byor ma// mchod de sngon du bsnyen sogs bya// sngon du bsnyen pa med pa las// de yi don mod yod
200a7(rgyud): su ngal// mar ngo yi ni tshes bcu 'am// yang ngo'i yang ni de bzhin te// khrus dang gtsang sbra sogs ldan pas// dad pa'i sems kyis spyan drangs te// rang gi khyim du shar bltas par// yang
200b1(rgyud): dag gnas pas lha mo mchod// gur kum mig sman de bzhin du// li khri yis ni mgo la byug/ lag pa rkang pa gdong de bzhin// byug pas byug cing mchod par bya// mgo la me tog 'dra/
200b2(rgyud): ba dpyangs// dri zhim pa yi bdug pas bdug/ gcig dang gsum dang bzhi dang lnga// khyad par du ni bdun dang dgu// ji srid nyi shu bzhi yi bar// yon bdag nges par da pa yis// bza'
200b3(rgyud): dang myos byed btung ba dang // nya dang shA la sogs ldan pas// phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs nas mchod// dpa' bos brda yis bstan par bya// rdo rje rnam snang mdzad pa'i tshogs// lha yi bdag
200b4(rgyud): nyid rtag tu mchod// gtor ma'i bya ba sngon 'gro bas// mar me lnga dang bza' ba dbul// glu dang bstod par rab ldan pas// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams mchod// 'dir ni brtson pas rdo rje lha mo rnam/
200b5(rgyud): myos byed shA yis rab tu mchod byas te// dpal ldan rdo rje theg par mos gyur de'i// dad pas ston mos de rnams mchod byas na// thugs ni mnyes pas mchog ni stsol 'gyur te// gang phyir/
200b6(rgyud): mchog ni de yi lag na gnas// rnal 'byor ma ni mchod nas su// zhi rgyas mtshan ma brtag bya ste// gzhon nu ma mchod skad cig la// dge dang mi dge'i las 'bras brtag/ gang zhig lag
200b7(rgyud): gnyis nyed pa na// yid ni mnyes par ma gyur nas// des na nang rnams 'phel ba dang // sdug bsngal thob pa nyid du 'gyur// mchod byas de yi skad cig la// gang mo'i sgra ni phyung gyur na//
201a1(rgyud): nad med pa ni mi 'grub cing // 'chi ba nyid du the tshom med// mchod pa'i mod la 'du byed cing // mig gnyis nyed par phyed na ni// skad cig la ni 'chi zhes brjod// sgrub pos/
201a2(rgyud): rtag tu mchod byas pas// so so so sor zung rer ni// phan tshun gdong ni phyogs gyur na// thams cad du ni rtsod 'gyur bar// gzhon nu mas ni rtag tu ston// rnal 'byor ma ni rgyab phyogs blta// so//
201a3(rgyud): yis sen mo 'cha' byed na// sha yi bza' bas ma tshim ste// slar yang las ni dgos par 'gyur// bza' dang btung ba thams cad kyi// ston mos mnyes par ma gyur ni// mchod la sogs pa/
201a4(rgyud): glo bur ba'i// nang ni 'phral du skye bar 'gyur// 'di ltar glu dang rol mo byed// yang dang yang du rgod pa na// rgyal po chom rkun 'jigs pa dag/ gzhon nu de ston mkhas pas brtag/ myos byed
201a5(rgyud): 'thungs nas yang dang yang // rnam pa du mas gar byed na// de rnams la ni nad chen 'byung // mchod pa'i dus su brtag par bya// ston mo'i bza' ba thams cad ni// dor nas phyogs su lta byed na/
201a6(rgyud): spyod pa nyams par byas pa'i skyon// lha rnams bdag la 'khrugs pa'o// phan tshun gtam la 'jug pa dang // gal te phan tshun rgod byed na// gtso bo'i cho ga nyams par ni// gzhon nu de bstan
201a7(rgyud): shes par bya// zos ma thag tu skyugs byed na// smyo ba'i nang ni 'byung bar ston// mdzes ma gal te 'gro ba'i tshe// rgyab kyi phyogs su lta byed na// slar yang las ni dgos pa dang // yun ring zhing
201b1(rgyud): nas nad 'byung ston// sa la rkang pas nyed pa na// gnas ni 'pho ba'i don du 'gyur// mchod ngus babs par gyur na ni// phan tshun g.yul ni 'gyed par ston// rnam 'gyur 'di dag phral bas ni/
201b2(rgyud): mchod pa 'grub par mtshan par bya// de bas brtson pas mchod nas ni// sgrub pos rtag tu brtag par bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams mchod// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu kun rab ster// 'di ni rdo rje rnal
201b3(rgyud): 'byor ma mchod pa'i cho ga nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas de phyir snod kyi ni// mtshan nyid mchog ni yang dag bshad// 'jim pa'am de
201b4(rgyud): bzhin rus sbal snod// 'khar ba'am zangs sam lcags las byas// gser ram dngul las byas pa 'am// dung ngam de bzhin nya phyis te// bal po se'u'i 'bras bu mchog/ de bzhin gzhan yang
201b5(rgyud): gsar byung ba// rA las byung dang shing snod sogs// gzhan yang rdo snod khyad par ro// dum bu gcig dang dum bu gnyis// de bzhin gsum dang bzhi dang lnga// dum bu drug dang dum bu bdun// dum/
201b6(rgyud): bu drug dang dum bu bdun// dum bu brgyad par rab tu grags// bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs sam// dmangs rigs bud med rigs mthar skyes// dkar dang dmar dang ljang skya dang // ser dang de//
201b7(rgyud): bzhin ser skya ste// thal ba'i mdog dang mdog ngan dang // sna tshogs mdog tu rab tu grags// lhag pa dman dang tha ma ste// de bzhin dbyibs ni sna tshogs dbye// gshong gnyis glang po'i rgyab lha
202a1(rgyud): bu de bzhin rdo rje'am khwa yi rkang // so ni ljang dang ser ba 'am// lto ba'am srin bus zos de bzhin// 'di kun rnam par bltas nas ni// de la yongs su brtag par
202a2(rgyud): bya sa gzhi mnyam pa'i yul rnams sam// thang ngam bye ma'i gshongs dag tu// sngags pas der ni bsgrubs byas la// de yi lhung ba brtag par bya// lhor bltas bram ze 'jigs par
202a3(rgyud): 'gyur// bden bral lhung bas ba lang dang // rigs med pa dang rigs ngan 'jig/ rlung bltas sngags ni 'jigs pa ste// byang du bltas na phyug por 'gyur// dbang ldan sngags kyi dngos
202a4(rgyud): grub ste// brtul zhugs rgyun ni nyams pa med// mer bltas nye bar 'phrog pa ste// de bzhin 'og bltas chom rkun ma'o// steng gnas gnas pas bud med 'joms// logs su lhung bas
202a5(rgyud): gtum mo ste// snod kyi mtshan nyid rnam shes bya// dum bu gcig pa gnas la dbang // dum bu gnyis pa dkyil 'khor dbang // dum gsum sgrub po'i dngos grub 'gyur// dum bu bzhi pas
202a6(rgyud): sngags dngos grub// lnga pa yis ni zhi dang rgyas// dum drug slong mo rnyed par shes// dum bu bdun pas dbang du byed// dngos grub sgrub pa 'bras med phyir// de bzhin dum bu brgyad pa spang //
202a7(rgyud): bu ga gcig pa bram zer 'gyur// bu ga gnyis pa rgyal rigs 'gyur// bu ga gsum pa rje'u rigs shes// bu ga bzhi pa dmangs rigs rnams// bu ga mang po'am bu ga med// mkhas pa yis/
202b1(rgyud): ni spang bar bya// bud med thod pa'ang mi gzung ste// khyad par du ni mdog nyams dang // so med pa 'am so nyams pa// dge ba 'dod pas bcang mi bya// so ldang bas ni sdug bsngal mang /
202b2(rgyud): kha yi rkang 'dras rtsod par 'gyur// gshong bu gnyis pas rgud par 'gyur// de bzhin glang po'i rgyab kyi nang // dbus kyi gnas su gshong bu bzhi// 'dod 'jo'i bar ni blta bar bya/
202b3(rgyud): mdun phyogs su ni gshong bu gnyis// yid bzhin nor bu zhes byar bshad// dung dang kun da zla ba yi// mdog mtshungs sdum pa shes par blta// sngags rnams kun gyi dngos grub ster/
202b4(rgyud): sgrub pos dngos grub thob par byed// che zhing mdog ni ser po 'am// pad+ma lta bu pad+mas mtshan// rgyas la bsngags par gsungs pa ste// nor ni phun sum tshogs pa 'grub// snod ni gang zhig
202b5(rgyud): kha dog dmar// gzhan yang thig le dmar por mtshan// rtag tu dbang dang dgug pa yi// dngos grub ster snod mtshan nyid do// ba lang kha lta bu yi dbyibs// shin tu sra zhing mu tig bcas//
202b6(rgyud): gsad dang bskrang dang dbye ba la// khyad par du ni rab tu bsngags// snod ni rab bsngags yang dag thob// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu kun rab ster// gnas dang zhing du bgrod nas ni// sgrub pos lha mo
202b7(rgyud): bsgrub par bya// mtshan nyid 'di dag yongs rdzogs pa// bcangs nas dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// 'di ni snod kyi mtshan nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste bco lnga pa'o//
203a1(rgyud): de nas de phyir bdud rtsi lnga'i// sgrub pa yang dag rab tu bshad// yang dag cho ga gang gis ni// dngos grub kun gyi 'bras 'byung ba'o// cho ga spangs par bram ze yi/
203a2(rgyud): mngal nas skyes las yang dag blang // des na rnam snang mdzad pa'i ming // grags te dngos grub yang dag bzhed// kha dog ltung zhing rab bzang lus// mig gi 'bras bu gnag pa yi// rin chen
203a3(rgyud): rigs ma rnyed nas de'i// dri chus bsangs te bsgrub par bya// yongs su rdzogs pa'i lus ldan zhing // yan lag mdzes gzhon pad+ma'i rigs// bza' dang btung bas yang dag mchod// mkhas
203a4(rgyud): pas mchod yon phul nas ni// de yi mod la snyoms 'jug bya// phan tshun gyi ni shu kra zang // des nA gAr mkhan rigs ming can// de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin grags// sngar bshad pa yi
203a5(rgyud): cho ga yis// dngos grub yongs su rdzogs bgrod pa// chos mkhan zhes ni rab grags pa'i// dang po'i me tog rab tu bsngags// dam tshig can ma'i gdol pa mo// gal te rnyed na rtag bsten bya/
203a6(rgyud): sha dang tshil dang de bzhin khrag/ mkhas pa yis ni gzung bar bya// sgrub po dngos grub 'dod pa yis// lcags kyu lha ni ji snyed pa 'am// 'dir ni gsad pa gtsor bshad pas// ci ste yang dag
203a7(rgyud): rnyed na gzung // ba lang sha dang rta sha dang // glang po'i sha yang de bzhin te// mi yi sha dang khyi yi sha// mkhas pa yis ni gzung bar bya// rdo rje sems dpas gang gsungs pa'i// sgron ma lnga zhes
203b1(rgyud): grags pa'o// rnyed nas chos bcu'i dus su ni// dngos po 'di dag yang dag bsdu// dri zhim pa dang bsres nas ni// rab tu gsang ste sbyar bar bya// sgrub pa po yis gsang ba yis// ril dzuH/
203b2(rgyud): rnam pa yang dag bya// de yi mod la yongs rdzogs pa'i// bza' dang btung ba'i khyad par gyis// tshogs kyi dbus su byin brlabs nas// phyi nas las ni yang dgra brtsam// sngags bzlam
203b3(rgyud): de bzhin bsam gtan dang // 'dod pa kun gyis 'bras 'byung zhing // lus kyi bcud kyis len dang ni// mchog tu grol ba'i dngos grub ster// rtag tu ril bu sten byed pa'i// 'dod pa kun gyis
203b4(rgyud): 'bras rab ster// las rnams kun la rab sbyar na// mkha' spyod go 'phang thob par 'gyur// 'di ni bdud rtsi lnga sgrub pa nges par bstan pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu drug pa'o//
203b5(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba yi// cho ga mchog ni yang dag bshad// 'di ltar 'ga' zhig gsol 'debs pa'am// rang nyid bsod nams 'dod pa yis// dang por rang lha'i bdag
203b6(rgyud): nyid kyi// 'khor lo la gnas sngon bsnyen bya// sngon du bsnyen pa'i dbang byas nas// der ni gtor ma sbyin par bya// brtan zhing zab mo'i chos shes pa// rab gnas gtor ma'i pha rol son//
203b7(rgyud): sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor de nyid shes// rig pa'i gnas ni thams cad rig/ gsang sngags tshul la dad cing mos// gzugs bzang blta na sdug pa dang // bla ma la gus brtser ldan na// sdom pa/
204a1(rgyud): 'byung bar rab bshad bya// gtsug lag khang dang mchod rten gnas// gnas khang 'dun khangs phyogs gtsang // gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod du// der ni dkyil 'khor
204a2(rgyud): brtsam par bya// sngon gyi las ni byas pa'i sar// brko ba la sogs mi bya ste// lag pas reg nas hUM yig gi/ sngags bzlas pas ni sa sbyang bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni sa yi chu// nyis 'gyur
