470a2(rgyud): phyag rgya bsten pa'i dus su yang // rnal 'byor ming sring brda yis mtshon// gang zhig mdzub mo ston pa na// 'ongs sam zhes ni 'dri ba yin// sor mo gnyis ni ston pa dang // mthe bong drang por
470a3(rgyud): ston pa dang // de bzhin srin lag drang por ston// rdo rje bo la zhes bya ste// pad+ma kak+ko la zhes bya// de ltar ma byas dam tshig nyams// brda yi bye brag ma lus pa// sa~M pu Ta ru shes par bya// lha mos
470a4(rgyud): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje pad+ma dga' ba'i gnas// de ru gzung ba ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de ru gzung ba rnam pa gnyis// rab kyis dbugs dang shes/
470a5(rgyud): pas gzung // dang po btsan thabs sbyor bas gzung // sbyor ba rnam pa bcu ru gzung // gcig ni sbom po khro mos gzung // gzung ba'i brten ni rnam pa bzhi// man ngag can gyis shes par bya// gal te de ru/
470a6(rgyud): ma yin na// 'khor bar ltung bas rang gis su// ting nge 'dzin gyis haM la bsdu// lce yis byang chub sems blangs la// ro ma'i 'khor lo ru ni bstim// de ltar ma byas dam tshig nyams// lha mos gsol/
470a7(rgyud): pa bcom ldan 'das// shes rab sbyor thabs 'ba' zhig gis// thabs kyis bskyod pa 'ba' zhig gis// rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma// bde ba khyad par med dam ci// bde ba'i ngo bo ji ltar lags//
470b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis b+haka myal pa// bskyod pa bud med kyis kyang baspyod// thapas kyang ni thus kyis kyang // de las ba ga khyung pad+ma phags/ da da nga rnalas bas /
470b2(rgyud): kyis sAl ma'i matsam myong // shes rab dar gyi sham bu tsam// de phyir rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud// rnal 'byor ma yis 'grub par gsungs// rgyud kyi nang na mchog yin pa sa// rabya gnas sbyin drug
470b3(rgyud): dbang bskur dang // mchod dang bzlas dang gtor ma dang // khrus dang srung ba la sogs pa// gsang ba 'di las gzhan na med// 'bras bu'i nang na 'di mchog ste// ye shes lha yi spos dang bral// de nas
470b4(rgyud): lha mos 'khor dpag tu med pa dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'dod chags kyi the tshom yongs su zad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la kun gyis 'khyud nas gsang ba'i mchod pas bde ba chen po'i ros gang bar
470b5(rgyud): mchod nas mi snang bar gyur to// gsang ba'i yang gsang ba gsang ba rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal po 'khor lo sdom pa'i rtog pa rgyu dang 'bras bu'i de kho na bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//
470b6(rgyud): gsang ba rdo rje'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// paN+Di ta rat+na badz+ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o//
470b7(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shrI gu h+ya sarba ts+tshin+da tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba thams cad gcod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di/
471a1(rgyud): skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par zhugs
471a2(rgyud): so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams kyis g.yon phyogs nas bskor ba lan gsum byas nas phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas 'di skad ces
471a3(rgyud): gsol to// kye ho bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin// gsang ba zhes pa ji ltar lags// de yi gcod pa ji ltar lags// rgyud kyi don ni ji ltar lags// de yi rgyal po'ang ji ltar lags//
471a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang ba zhes pa rnam pa bzhi// dang po bum dbang dang 'brel ba'o// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor te// rten dang brten par sgom pa ni// snod
471a5(rgyud): bcud gzung 'dzin rnam rtog rnams// spong phyir nga yis gsungs pa yin// de yi khyad par dgongs pa'i don// dang po stong nyid la sogs pa// rgyud gzhan du ni nga yis gsungs// rten dang brten pa'i
471a6(rgyud): bye brag la// dang po rten gyi dgongs pa yang // thugs kha'i yi ge hUM las ni// mar mo gcig las gnyis kyi tshul// kha dog nag po'i e 'phros pas// gru gsum rgya che gting ring bsam// gru gsum sku
471a7(rgyud): gsung thugs yin te// dug gsum 'joms pa dgongs pa'i don// logs ni rnam thar gsum yin te// lus ngag yid gsum las byung ba'i// mi dge bcu 'joms dgongs pa'i don// chos kyi sku ni//
471b1(rgyud): dri med kyis// rang bzhin gyis ni kun la khyab// de phyir rgya chen dgongs pa'i don// 'phags pa nyan thos rang rgyal dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang // chos sku rtogs pa ma yin pas/
471b2(rgyud): gting ring ba ru dgongs pas bshad// de nas thugs kha'i b+h+rUM las yang // hUM 'phros pa las rdo rjer gyur// rdo rje gur du gyur pa yang // dang po che yi bar chod dang // gnyis pa thar pa'i bar chod de/
471b3(rgyud): bgegs ni rnam pa gnyis yin te// phyi yi bgegs dang nang gi bgegs// phyi yis tshe yi bar chod byed// nang gis thar pa'i bar chod byed// bar chod rnam pa gnyis bsrung bas// rdo rje gur gyi dgongs
471b4(rgyud): pa'i don// yaM las byung ba'i gong dang 'dra// dbyibs ni zla gam lta bu ste// rnam par rtog pa spong ba dang // mi rtog pa ni skye ba la// dbang du byed pas dbang gi don// ba dan bzhi yi dgongs pa yang //
471b5(rgyud): chos rnams dus gsum gnas pa yi// dgongs pa yin pa'ang nga yis gsungs// raM las me yi dkyil 'khor ni// zur gsum drag po'i dgongs pa yin// rdo rje rtse gsum sku gsum don//
471b6(rgyud): las chu yi dkyil 'khor te// zlum po spros pa zhi bar gsungs// bum pa chos sku'i yan lag bzhi// laM las gser gyi sa gzhi ste// gru bzhi rgyas pa'i rang bzhin te// rdo rje rtse lnga ye shes
471b7(rgyud): lnga 'di stang ri rab rtse mo brgyad// rnam thar brgyad kyi dgongs pa yin// snod bcud rnam rtog mi mnga'i rtags// dur khrod brgyad ni g.yas dang g.yon// go rims bzhin du dgod par bya// re re'i bye brag
472a1(rgyud): rnam rtog yang // bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya// gnyen po'i stobs ni yongs su rgyas// shing rnams rim bzhin rtag tu dgod// rnam rtog mi dge bcu yi don/
472a2(rgyud): 'joms pa'i rtags su phyogs skyong dgod// 'dod chags zhe sdang ma rig pa// gdug pa 'joms phyir klu brgyad dgod// thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa// gzugs sku gnyis kyi nga rgyal gyis// lus
472a3(rgyud): dang ngag gis sems can gyi// don mdzad phyir ni char sprin mdog/ nang dang gsang ba de bzhin no// de bzhin mthar thug bzhi pa yang // snyan nas brgyud pa shes par bya// de nas nang du gzhal yas
472a4(rgyud): khang // bruM las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad de// rtsibs brgyad rnam shes brgyad kyi dngos// yongs su gyur pas rnam snang sku// phyi nas bltas pas nang du gsal// de bzhin nang nas phyi ru gsal//
472a5(rgyud): thams cad gcig tu snang ba'i don// rin chen sna lnga sku lnga'i don// kha dog lnga ni rigs lnga'i don// gru bzhi tshangs pa'i gnas bzhir gsungs// logs bzhi bsdu ba'i dngos po ste// sgo bzhi dran pa
472a6(rgyud): nyer gzhag bzhi// ka ba brgyad ni rnam thar brgyad// gdung bzhi ye shes bzhi yi don// tA ra Na la sogs pa kun// stobs la sogs pa yin par gsungs// de nas nang du gdan rnams ni// pad+ma'i sa/
472a7(rgyud): bon dbyangs las skye// 'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs kyis// ma gos rtags su pad+ma'i gdan// de steng nyi ma zla ba ste// thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi brda// dang po re ni nga bdag gam// rnam
472b1(rgyud): rtog 'joms phyir gsungs pa yin// yan lag bzhi ldan gtso bo'i gdan// 'khor la re re gdan du sbyin// gtso bo'i yan lag yin pa'i phyir// dgongs pa'i don dang bcas pa yi// rten gyi dkyil/
472b2(rgyud): 'khor rdzogs pa'o// de nas lha rnams bskyed pa ni// skye ba bzhi yi tshul yin te// skad cig las byung ba rdzus pa'i tshul// dper na chu gting las na nyi// rkyen las skye badrod gsher tshul// dper na nyi
472b3(rgyud): mas pad+ma bzhin// spro zhing bsdu ba sgong skyes tshul// dper na rdo las zangs bzhin no// sbyor ba las byung mngal skyes tshul// ya ra la bsreg cing mar la gso// dper na spra tshil las ni lugs// pho/
472b4(rgyud): brang rnam par snang mdzad rdzogs// rjes su bskyed pa he ru ka/ dbang bskur bcom ldan mi bskyod pa// bstod pa rin chen 'byung ldan yin// mchod pa don yod grub pa'o// bdud rtsi myang ba 'od dpag med/
472b5(rgyud): yan lag drug las byung ba yi// dngos grub 'di ni khyad par 'phags// de nas bzlas pa'am sgom pa ni// dbang po rab 'bring tha ma'i steng // rab kyis yongs su rdzogs pa yi// sgom pa'am bzlas
472b6(rgyud): pa bya bar gsungs// 'bring gis gtso bo yab yum yin// mtha' ma dbu ma'i spyan la 'jug/ dbu ma'i spyan la brtan gyur nas// sum cu rtsa bdun rdzogs par sgom// 'bring po yis kyang de bzhin te/
472b7(rgyud): gnas pa rtsa dang g.yo ba rlung // bkod pa sems dang dman pa dbyibs// zab pa sngags dang thig le dang // mthar thug chos dang yan lag bdun// 'di yis bstan pa shin tu zab// gong du gsungs pa/
473a1(rgyud): thams cad kyang // rnam pa bzhi ru shes par bya// re re la yang bzhi bzhi ste// du ma'i tshul ni shin tu zab// phyi dang nang ni sngags kyi don// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor phyi yi don/
473a2(rgyud): phyi la ltos nas nang yin te// de nyid gsang ba gsang ba'i don// las su rung ba mthar phyin don// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor phyi yi don// nang du dkyil 'khor mtshan nyid ni// phung po skye mched khams/
473a3(rgyud): rnams la// re re lha ru byin brlabs la// lnga 'am drug gam sum cu bdun// g.yas g.yon steng 'og sgro la sogs// bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// sum cu rtsa
473a4(rgyud): bdun zhes bya ba'i// yongs su rdzogs pa ji ltar lags// bskyed pa zhes pa ji ltar lags// de yi rim pa ji ltar lags// gzhan yang rten gyi dkyil 'khor dang // thun dang thun mtshams ji ltar
473a5(rgyud): lags// lta spyod zung du ji ltar 'jug/ dpa' bos bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sum cu rtsa bdun yang dag rgyu// 'bras bu gnyis med ye shes bskyed//
473a6(rgyud): de phyir 'bras bu sngon 'gro ba'i// rgyu ni gtso bor gyur pa yin// he ru kar gyur gcig la yang // rgyu rnams yongs su rdzogs pa ste// gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi sogs// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya/
473a7(rgyud): rgyu nor pa las ma yin te// gro las nas kyi myu gu min// ma tshang ba las ma yin te// 'bru nyams pa las myu gu med// rgyu med pa las ma yin te// nam mkha'i me tog las ni dri// rgyu de rkyen me
473b1(rgyud): pa las med// nags sreg me la rlung med bzhin// de ltar yan lag bzhi ldan pa'i// las dang po yis rnam rtog spang // lha yi rnal 'byor la gnas pas// bskyed pa zhes ni gsungs pa yin/
473b2(rgyud): phyi dang nang du du ma'i cha// de yi rim par bshad pa yin// rten gyi dkyil 'khor bye brag kyang // khyams dang bla gab med pa dang // bla gab bcas dang rnam pa gsum// mos pa'i dbang du gsungs pa yin/
473b3(rgyud): 'khor lo bzhi yi dbye ba yis// nyin thun bzhi ru gsungs pa yin// mtshams kyang bzhi ru shes par bya// dbyug gu chu tshod 'pho ba dang // thun brgyad sgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas// thun dang mtshams
473b4(rgyud): ni mnyam par gsungs// mtshams kyi tshe na rnal 'byor pa// dbang po 'bring dang tha ma yis// lha rnams rdzogs par spro byas pas// mar me gcig las gnyis kyi tshul// mchod pa la sogs tshul/
473b5(rgyud): bzhin bya// lta ba zhes pa mnyam gzhag ste// rjes thob spyod pa ru ni bshad// bskyed pa'i rim pa sgom pa la// rgyan drug 'chang ba'i spyod pa gnang // gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel ba la// rgyan dang bdu
473b6(rgyud): rtsi'i spyod pa gnang // rdo rje'i rigs dang rin chen rigs// pad+ma'i rigs dang las kyi rigs// spyod pa gnang bar nga yis gsungs// shes rab ye shes dang 'brel bas// gong du gsungs pa thun mong/
473b7(rgyud): ste// khyad par phyag rgya'i spyod pa gnang // lta ba mi ldan spyod pa dang // spyod pa mi ldan lta ba gnyis// 'di ni gsang sngags dam tshig ste// mnar med sems can dmyal bar skye// de phyir lha med spyod pa
474a1(rgyud): spyang 'azhin po khros pa'i spyod pa'o// spyod med lha 'di snang ba ste// dka' thub kyis ni lus gdungs shing // phung sogs rnam snang la sogs pa// brnyas pa rtog ge sum po yin/
474a2(rgyud): des na lta spyod zung du 'jug/ glang chen bzhengs kyang mnyam par bzhengs// glang chen bzhugs kyang mnyam par bzhugs// rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa// bdud rtsi zhes pa ji ltar lags// de yi spyod pa/
474a3(rgyud): ji ltar lags// de yi yon tan ji ltar 'byung // rgyan la sogs pa'i don rnams kun// gtso bos bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bdud rtsi rnam pa gsum du gsung //
474a4(rgyud): dang por phyi yi bdud rtsi bsten// bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga la// lcags kyu lnga ni dgod pa ste// brgyad dang bcu bzhi dang por 'dzag/ si h+la mi bskyod lung skam blang // bcu gnyis bcu drug dang por 'dzag/ he
474a5(rgyud): ru ka dang rnam snang dang // lu skam snying po blang bar bya// yar gyi ngo dang mar gyi ngo // brgyad dang bcu bzhi bco lnga la// thams cad bzang po'i dus su gsungs// seng ge'i gzugs ni dkar po bzang /
474a6(rgyud): lus ngag sdom zhing nyes pa med// 'di ni sha yi sgrub pa'i rten// glang po glang po chen po ste// ke ta ke yi rgyu nyid la// gla rtsi la sogs 'byung ba'i sha// ba glang gi wang ldan pa'i sha// rta ni rta yi rgyal
474a7(rgyud): po ste/ kha dog dkar min dmar ba min// dbyibs dang kha dog mi 'gyur sha// mi ni skye ba bdun pa'i sha// lus ngag yid la mkhas pas brtag/ bza' ba'i snod ni dum bu gcig/ de yi nang du bsgrub
474b1(rgyud): par bya// rab 'bring tha ma'i mtshan ma ni// 'bar dang dud pa spro ba rnams// mtshan ma phyi yi yin par bshad// gzhan skyes don ni rgas chen sel// skad ma phyin na dngos grub med// skad phyung
474b2(rgyud): bas ni tshangs par 'gyur// nang gi bdud rtsi rang byung yin// dril can bu ga dgu lam nas// 'dzag pa'i bdud rtsi rgyun chad nas// til gyi 'bru bzhin gang ba ste// a ba d+hU tIr dbugs chud
474b3(rgyud): pas/ steng gi drug pa'i rgyu ba yin// si h+la ga pur dbus na gnas// 'og gi drug pa rgyu ba yin// 'di ni gsang ba'i bdud rtsi ste// sgra dkar gnyer ma 'chi ba spong // spyod pa'i rnal 'byor rnam pa gnyis/
474b4(rgyud): gang zag mchog dang las dang po// bskyed pa'i rim la legs gnas shing // rigs su 'dzin pa spang ba'i phyir// phyi yi drug pa'i bdud rtsi sbyin// las dang po la phyi nang gnyis// 'di yi nus
474b5(rgyud): paba'ang du ma ste// skra dkar med cing rnam rtog 'joms// dkyil 'khor bzhi la rab tu gnas// lnga pa goms par gyur pa yis// drug pa gzung bar gsungs pa ste// kun rdzob steng gi sna rtse nas/
474b6(rgyud): sor bzhi nas ni dbus su gzhug/ lte ba'i gnas nas dbugs gnas pa// steng gi drug pa zin pa yin// 'di yi nus pa'ang du ma ste// sred pa med cing yang ba'o// 'dab chags rgyal po ji bzhin
474b7(rgyud): du nam mkhar 'phur zhing ltung ba med// mchog dang chad pa'i dbus gnas pa// 'og gi drug pa yin par bshad// gang zag mchog la gsungs pa yin// 'di yi nus pa'ang du ma ste// dril can
475a1(rgyud): bug 'gag par byed// rgyan gyis dang po zhe sdang 'joms// dur khrod chen po satwA ling // ru tra 'dul ba'i rim pa'o// bdud rtsis rnam rtog la sogs 'joms// 'phrin las
475a2(rgyud): bzhi ni thun mong yin// phyag rgyas 'dod chags rnam par dag/ rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// drug pa zhes pa ji lta bu// gang zag mchog ni ji lta bu// 'dod chags ji ltar rnam par dag/ dpa' bos bdag la/
475a3(rgyud): bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// g.yas g.yon steng 'og bzhi las ni// lnga pa nam mkha' 'byung ba yin// lnga pa rang bzhin med pa ste// drug pa zhes ni gsungs pa yin// dga'
475a4(rgyud): ba mchog dga' lhan cig dga'// bral ba'i dga' ba sngon 'gro bas// lnga pa bde ba chen po 'byung // bde chen rang bzhin med par dag/ 'og gi sgo yi drug pa yin// de phyir drug pa 'dod pas kyang /
475a5(rgyud): bzhi pa sngon du song ba yis// lnga pa yongs su rdzogs pa bsgom// dper na zangs kyi dngos po la// gser 'gyur rtsi yi nus pa yis// zangs nyid gser du 'gyur ba ste// zangs las ma gtogs gse
475a6(rgyud): nyid dang // lbu pa las gzhan drug pa ni// sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gsungs so// lo dang zla ba zla ba phyed// rin zhag dus drug dus gnyis la// skad cig re tsam drug la 'byung // las dang po yi spyod yul min/
475a7(rgyud): dper na chu yi snod nang du// bdud rtsi thigs pa gcig gzhag pa// chu ru nyams su myong ba las// gcig shos nyams su myong ba med// chu la brten nas bdud rtsi yang // nyams su myong bar byed pa ste/
475b1(rgyud): de bzhin spos bcas lnga pa la// brten nas spos med drug pa 'byung // rgyud gzhan du ni nga yis gsungs// mtshan ma lnga 'am ro brgyad dam// sa brgyad non nas mngon shes ldan// las kyi phyag rgya yod/
475b2(rgyud): su spangs// ye shes phyag rgya la gnas shing // phyag rgya chen po la 'jug pa// 'di ni gang zag mchog yin te// 'di yis drug pa zin par bshad// 'dod chags zhes pa 'khor ba ste// rnam dag mya ngan
475b3(rgyud): 'das par gsungs// de nas gsang ba gnyis pa yang // gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel pa ste// rten cing 'brel pa zab mo'i don// dang po lha yi nga rgyal bya// mkha' 'gro rtsa ru shes par bya// dpa' bo byang
475b4(rgyud): chub sems su shes// 'khor lo'i gnas dang 'khor lo dang // de nas bsgrub bya shes par bya// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo nas// tshangs mdo'i bar du sor mo'i tshad// bcu tshan bzhi dang brgyad yin te/
475b5(rgyud): sor gsum la ni 'khor lo re// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin yin// dbang gi gnas dang 'khor lo'i gnas// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// tshangs mdo ma la gzhang kha rlung // sor gsum sor bzhi mkhan
475b6(rgyud): pas brtag/ gnas gsum gsang ba'i gnas yin te// de bzhin gnas gsum rig pa'o// sor bzhi rta mgrin gnas yin te// sor brgyad gsang ba bde skyong gnas// rnal 'byor pha dang rnal 'byor ma'i//
475b7(rgyud): lus kyi rten gyi bye brag las// sor mo bzhi bcu brgyad gnyis las// brgyad ni gsang ba'i 'khor lo'i gnas// bzhi bcu las ni 'khor lo gzhan// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// thams cad rgal tshig/
476a1(rgyud): dbyug gu ste// phyi dang nang du mkhas pas brtag/ 'khor lo la yang rnam pa gnyis// dang por 'khor lo gnyis par rtsa// rkyen dang gsang ba rang bzhin dang // dbang dang rnam pa
476a2(rgyud): bzhi ru gsungs// rkyen la gnyis te gsang ba bzhi// rang bzhin bcu drug dbang ni gnyis// tsaN+Da lI ni nyi shu bzhi// 'khor lo bzhi ru sbas pa ste// tshogs nang bla ma mthong na rgyab kyis phyogs// man ngag
476a3(rgyud): gzhan du sbrel zhing 'phyar la dga'// 'dod chags spyod phyir sbas pa'i rim pa nod// gab pa'i don la rgyab kyis phyogs shing skur pa 'debs// gsang sngags bar du gcod cing rnal 'byor gzhan la
476a4(rgyud): gshes 'di ni mnar med sems can dmyal ba chen por skye// sangs rgyas stong dang rtsa gcig rdzogs pa tshe yi tshad// 'di la spos kyi thams cad la// nga yis sba bar ma gsungs so// de phyir rgyud gzhan/
476a5(rgyud): du ni sbas// rgyud 'dir nga yis rgyas par bshad// sum cu rtsa gnyis g.yas g.yon cha// drug cu rtsa bzhi grangs su spras// sum cu rtsa gnyis las ni zung // bcu drug grangs su smras pa yin// sum cu rtsa gnyis
476a6(rgyud): phyogs dang mtshams// brgyad kyi grangs su sbas pa'o// spyi gtsug 'khor lo spyi bor sbas// gsang ba bde skyong lte bar sbas// bcu drug las ni zung 'gyur ba// brgyad kyi grangs su sbas pa yin//
476a7(rgyud): drug las ni g.yas g.yon cha// sum cu rtsa gnyis grangs su sbas// bcu drug las ni bzhi bzhir 'gyur// drug cu rtsa bzhi'i grangs su sbas// mgrin pa longs spyod 'khor lo ru// ro drug la ni
476b1(rgyud): longs spyod pas// ro ma longs spyod 'khor lo sbas// rta mgrin 'khor lo mgrin par smras// brgyad las g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi cha// bcu drug grangs su sbas pa yin// brgyad las g.yas
476b2(rgyud): g.yon stong 'og bzhi// sum cu rtsa gnyis grangs su sbas// brgyad las g.yas g.yon steng 'og bzhi// mtshams bzhi dang ni brgyad kyi cha// drug cu rtsa bzhi grangs su sbas// tshangs mdo'i me ni me
476b3(rgyud): la sbas// snying ka chos kyi 'khor lo ru// chos kun rig pas rig par sbas// drug cu rtsa bzhi las ni zung // sum cu rtsa gnyis grangs su sbas// drug cu rtsa bzhi las ni bzhi// bcu drug grangs
476b4(rgyud): su sdus pa yin// drug cu rtsa bzhi las ni brgyad// brgyad kyis grangs su sbas pa'o// gzhang kha rlung ni rlung las spras// gsang ba'i gtum mo gtum mor sbas// 'khor lo re la 'khor lo bzhi/
476b5(rgyud): phyi ru srog gi rnam par 'khyud// chu dang chu bran chu bo rnams// sna tshogs du mar 'bab byed kyang // rgya mtsho chen por ro gcig 'gyur// lte bar rol pa bde chen sku// rnam par thar dang stong pa dang
476b6(rgyud): bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad ldan// snying kha chos kyi sku yin te// rnam thar la sogs de bzhin no// mgrin pa longs spyod de dang 'dra// bde chen sprul pa'ang de bzhin no// mtshan rnams steng la
476b7(rgyud): stong pa 'og/ dang po bde chen kha sbyor yin// rnam thar steng la dpe byad 'og/ bde chen kha sbyor gnyis pa yin// gzhan ni zhal las shes par bya// stobs bcu rnam dag kha sbyor bcu// rlung ni sgrol/
477a1(rgyud): ma'i ngo bo ste// rtsa drug dbugs kyi rang bzhin gang // me ni gos dkar rang bzhin te// zung rtsa gsum ni drod kyis gang // rang bzhin gyis ni gnas pa la// brgyad dang lnga li
477a2(rgyud): mtshan nyid la// brgyad la dbyangs kyi dang po brgyad// lnga la kA li dang po lnga// rig pa'i pho brang mtha' can lnga// rta mgrin dbyangs yig g.yon dang g.yas// a gnyis mthar bzhag 'dab dgu
477a3(rgyud): yin 'a gsang ba'i bde skyong 'khor lo ni// ma ning bzhi dang a gnyis dbus// byang chub sum cu rtsa bdun yin// de nas rtsa yi mtshan nyid kyang // phyi yi stong phrag bdun cu gnyis// sha la gnas nas
477a4(rgyud): tshatshil bu skyed// nang gi brgya dang nyi shu ni// tshil la gnas nas rkang skyed pa'o// gsang ba sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// rus par gnas shing ga pur skyed// de kho na yi rtsa gsum ni// gsang bar gnas shing bde
477a5(rgyud): ba skyed// khang pa stong phrag bdun cu gnyis// khang pa re la khang pa gsum// khang pa der gnas srin bu'i rigs// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis te// grangs ni 'bum du shes par bya// nang dang gsang ba'i
477a6(rgyud): rtsa la yang // srin bu'i rigs ni grangs su gsungs// de kho na yi rtsa gsum las// 'dod chags skyed pa'i srin bu dgu// nyin dang mtshan mo mtshams dang gsum// dgu ru mkhas pas shes par bya//
477a7(rgyud): rtsa der gnas pa'i ga pur yang // bdud rtsi sbyor ba las byung ba// bdud rtsi la sogs gong du gsungs// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang // raM las me yi dkyil 'khor bsam// de steng a
477b1(rgyud): las ka pA la// paM las pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsam// nang du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam// de ru sha la sogs pa dgod// gtso bo'i steng du sor bzhi 'am// mtho gang tsam du bsam pa ni// yi ge go
477b2(rgyud): bzlog bsam par bya// sngon po dmar po dkar po ste// hUM las gyur pa'i rdo rje bsam// de stengs yi ge maM bsam la// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng du bsam// 'di ni bdud rtsi'i kha sbyor ro// sha lnga las
477b3(rgyud): ni gdan lngar gyur// lcags kyu bdud rtsi lnga ru 'gyur// las kyi rlung gis me bus te// zla ba gtso bo la sogs zhu// tha mal pa yi bdud rtsi yin// yi ge gsum dang nyi ma zhu// lha yi bdud rtsi zhes ni bya/
477b4(rgyud): 'od zer gyis bkug ye shes kyi// bdud rtsi yin par nga yis gsungs// lan gsum bskor bar sku gsung thugs// 'di ni byin brlabs rnal 'byor ro// de nas bdud rtsi myang dang mchod// mchod pa'i
477b5(rgyud): rnal 'byor zhes ni gsungs// de nas rol pa'i rnal 'byor te// g.yas g.yon dgongs pa shes par bya// de nas zhu ba'i rnal 'byor yang // mnyam pa'i rlung dang gtum mo'i mes// ye shes bzhi yi
477b6(rgyud): ngo bor gyur// cha gcig mi bskyod rnam snang ste// sha za'i mkha' 'gro mnyam pa nyid// chu gcig bya ba nan tan te// srin bu las kyi mkha' 'gro mchod// cha gcig rlung dang mkhris pa ste// mkhris pas
477b7(rgyud): bad kan la sogs pa// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// rtsa ni ye shes mkha' 'gro yin// so sor kun rtog ye shes mchod// cha gcig rang bzhin med pa ste// me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis/
478a1(rgyud): rdo rje mkha' 'gro mchod par mdzad// rlung ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste// rtsa ni ye shes mkha' 'gro yin// ga pur sha za'i mkha' 'gro ste// srin bu las kyi mkha' 'gro yin//
478a2(rgyud): gzhan yang rtswa la sogs pa la// mkha' 'gro rnams kyi bye brag kun// go rims bzhin du shes par bya// sku ni las kyi mkha' 'gro ste// gsung ni sha za'i mkha' 'gro'o// thugs ni ye shes
478a3(rgyud): mkha' 'gro yin// bde chen rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste// gzhan yang 'khor lo dbus gnas ni// mkha' 'gro'i bye brag shes par bya// dga' ba las kyi mkha' 'gro ste// mchog dga' sha za'i mkha' 'gro
478a4(rgyud): 'o/ rang bzhin dga' ba ye shes yin// bde chen rdo rje mkha' 'gro'o// dpa' bo zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te// mkha' 'gro ma ni nyi ma'o// tsaN+Da lI ni nyi shu bzhi// sbas pa'i 'khor lo bzhi ru bsdu/
478a5(rgyud): bde chen longs spyod 'khor lor bsdu// longs spyod chos kyi 'khor lor bsdu// gong du bsdu ba'i rim pa yang // thig le la ni thams cad 'dus// dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig nyid la// nyi
478a6(rgyud): ma'i 'od zer phyogs bcu du mar snang // du ma'i 'od zer dkyil 'khor gcig tu 'dus// dper na 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal ba'i gdugs// shing gi 'khrul 'khor sbyor ba ji bzhin no// snying ka chos
478a7(rgyud): kyi 'khor lor bsdus nas kyang // nyi ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor tsa na ka yi tshad// de yi dbus su thig le yungs kar gyi ni tshad// sngags kyi 'phreng ba ba spu'i nyag ma tsam gyis ni// g.yas skor g.yon
478b1(rgyud): oM kA li A li sbrul ltar 'khyil// de dag thig le'i rnal 'byor te// 'di la sems ni brtan gyur nas// de nas phra mo'i rnal 'byor bsgom// zla ba A li kA li la// A li nyi ma la thim
478b2(rgyud): nas/ nyi ma zhabs skyed la thim bsam// zhabs skyed la sogs rim par thim// yan lag lnga ni ye shes lnga// de ni phra mo'i rnal 'byor te// de nas nA da phra mo la// sems ni rim par sgom
478b3(rgyud): pa'o// di nas rang rig ye shes te// chos kun stong par ro gcig pa'o// gzhan yang chos kyi 'khor lo dang // sprul pa yi ni 'khor lo gnyis// 'bar ba dang ni 'dzag pa'i tshul// bla ma'i
478b4(rgyud): zhal nas shes par bya// phyi yi rnam rtog rtsol ba ste// nang gi rnam rtog srog gi rlung // srog rtsol gnyis 'gags dbu ma ste// kun rdzob steng gi sna rtse nas// sor bzhi nas ni rtsa gsum gcig
478b5(rgyud): dbugs dgag pa yi gnas yin pas// dang por de ru gzung bar bya// de nas sprul pa'i gnas su bzung // yang na bgrang bar shes par bya// de nas gsang ba gsum pa ni// shes rab ye
478b6(rgyud): shes dang 'brel ba'i// dga' ba'i mtshan nyid bshad pa'o// gzhang kha g.ya' zhing ba spu ldang // dga' ba'i mtshan nyid mi dmigs pa// bcu gnyis rang bzhin yin par gsungs// byang chub
478b7(rgyud): sems rgyu mi rtog snyam// mchog dga' mi dmigs nyi shu lnga// gsang ba'i nor bu yongs su gang // lhan cig skyes dga' mi dmigs pa// chos kyi sku ni yin par gsungs// bde ba'i rgyun chad
479a1(rgyud): bral ba'i dga'// de yi mi dmigs gzugs sku gnyis// gzhan yang sngon du 'gro ba rnams// yan lag thabs dang sbyor ba dngos// dgongs pa dang bcas rim pa'o//
479a2(rgyud): skar ma'i tshogs ltar du mar spros mod kyang // nyi ma zla ba lta bur zung du 'jug/ nyi ma zla ba lta bur zung 'jug kyang // sgra gcan lta bur gnyis su med pa'o// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa/
479a3(rgyud): skar ma'i tshogs ni ji lta bu// zung du 'jug pa ji lta bu// gnyis su med pa ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// byang chub sum cu rtsa bdun ni// rgyu yi khyad par spros pa'o// sku
479a4(rgyud): gsum dang ni ye shes lnga// 'bras bu'i khyad par spros pa yin// rgyu rnams bdun du bsdu ba dang // 'bras bu gsum du bsdu ba'o// rgyu rnams 'bras bu la thim ste// 'bras bu gnyis su bsgom par
479a5(rgyud): bya/ chos kun sems kyi ngo bo ste// sems ni stong pa'i rang bzhin yin// thams cad stong par ro gcig pa// 'di ni blang dor med pa'i dbyings// 'dod chags rnam par dag bya'i phyir// 'dod chags
479a6(rgyud): sku yi phyag rgya lnga// phyag rgya chen po ye shes gnyis// dam tshig chos dang las phyag rgya// 'di la brten pa shin tu zab// 'di ni bde ba chen po ste// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin dag/ bde
479a7(rgyud): chen 'khor lo rnam pa gsum// gsang ba'i sna rtse e la gnas// sprul pa'i 'khor lo gang ba yin// rig pa la sogs de bzhin te// gsang ba bde skyong ba la gnas// rang bzhin bde chen
479b1(rgyud): 'khor lo ste// bde ba chen po'i ros gang ba// til dang til mar ji bzhin no// dper na shing sna bcad pa las// 'o ma 'dzag pa ji bzhin no// bde ba chen po de nyid las// skra yi rtse mo brgya stong /
479b2(rgyud): dang / khri dang 'bum gyi rnam pa ste// dang po sprin gyi rnam pa ste// gnyis pa du ba lta bu'o// gsum pa glog gi rnam pa ste// bzhi pa mar me lta bu'o// 'di dag kun gyi rim pa yang // sprul pa la/
479b3(rgyud): sogs rim pa bzhin// sprin gyi rnam pa skye ba ni// a ni skye ba'i mtshan ma yin// mar me lta bu'i 'chi ba yi// haM gi mtshan mar gsungs pa yin// lnga pa nam mkha' lta bu ni// gnyis su
479b4(rgyud): med pa bar ma do'i// mtshan ma stong par shes par bya// gzhan yang 'dar ba la sogs pa// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// de nas gsang ba gsum pa yang // shes rab ye shes 'brel ba
479b5(rgyud): ste/ dgra' ba bzhi yi mtshan nyid kyang // gzhang lam g.ya' zhing ba spu lhung // lus 'dar dga' ba'i ngo bo yin// gsang ba rdo rje rtswa lam nas// byang chub sems rgyu bde ba mnyam// mchog
479b6(rgyud): dga' yi ni ngo bo ste// rdo rje pad+ma 'gags pa snyam// lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bo yin// bde ba'i rgyun chad med pa snyam// bral ba dga' ba'i ngo bo yin// 'di rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid kyang // byang chub
479b7(rgyud): chen po la sogs pa// gong du gsungs par shes par bya// dga' ba snang ba zhes bya ste// mchog dga' snang ba mched pa yin// rab tu dga' ba snang ba thob// lhan cig skyes pa 'od gsal lo//
480a1(rgyud): ye shes bzhi yi rang bzhin te// bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i gnyen po yin// rags pa bzhi yis gsang ba 'joms// phra ba'i bdud bzhi rang bzhin gyi// 'khor lo bzhir
480a2(rgyud): 'joms pa yin// 'khor lo la brten dga' ba bzhi// de nyid ye shes bzhi ru snang // de phyir bdud bzhi 'joms pa yin// 'dod chags la brten dug gsum ni// nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin te//
480a3(rgyud): 'dod chags rnam pa bcu gnyis yin// gsang ba'i bde skyong nyon mongs 'joms// kha dog dbyibs ni phung po'i bdud// rta mgrin 'khor lo phung po 'joms// sbas pa bzhi ni lha yi bdud// rig
480a4(rgyud): pa'i 'khor lo lha bdud 'joms// skye ba dang bcas 'chi ba ste// gsang ba skye med 'chi bdag 'joms// phra ba'i bdud 'joms de dang 'dra// skad cig bzhi dang sde pa bzhi// bzang po bzhi dang bden pa
480a5(rgyud): bzhi rje 'byung ba bzhi dang yum bzhi dang // tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi la sogs pa// ye shes bzhi po 'di nyid las// khyad par gzhan ni mi 'byung ste// rnam par rtog pa'i bye brag dang // gzhan yang mos
480a6(rgyud): pa'i bye brag dang // chos tshul du ma'i bye brag gis// sna tshogs du mar gsungs pa yin// dbang gsum bgrod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// dge slong chen por gsungs pa ste// 'di yis thams cad bya bar
480a7(rgyud): gsungs// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// dge slong dbang gsum ji ltar lags// de yi bya ba ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dge slong la sogs rnam pa gsum// so sor thar dang /
480b1(rgyud): byang chub sems// rig 'dzin nyid kyi dge slong ngo // gcig dang bzhi dang bcu dang ldan// nyis brgya lnga bcu'i go rims kyis// bsnyen gnas dge bsnyen dge tshul dang // dge sbyong so sor thar pa yin
480b2(rgyud): gtong dang gtong ba chen po dang // shin tu gtong dang rnam par gtong // bsnyen gnas dge bsnyen dge tshul dang // dge slong byang chub sems dpa' yin// dkyil 'khor du zhugs dge ba ste/
480b3(rgyud): de la gnas pa bsnyen gnas yin// bdun dang ldan phyir chen po yin// chen po 'di gsum bye brag kyang // bum pa'i dbang ni dge ba ste// de la bsnyen pas dge bsnyen yin// de phyir bdun
480b4(rgyud): ldan chen po yin// gsang ba'i dbang ni dge ba ste// de yi tshul ldan dge tshul yin// bdun dang ldan phyir chen po yin// dge ba shes rab ye shes te// de nyid slong bas dge slong yin//
480b5(rgyud): bdun dang ldan pas chen po yin// chen po 'di gsum bye brag kyang // phyir mi ldog pa gsum yin te// rnam par smin dang 'khor ba dang // theg pa dman par ldog pa ni// spong ba gsum
480b6(rgyud): nI go rims bzhin// theg pa gsum gyis nges 'byung zhing // rig 'dzin theg pa 'bras bur gnas// 'bras bu 'dir gnas rnal 'byor pa// khyim pa 'am rdo rje 'dzin pa yi// cha lugs su
480b7(rgyud): ni gnas byas la// dbang bskur rab gnas la sogs bya// theg pa gsum gyi cha lugs kyis// gsang ba'i spyod par ma gsungs te// dper na rdo las zangs su 'gyur// zangs las gas
481a1(rgyud): gyi rnam pa ste// zangs kyi dus na rdo med de// gser du gyur pas rngo mi snang // rig 'dzin nyid kyi dge slong la// so sor thar dang byang chub sems// gnyis po gnas pa nyid
481a2(rgyud): du ni sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gsungs so// de nas gsang ba bzhi po yang // bzhi pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba ste// rtag tu g.yo ba'i sems 'di nyid// gzugs la sogs pa bkug nas
481a3(rgyud): ni bsgom bya lhan cig bcas pa dag/ dbang du byas te bsgom par bya// gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa yi// dmigs pa thams cad rnam spangs te// sems nyid bsam du med pas na// cir
481a4(rgyud): yang bsam par mi bya'o// sems nyid stong par bcug nas su// stong pa sems su rab bcug nas// stong dang mi stong la sogs pa'i// rtog pa bcom pas mkha' ltar 'gyur// rten yod//
481a5(rgyud): ma yin brten pa med// dpe med gnas kyang yod ma yin// de nyid gnas pa rdzogs pa ste// lhan skyes gnyis med rig pa'o// de nas gcod pa bka' stsal pa// khro tshul gar dang phyag rgya rnams//
481a6(rgyud): sgyu ma tsam du shes par bya// phyag rgya chen po yang dag bsgoms// dur khrod rgyal po dregs pa can// snying rje med cing sha khrag za// de yi gnas su skye bar 'gyur// phyi nang sbas dang mthar thug gi
481a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du zhugs dbang mnos nas// sgom dang bzlas pa la sogs med// gsang sngags bar du gcod cing gshe/ rnal 'byor kun la skur pa 'debs// rdo rje spun tshig slob ma 'phye//
481b1(rgyud): ba yan lag dam tshig nyams// bla ma la spong rnam smin gyis// mnar med sems can dmyal bar skye// rten cing 'brel pa zab mo yi// rtsa yi 'khor lo'i don ma rtogs// lcags gru sor ni/
481b2(rgyud): bcu drug pa// 'dzeg pa ru ni dra yis bshad// gab pa'i gsang ba ma gtogs par// sbas pa mi dmigs rnam gsum gyis// thur du sems can dmyal bar skye// shing rta'i 'khor lo 'khor/
481b3(rgyud): ba ltar// las kyi rnam par smin pas 'khor// shes pas rang gis rang rig dang // rang rig bde ba gang 'dod dang // rang rig sgyu mar gang 'dod pa// rang rig shel sgong lta bu dang // dbyings
481b4(rgyud): dang ye shes la sogs pa// lta ba'i don nyid 'chad pa'o// rgyud kyi don ni rnam pa gsum// bde chen 'khor lo rgyu yi rgyud// gsang ba sna rtse thabs kyi rgyud// gsang ba bde skyong 'bras bu'i rgyud//
481b5(rgyud): bum pa rgyu yi rgyud du gsungs// gsang ba thabs kyi rgyud du gsungs// shes rab ye shes 'bras bu'i rgyud// skye ba rgyu yi rgyud du gsungs// 'chi ba thabs kyi rgyud du gsungs// bar ma do ni 'bras bu'i
481b6(rgyud): rgyudang rgyud ces pa ni rgyun yin te// rgyal po gsang ba ston pa ste// gsang ba rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs// bum dbang las ni dang por gsang // gsang ba bum pa'i dus su gsang // shes rab ye
481b7(rgyud): shes gsang bar gsang // rang rig shes rab ye shes gsang // gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs ri rab kyi rdul snyed
482a1(rgyud): kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mi sdang bar gyur to// dpal gsang ba thams cad gcod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//
482a2(rgyud): paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsakra saM ba ra gu h+ya a tsin+na tan+t+ra rA dza
482a3(rgyud): bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po// dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
482a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kun rdzob 'khor ba'i chos la skyo
482a5(rgyud): bar gyur to// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ kye kye bcom ldan he ru ka/ kun rdzob 'khor ba'i chos rnams kyi// de yi rang bzhin ji lta bu// gtso
482a6(rgyud): bos bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bslu ba'i mtha' dang mtshan mar snang // de nyid kur rdzob 'khor ba'i chos// sems nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 'khor
482a7(rgyud): ba'i chos kyi rang bzhin no// phyag na rdo rjes yang zhus pa// bsam gyis mi khyab sems nyid kyi// dbye ba mi mthun grangs dag dang // dus dang gnas pa'i tshul dag dang // 'jug pa'i dus dang thabs rnams
482b1(rgyud): dang // gnas pa'i tshad dang rim pa dag/ tso bos bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bag chags nyon mongs yo shes kun// rigs drug cu shing 'khril lug gi
482b2(rgyud): rang bzhin dag gi lam 'das la// de nyid bsam gyis mi khyab ste// dus gsum sangs rgyas ngo bo yin// bde gshegs kun gyi thugs kyi gsang // de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyom// rtag chad skye
482b3(rgyud): 'gag la sogs pa'i// mtha' spangs sems nyid rang rig ci// gdod nas spros bral bde ba nyid// de don bsam gyis mi khyab des// de nyid dbye ba rab 'bring mtha'// rnam pa gsum du shes bya ste//
482b4(rgyud): dang po rang rig bsam mi khyab// rgyu dang lam rtags bsam mi khyab// mtha' dang nyon mongs bsam mi khyab// chos dang lta spyod bsam mi khyab// yi ge bsam gyis mi khyab pa// mdor bstan de nyid rnam
482b5(rgyud): par dbye// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos// de nyid chos ni bsam mi khyab// a ni yi ge dam pa ste// khong nas 'byung ba skye ba med// skye ba kun gyi rgyur gyur pa// yi ge dam pa bsam mi khyab// phrag byung
482b6(rgyud): khrus dang gtsang sbra dang // rgyan cha gcer bu thul gos sogs// chang dang bdud rtsi chu dang yang // ma dang sring ma bu mo sogs// rol ba'i spyod pa bsam mi khyab// nga yis 'dul ba'i sems can la/
482b7(rgyud): mos pa'i mtha' la thug pa med// de phyir theg pa thug med pas// de nyid lta ba bsam mi khyab// rtag chad sgo srur ltos pa'i sgra// de nyid mtha' gnas bsam mi khyab// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug so//
483a1(rgyud): nyon mongs bsam gyis mi khyab pa// 'dar dang 'phar dang drod la sogs// rtags nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa// lha skom rlung dang rtsa sogs pa// lam nyid bsam gyis mi
483a2(rgyud): khyab pa// rang gi nam mkha'i sprin char tshul// pha rol phyin drug la sogs pa// rgyu nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa// rgyu 'bras tha dad kun dang bral// rtsol ba rdul gyis ma gos pa// sprin med mkha'
483a3(rgyud): ltar bcom pa yi// spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid dag/ rang rig bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// a ni shad dang sbrul sogs kyis// bcu gnyis la sogs dbye ba yis// yi ge'i dbye ba rgyas pa'o// gzugs
483a4(rgyud): ni sdug dang mi sdug sogs// bcu dag phra rab rdul gyi bar// sku la sogs pa de bzhin te// sgra brgyad dri gsum ro drug ste// reg bya bcu gcig chos de bzhin// gang zhig 'dus byas 'dus ma byas// chos
483a5(rgyud): kyi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// theg pa gsum dang bco brgyad dang // ji snyed 'du shes yid kyi bar// lta ba'i dbye bas rgyas pa'o// tshogs kyi lam dang sbyor ba'i lam// mthong lam sgom lam mthar phyin
483a6(rgyud): lam/ lam gyi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// sems rtags bdud rtags 'byung ba'i rtags// rtags kyi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// mu stegs rang rgyal nyan thos nas// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i spyod pa'i bar// spyod pa'i dbye/
483a7(rgyud): brgyas pa'o// rtag dang chad dang sgo skur nas// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das mtha' dang // thabs dang shes rab mtha' yi bar// mtha' yi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// 'dod chags la sogs nyi khri dang // tshig
483b1(rgyud): stong rtsa ba nye ba dang // zhe sdang la sogs de bzhin te// nyon mongs dbye ba rgyas pa'o// kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang // 'dod chags che dang sbyin pa sogs// rgyu yi dbye ba rgyas pa'o// sems dang /
483b2(rgyud): nam mkha' ye shes dang // sangs rgyas 'od gsal zung 'jug sogs// rang rig dbye ba rgyas pa'o// blos brtags mtshan mar snang ba dang // sgro 'dogs pa dang skur 'debs dang // rim min
483b3(rgyud): mos pa khyad par tshol// rdul tsam khas len blos 'jog cing // sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgrub byed pa// gang ltar bcos kyang dri mtha' ste// gang zhig mthar lhung lta ba re// rang rig gzhan rig sems
483b4(rgyud): ma yin// kun rdzob don dam gnyis ma yin// rang rig rtog ge skam po dang // mthar lhung dbu mar khas len pa// de ni sems nyid rang rig dang // brjod med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// mi mthun
483b5(rgyud): pa yi phyogs yin te// de bral bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// rang rig ye shes chen po yin// sbyin sogs dkar po'i chos rnams dang // rang rig spyi yi rnam pa yis// rang rig ye shes chen po la//
483b6(rgyud): thabs dang thabs las byung ba 'am// rgyu dang 'bras bu la sogs pa// rdul tsam tha snyad yod ma yin// rang byung ye shes yin pa'i phyir// 'dod chags la sogs skyon gyis kyang // de la sgrib pa ma
483b7(rgyud): yin te// nam mkha' la ni sprin bzhin no// rang rig gzhan rig bye brag gis// sems can sangs rgyas gnyis su snang // rang rig sprin med nam mkha' la// gzhan rig rnam rtog nam mkhar
484a1(rgyud): mtshungs// sprin tshogs rlung gis gtor byas te// sprin med mkha' 'dra snang ba nyid// gzhan rig rnam rtog bral ba la// sgrib bral sangs rgyas zhes bya ste// rang rig /
484a2(rgyud): natsam du zad// dper na skyes bu nam mkha'i lta ba la// sprin gyis skyes bu'i mig la bsgribs pa las// nam mkha' de la ma bsgribs ji bzhin no// grangs ni dang po gcig yin te// gzhan rig
484a3(rgyud): rang rig gyur pa las// dag pa gzhan gyis rnam grol min// 'dir ni rang rig gcig kho na// de nyid rig cing nges pa'o// kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang // gzung 'dzin thabs dang shes rab
484a4(rgyud): ste// bsam gyis mi khyab gnyis pa'o// lus ngag sems kyi rang bzhin las// rnam par stong dang mtshan ma med// smon pa med dang sku gsung thugs// bsam gyis mi khyab gsum pa'o// byams
484a5(rgyud): dang snying rje dga' btang snyoms// sa chu me rlung rang bzhin las// bzhi yi grangs su nges pa ste// dga' ba la sogs de bzhin no// rigs lnga yi ni sangs rgyas lnga// phung po lnga dang chags sdang lnga/
484a6(rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab lnga pa'o// pha rol phyin drug rang bzhin las// yul drug dbang po drug la sogs// bsam gyis mi khyab drug nyid de// brgya sogs grangs ni bsam mi khyab/ gang zhig rang rig gzhan
484a7(rgyud): rig gnyis// thog ma med nas gnas pa ste// lus dang grib ma'i tshul du gnas// rang rig med par gzhan rig dag/ so so skye bo'i dus na 'dod// 'di yang rmongs chen ma rungs pa// gzhan rig ma spa
484b1(rgyud): rang rig 'dod// 'khor ba spangs nas mya ngan 'das// kha cig 'khor ba mya ngan 'das// rig pas blang dor gnyis su rtogs// de la sogs pa lnga ba'i gdon// rig pa 'dzin la brgya rtsa bcu// theg pa
484b2(rgyud): mdo sde stong phrag gsum// nyan thos rang rgyal brgya phyag gnyis// khyab 'jug drag po la sogs pa// lta ba'i gdon la bsam mi khyab// rang rig gdong nas ma skyes pa// stong pa ma bcos lhun gyis grub//
484b3(rgyud): bde ba chen po'i ros gang ba// khams gsum 'khor ba kun shes na// sangs rgyas nyid ni 'khor ba la// 'khor ba nyid ni mya ngan 'das// lta ba'i gdon dang bral ba ste// rang rig med cing gzhan rig
484b4(rgyud): med/ don dam kun rdzob gnyis ka spangs// sems med nam mkha' chos nyid med// 'khrul pa med cing ma 'khrul med// theg pa med cing rim pa med// dman dang gya nom gnyis ka med// ye shes
484b5(rgyud): med cing bde ba med// mtha' bral dbu mar mi gnas pa// bsam mi khyab tu gnas pa ste// 'di rtogs khong du chud pa dang // mi 'jigs sgo skur mi rtsom pa// rgyal ba'i sras kyi thu bo ste// rgyal sras
484b6(rgyud): kun gyi nang na mchog/ rdo rje 'dzin pas byin rlob cing // mkha' 'gro kun gyi mchod pa'i gnas// rig 'dzin sa la 'jug pa ste// des kyang mnyam gzhag 'bad de bslab// rig 'dzin sa la gnas
484b7(rgyud): par bya// rig 'dzin sa la gnas nas kyang // rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa la 'jug rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sar gnas te// bco lnga sa yi bdag nyid las// sku gnyis gzhan gyi don mdzad pa// gzhan gyi las
485a1(rgyud): dang smon lam stobs// de yi stobs kyis snang ba las// yang dag nyid la snang rgyu med// rim pa rnam pa gnyis yin te// dang po bla ma'i gdams ngag dang // rig 'dzin
485a2(rgyud): sa la gnas pa'i bar// rang rig spyi yi rnam pa ste// chos nyid yul du byas pa'o// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sar gyur te// rang rig rang gi mtshan nyid ni// yul dang yul can la sogs pa'i// rtog med
485a3(rgyud): mkha' ltar snang ba yi// khams gsum brtan dang g.yo bcas pa'i// bdag gi de nyid tshul gyis ni// mnyam gzhag rjes thob kun spangs te// sgyu ma'i tshul du gang gnas pa// snang ba mthar phyin pa
485a4(rgyud): yi tshad// thun dang 'pho ba chu tshod dang // dbyug gu skad cig rim pa la// sems kyi bying rgod la sogs skyon// gal te dben par gnas pa ni// snang med mthar phyin tshad yin te// rang rig phyi yi tshad bstan
485a5(rgyud): to/ snang ba med cing sgyu ma med// bya brtsal med cing bgrod pa med// rang byung lhun gyis grub pa ru// rtag tu mi 'gyur gang gnas pa// rang rig pa yi mtshan nyid la// mthar phyin pa yi tshad yin no// 'dod/
485a6(rgyud): chags ro yis myos pa dang // sems bskyed sdom 'dzin dbang bskur dang // tshogs kyi 'khor lo gdung ba'i dus// bsam gyis mi khyab rgyu yi dus// khyad par can du gsungs pa'o// gzhan yang rtog
485a7(rgyud): pa'i sems dang yang // rtog med sems dang 'dres pa yi// gzugs la rten pa'i mig nyid kyis// rtog pa rgyun chad sems de nyid// sems kyi rgyun bral rgyu de nyid// bsam gyis mi khyab rgyu yi dus/
485b1(rgyud): sgra la sogs pa'i de bzhin no// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sogs// nyon mongs nas ni rgyu ba ste// byams dang sbyin sogs de bzhin no// bzo sogs btang snyoms de bzhin te// bsam gyis ma/
485b2(rgyud): khyab rgyu yi dus// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// sbyin dang tshul khrims la sogs dang // byams dang snying rje la sogs pa'i// mdor na dkar po'i chos rnams dang // bzo dang spu rtsal la sogs dang //
485b3(rgyud): bskyed rdzogs sgom pa'i rim pa kun// skye ba gcig gam du mas ni// yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dang // 'khor ba'i chos la gang skyo ba// bsam mi khyab la 'jug pa'i dus// bskyed dang rdzogs
485b4(rgyud): sogs mi gnas shing // rdzogs pa chen po gang 'dod pa// de yang 'jug pa'i dus yin te// bdud rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pas// bar ma chod par 'jug pa'i dus// gzung ba'i thabs ni/
485b5(rgyud): bco brgyad de// mkha' mnyam gzhi bcas gzhi med dang // g.yul drug dug gsum rten pa dang // lhan cig skyes nyid sgra la rten// sa chu me rlung sgra rten no// chos rnams gzod nas ma skyes pa'i//
485b6(rgyud): rang rig sgom pa mkha' mnyam ste// zlu mas sems gzung dang por gces// chos rnams thams cad sems yin te// sems ni gzod nas ma skyes pa// gzhi bcas rang rig rnal 'byor ro//
485b7(rgyud): sems ni gzod nas rang rig pa// gzhi med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya chos// de brten sems gzung bla ma las// skyes bus 'bad de blang bar bya// de bzhin 'dod
486a1(rgyud): chags zhe sdang dang // gti mug rjes su mkhas pas gzung // lhan cig skyes gnyis 'byung bzhi la// brten te skye ba med par sgom// bye brag sems gzung bsam mi/
486a2(rgyud): khyab nyan thos la sogs theg chen la// man ngag yod pa ma yin te// lta ba spyod pa sems gzung dang // rgyu dang 'bras bu lam dang yang // dus dang longs spyod rnal 'byor dang // bdag
486a3(rgyud): don gzhan don dgongs pa dang // ngal dub mtha' spangs tshegs chung dang // tshogs sogs pa yi khyad par dang // khyad par rnam pa bco lnga yis// rig 'dzin theg pa khyad par 'phags// kye/
486a4(rgyud): cebacom ldan 'jigs pa che// rang rig bsam mi khyab pa la// sbyin dang byams sogs dgos pa ci// sku gnyis gzhan don gang las byung // bsam mi khyab la legs gnas pas// de nyid ci
486a5(rgyud): lags phyi ru ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sbyin dang byams pa la sogs pas// gzhan rig rnam rtog 'gags pa dang // sku gnyis sems can don mdzad pa'i// sems can rnam
486a6(rgyud): ni sangs rgyas su// 'byung ba'i rkyen du nges pas na// bsam mi khyab la mi gnas kyang // sbyin sogs 'bad de bslab par bya// de la bsam mi khyab pa 'byung // sku gnyis stobs dang mi 'jigs dang /
486a7(rgyud): gzungs dang ting 'dzin la sogs kun// sbyin la sogs pa sbyin byas na// bsam mi khyab pa 'byung bar nges// de nyid rtogs na bsam mi khyab// de nyid ma rtogs 'khor ba'i chos// dbul pos nor
486b1(rgyud): bu'i byi dor bzhin// bsam mi khyab la sems gzhag kyang // bskyed rdzogs rim pas sems gnas nas// de ni sngon sbyangs 'phro can te// sems kyi yig mgo gcad pa gces// rang sems la/
486b2(rgyud): su rung ban// dz+nyA na mr-i rtags nang du ste// de las nang rtags phyi ru 'byung // lus la dri med srin bu med// swa dkar gnyer ma sogs med pa// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rtags yin no// 'khor ba sgyu mar/
486b3(rgyud): snang ba dang // sprin med mkha' ltar gang snang bya// bsam mi khyad pa'i rtags yin no// de nas 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin de kho na nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa la/
486b4(rgyud): rjes su yi rang bar gyur to// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i gsang ba bsam mi khyab pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa rdzogs so// paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang /
486b5(rgyud): lo ts+tsha ba shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// rgya gar skad du/ shrI kha sa ma tan+ta rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud
486b6(rgyud): kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
486b7(rgyud): rdo rje btsun mo'i b+haM gA la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de dag gi nang nas mkha' spyod dang / sa spyod dang / sa 'og na spyod ma gsum la bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad
487a1(rgyud): nas gsang ba'i don 'di gsungs pa/ dad ldan snying rjer ldan dang rtse gcig sems// lus ngag gus bcas gzhan la phan sems ldan// 'jigs med brtul zhugs ldan/
487a2(rgyud): zhing zab mo yi// lam la spro bar gyis nas legs par nyon// mkha' 'gro khyod kyi mtshan nyid ni// nga yis khyod la bshad par bya// mkha' spyod steng sgo'i rlung yin te// sa spyod par du thig le'i sgo/
487a3(rgyud): sa 'og spyod pa shu kra'i sgo// sgo gsum sku gsung thugs yin te// dang po mkha' spyod mtshan nyid kyang // rnam pa gsum du shes bya ste// bems po'i rlung dang rnam rtog rlung // kun gyi mtshan nyid
487a4(rgyud): ye shes rlung // mdor bstan de nyid rim pas dbye// gnyis med rlung ni ma ning ste// zung 'jug thabs dang shes rab rlung // ldang 'jug sku gsung thugs kyi rlung // snying dang gzhang kha mgrin pa dang //
487a5(rgyud): lte ba'i lus ni khyab pa ru// rigs lnga'i rlung ni khyab par gnas// rgyu ba bzhi ni 'byung ba'i rlung // dngas snyigs 'byed pa brgyad du 'gyur// 'di nyid rlung ni thun brgyad de// thun re la ni 'pho ba gnyis//
487a6(rgyud): rlung gi 'pho ba bcu drug yin// 'pho ba gcig la chu tshod gnyis// chu tshod re la dbyug gu gnyis// rlung gi dbyug gu drug cu bzhi// de bzhin chu tshod sum cu gnyis// nyi khri chig stong drug brgya sogs/
487a7(rgyud): sems dang sems med 'dres pa'i rlung // rags pa dang ni phra ba la// mkhas pas sems kyi bzhon par bzung // rnam rtog gzung 'dzin sems kyi rta// gzung 'dzin gnyis 'gags dbu mar gnas/
487b1(rgyud): de nyid ye shes rdo rje'i rlung // dbye ba thabs dang shes rab gnyis// 'di rnams mkha' spyod rang bzhin te// de dag man ngag mkhas pas brtag/ yon tan skyon dang rtags rnams kyi// rlung gi mtshan/
487b2(rgyud): nyid shes par bya// de dag kun gyi rten nyid kyang // gzhol ma dang ni g.yon pa ma// 'di ni gzhu yi rnam par gnas// bems po rlung gi lam yin te// dbang po mngon sum la ma yin pas// sna yi ri rab
487b3(rgyud): gling bzhi la// nyi zla byang nub lhor rgyug gis// thabs dang shes rab skor sogs la// 'bad pas sems ni gzung bar bya// 'di dag bems pos yang dag gnas// mi shes pa yi rab rib kyis//
487b4(rgyud): rin chen sems ni dri can byas// 'di ni rnam rtog rlung yin te// 'di nyid kyi ni lam gyur pa// ro ma dang ni brkyang ma'o// sbrul 'khril lta bu'i rnam pa ste// rnal 'byor gyi ni dmigs pa'i yul// gnas der
487b5(rgyud): rnam rtog rlung 'gag go// rang rig gdod nas ma skyes pa// 'di nyid ye shes rdo rje'i rlung // kun 'dar ma yi rtsa la rten// tsad+d+hi lI ni shing lta bu// rang rig ye shes spyod yul te// gnas der babad
487b6(rgyud): de rang rig gzung // mkha' spyod rlung gi rang bzhin phyir// 'di dag rdo rje'i lam yin te// de nas sa spyod bshad bya ste// rang rig ye shes gang 'dod pas// tsaN+Da l-I yi bye brag brtag/ dang por
487b7(rgyud): rang bzhin tsat+tA lI// gnyis pa gtum mo tsat+tA lI// gsum pa kha sbyar tsaN+Da lI// de bzhin gcer bu'i tsad+d+hi lI// de nyid la yang dbye ba ste// gcer bu gtum mo shin tu gtum// yang dag gtum mo
488a1(rgyud): gzhan sbyar dang // bye brag kun la sbyar bar bya// gcer bu shin tu gcer bu dang // shin tu gcer bu gcer bu sogs// 'di dag kun la sbyar bar bya// dbye na rnams pa bcu/
488a2(rgyud): gnyis te// yan lag bcu tshan bzhi dang brgyad// sa spyod ma yi rang bzhin te// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis sogs// gzhan skyes kyi ni khro mo tsam// phra ba de las bzlog pa'o// brgya dang nyi shu sgra yi rtse/
488a3(rgyud): sum cu rtsa gnyis sgra yi rtse// lnga yi cha ste gtso bo gsum// gsum 'dus yungs kar gyi ni tshad// dbus dang g.yas g.yon phra sgrom bya// gnyis 'gyur bye brag shes par bya// dngas ma dang ni snyigs ma'i
488a4(rgyud): rtsarang rang bzhin du ni gnas pa la// yi ge lta bu'i rtsa mdud kyang // dang po'i sgra ru gang shes pa// sa spyod ma yi rang bzhin no// gnas la sogs pa gzhan nas shes// 'di nyid nor bu rin po che// 'di
488a5(rgyud): la brten nas thams cad 'byung // rigs 'chol gnas 'chol tshad 'chol dang // dbyibs dang kha dog grangs la sogs// 'chol pa las ni dngos grub min// de nyid bral ba'i rang bzhin ni// sa spyod//
488a6(rgyud): ma yi dngos grub ste// thams cad kun gyi rten yin no// sa 'og spyod ma'i rang bzhin te// de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// byang chub sems ni rnam pa gsum// dang po chos nyid sems yin te// 'di ni
488a7(rgyud): shes brjod yul las 'das// gnyis pa rang rig byang chub sems// dper na rkyen gyis shel sgong bzhin// gsum pa bems po'i byang chub sems// sih+la dang ni ga pur te// don dam kun rdzob
488b1(rgyud): gnyis su gsungs// las kyi rlung dang las kyi mes// g.yo ba kun rdzob byang chub sems// ye shes rlung dang ye shes mes// g.yo ba don dam sems yin te// dngas snyigs las ni rim pa yin//
488b2(rgyud): dbyibs dang kha dog las kyis ni// sems kyi khyad par shes par bya// las kyi rlung gis mi g.yo zhing // las kyi me yis mi 'dzag par// kha ba lta bu'i mtshan nyid las// mi shigs haM gi dbyibs
488b3(rgyud): 'dra ste// nor bu kun da'i mdog lta bu// dkar la 'tsher dang gzi mdangs snum// bde ba chen po'i slar byung ba// 'di ni don dam byang chub sems// dmar la gdang ba'i rang bzhin la// khyad par bzhini
488b4(rgyud): thun mong ste// 'di ni shes rab byang chub sems// de las bzlog pa'i dman pa gnyis// 'og sgor gnas shing srid pa ste// dman pa'i rkyen gyis g.yo bar byed// de phyir don dam kun rdzob kyi// sems
488b5(rgyud): kyi mtshan nyid shes par byed// rgyu 'chol pa las dngos grub med// rkyen 'chol ba la de bzhin te// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// don dam sems kyi spyod yul yin// kun rdzob tshor ba bden pa'i
488b6(rgyud): yul/ sa 'og spyod pa'i rang bzhin te// rdo rje gsum sgom mi phyed pa// de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' ste// yi ge dang ni yan lag dang // bsdus pa'i don dang spyi yi don// sbas pa'i don dang mthar thug don/
488b7(rgyud): sna tshogs sems las 'byung bar 'gyur// nor bu dang ni sil snyan bzhin// rtog med rkyen las sna tshogs 'byung // A li kA li ma ning dang // drug tu sbyor ba brtag par bya// sgra mtha' yi ge bsam ma
489a1(rgyud): khyab// yan lag rnam pa gsum yin no// rgyu 'bras brda dang brda can dang // brjod bya dang ni rjod byed do// de las bzlog pa bsdus par bshad// theg pa gsum dang de las
489a2(rgyud): gzhan// thun mong spyi ru nges pa ste// bye brag rang las shes par bya// sbas pa dbang dang sngags su dbye// sngags la bzhi ste dbang la gnyis// chos ni spyi dang bye brag go// de dag kun gyi mtshan nyid
489a3(rgyud): kyang / bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// snod dang snod min bye brag kyang // bla mas legs par brtag bya ste// de nyid yang dag rtogs gyur na// ston pa med cing bstan pa med// bsam gtan la sogs/
489a4(rgyud): 'jigs pa med// sangs rgyas gzugs ni sna tshogs 'byung // bya ba bcu gnyis la sogs dang // chos kyi 'khor lo sna tshogs bskor// dman pa rnams la bya ba'i rgyud// bya min rnal 'byor de lhag la/
489a5(rgyud): de rjes rnal 'byor nyid gsungs te// rnal 'byor nang ba de lhag la// phyi nas rnal 'byor ma rgyud ni// shes rab snying po rtser gyur pa'i// thabs dang shes rab bsrubs shing la// gnyis med thugs kyis
489a6(rgyud): bsrubs pa las// bdud rtsi'i ron nyi shu bzhi// nor bu rin chen rgyud ces brjod// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// dngos grub thams cad 'di las 'byung // ji ltar ma bkrogs 'o ma las// 'dod
489a7(rgyud): pa gang yang 'byung ba min// de bzhin lo grangs mang po las// dngos grub myur du 'byung ba min// de phyir rin chen nyi shu bzhi// bdud rtsi'i ro 'dra seng ge gzugs// gnas ni nyi shu bzhi nyid kyang // sku
489b1(rgyud): gsung thugs kyi byin brlabs te// mkha' 'gro nyi shu bzhi la gtad// phyag rgya bzhi yis rgyas btab bo// dam du sba zhing dam du spel// rgya las 'das na dam tshig nyams// sngags dang dbyibs/
489b2(rgyud): dang chos bdag nyid// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin te// de yi ngo bor rgyud kun brtag/ sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdag nyid// dbyibs kyang gnyis su shes par bya// re re'i bye brag dbye ba yang /
489b3(rgyud): bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// phyi nang sbas pa mthar thug bzhi// rgyud kun phyag rgya bzhi yin te// de nyid dbye ba mkhas pas brtag/ de nyid rtogs na rgyud dang ldan// de las bzlog pa 'das pa'o// rang
489b4(rgyud): bzhin gyi ni tsaN+Da lI// gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste// rtsa gsum gyis ni byin gyis brlabs// gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru// mkha' 'gro nyi shu rtsa bzhi la// rgyud ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi gtad// pu ru rab gtum
489b5(rgyud): gsang rdo rje/ dza ru gtum mig gsang ba gcod// oM ru 'od ldan bsam mi khyab// U ru sna rtse nam mkha' mnyam// go ru brtan blo nam mkha' che// ra ru mi'u thung sku gsung thugs// de ru lang ka rin
489b6(rgyud): chen 'phreng // ma ru shing grib dam tshig che// ka ru e ra stobs po che// oM ru 'jigs byed ye shes gsang // tri ru rlung shugs ye shes 'phreng // ko ru chang 'thung ye shes 'bar// ka ru sha ma rma
489b7(rgyud): ba'i 'phreng // la ru shin bzang rin chen 'bar// ka ru rta rna nyi ma'i 'khor// he ru kha kha ye shes rgyal// phre ru 'khor shugs mkha' 'gro gsang // gri ru khaN+Da gsang me 'bar// so ru shon ti gsang
490a1(rgyud): bdud rtsi// su ru 'khor lo dur khrod brgyan// na ru shin dpa' rdo rje rgyal// si ru stobs chen ye shes rgyal// ma ru 'khor sbyar chags pa'i rgyal// ku ru brtson 'grus
490a2(rgyud): mkha' 'gro sdom// de dag gtad do legs par spos// nang du tsat+tA li dag ni// nyi shu bzhi ni gtad pa ste// dang po gsang ba gnyis pa yang // rang bzhin yin te de nas dbang // rkyen ni tha mas gsungs
490a3(rgyud): pa ste// mkha' 'gro khyed kyi rang bzhin te// de nas dngos grub gang 'dod sbyin// dngos grub dam pa gang 'dod pa// dbang dang dam tshig ldan byas te// rta dang glang po la sogs dang // bu dang chung
490a4(rgyud): ma nor gyi dbyig/ bsnyen bkur dag gis bsnyen byas te// bdud rtsi'i r-i yi ra li las// bla ma'i zhal nas dngos grub blang // yid la zung la dran par gyis// de nas 'khor 'dus pa de
490a5(rgyud): dag thams cad rjes su yi rang bar gyur to// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin dpal nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// paN+Di ta ga ya
490a6(rgyud): d+harAr dang / dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis zhus shing bsgyur ba'o// rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA kha sa ma tan+da rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal
490a7(rgyud): nam mkha' dang mnyam pa chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
490b1(rgyud): cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so// gzhan yang dpa' bo dang / mkha' 'gro ma grangs med pa dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de rnams kyi nang nas byung /
490b2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la g.yas phyogs nas bskor ba lan gsum byas te/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas 'di skad ces gsol pa/
490b3(rgyud): kyitshe bcom ldan 'jigs pa che// bcom pa gang lags ldan pa gang // 'jigs pa gang lags chen po grang // bdag la khyod kyis bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das
490b4(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa// bcom pa bdud bzhi bcom pa ste// re re la yang bzhi bzhi ste// bcu drug grangs su shes par bya// ldan pa de yi gnyen po ste// dang po bum dbang bdud bzhi yang // kha dog
490b5(rgyud): dbyibs la log rtog gis// bskyed pa'i gzung 'dzin du ma dag/ phung po'i bdud du rab tu grags// 'dod chags zhe sdang la sogs pa// nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin no// yang dag lam ston bla ma
490b6(rgyud): med / zhe sdang ru trar skye ba yi// rgyu dang lam ston grogs ngan dag/ lha yi bu yi bdud yin te// las dang nyon mongs pa yi rgyus// srog 'chad pa ni 'chi bdag bdud// bskyed pa'i rim la legs gnas
490b7(rgyud): nas// lha yi bu yi bdud kyang bcom// log rtog du ma'i rtog pa 'gag/ des ni phung po'i bdud bcom mo// rten dang brten pa ro mnyam pas// nyon mongs pa yi bdud bcom mo// dus min 'chi dang tshe zad
491a1(rgyud): pas/ 'di dag 'chi bdag bdud yin te// tshe lo stong sogs thub pa yi// tshe yis 'chi ba'i bdud bcom mo// gzhan yang bdud 'joms bye brag ni// phyi yi tshe yi
491a2(rgyud): bcud kyis len// grub na 'chi bdag bdud 'joms so// de bzhin lus kyi phung po ste// longs spyod kyis ni nyon mongs 'joms// sems kyis lha yi bdud bcom ste// rten dang brten ni sgyu mar/
491a3(rgyud): ldan/ 'de nas gsang dbang bdud bzhi yang // phyag mtshan khro tshul gar la sogs// phyi ru du ma phung po'i bdud// rags pas yid ni nyon mongs pas// nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin no// dman pa'i lam
491a4(rgyud): gang ston pa yi// bla ma lha yi bu yi bdud// phyi yi tshe yi bcud kyis len// de nyid 'chi bdag bdud yin no// gzhan yang bdud kyi bye brag ni// sgo gsum 'khrul par gang ston pa// bla ma lha yi bu yi
491a5(rgyud): bdud// sgo gsum las ni du ma'i cha// de nyid ma shes phung po'i bdud// de nyid 'bad de bsgrubs byas kyang // 'bras bu mi 'byung sems nyon mongs// nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin te// de yis tshe yi
491a6(rgyud): bar chad byed// de nyid 'chi bdag bdud yin no// rlung sogs gnas pa'i tshul shes pas// lha ya~M bu yi bdud bcom mo// de nyid sgyu mar shes pa dang // de nyid shes pas phung po dang // nyon mongs pa 'i
491a7(rgyud): bdud bcom mo// dngos po'i mthar lhung skye bas 'chi// rgyu med las skye 'chi ba ste// rgyu rkyen ma bskyed rang bzhin gnas// sgyu mas 'chi bdag bdud bcom mo// tshe la dbang sgyur ma lta bu// gnyen po'i//
491b1(rgyud): spobs dang ldan pa'o// shes rab ye shes badrud bzhi yang // rtswa dang shu kA la sogs pa'i// dman pa'i lam ston lha yi bdud// de nyid du ma phung po'i bdud// de skom rang bzhin nyon mongs
491b2(rgyud): pas// nyon mongs pa yi bdud yin pas// kha dog dbyings ni skyes pas 'jig/ de nyid 'chi bdag bdud yin no// gzhan yang bdud kyi bye brag kyang // 'dod chags chen po'i lam ston pa'i/
491b3(rgyud): bla ma lha yi bu yi bdud// dga' ba bzhi ni du ma ste// rgyud la spangs pas phung po'i bdud// rang sems nyon mongs pa yi bdud// 'khor bar ltung bas skye ba ste// skye ba las byung 'chi bdag/
491b4(rgyud): bdud// rnam par rtog pa skyes pas so// 'dod chags kyis ni 'chi bdag bdud// ma spangs sum cu drug nyid dang // des pa sum cu rtsa drug gis// lam brten bla mas lha bdud bcom//
491b5(rgyud): dga' bzhi sgyu ma rang bzhin med// bde chen ror gyur phung po bcom// 'bras bu rang rig ye shes sbyin// rang sems nyon mongs sdug bsngal bral// nyon mongs pa yi bdud bcom mo// de/
491b6(rgyud): yis 'chi ba dang bral bas// de nyid 'chi bdag bdud bcom mo// 'og gi lam gyi bdud bzhi yi// dman pa'i stobs kyis zin pa ste// rgyal po dmangs su phab pa bzhin// de nyid lam gyi
491b7(rgyud): bdud kyis zin// rgyal po rgyal sa shor ba bzhin// bzhi pa dang 'brel bdung bzhi no// gsum pa'i snod dang ldan pa la// bzhi pa'i lam ston bla ma ni// lha yi bu yi bdud yin te// bdud
492a1(rgyud): gsum bla ma'i zhal las shes// snod min gsang ba sgrogs pa dang // mar dang kha ra la sogs pa// 'thungs te ma zhu dug 'gyur bzhin// khyad par bdud kyis zin pa
492a2(rgyud): ste/ rigs ngan rgyal sa 'dzin pa 'dra// dbang dang gdam ngag 'brel bcas pa'i// bdud 'joms lam gyi stobs dang ldan// ye shes lnga 'am yon tan drug/ ldan pa dag tu rab tu grags//
492a3(rgyud): bla ma gcig la snod bcud gnyis// thob na de nyid dam pa ste// bla ma gcig la dbang thob nas// bla ma gcig la mnyan par bya// bla ma rnam pa gnyis su gsungs// phyi yi bla ma de nyid de// nang gi bla ma/
492a4(rgyud): bdag po'i lha// bdud dang dgra yi sde rnams kun// thams cad 'jigs shing skrag byed pas// 'jigs pa zhes ni gsungs pa ste// dgra dang bdud kyi g.yul las rgyal// dmigs pa lha sogs bdun
492a5(rgyud): dang ldan// de phyir chen po zhes ni gsungs// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang / thams cad rgyud la dga' zhing mgu nas rjes su mi/
492a6(rgyud): rang bar gyur to// dpal nam mkha' chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//
492a7(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shrI kA ya bA kIt+ta tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal
492b1(rgyud): lo// 'di skad bdag gis 'dod chags che// mtshon gyur la ni yang dag gnas// mgon po thugs rje che ldan pa// khyod kyis bdag la bshad du gsol// rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa// sku/
492b2(rgyud): ni bum pa'i ngo bo ste// gsung ni gsang ba'i ngo bo yin// thugs kyang shes rab ye shes te// sangs rgyas spyan dang mA ma kI// dam tshig sgrol ma gos dkar mos// rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad
492b3(rgyud): gsol// rgyud kyi don la rab goms shing // smra ba'i tshig gis ma rmongs shing // gzhan gyi rtsod pas mi brdzi yang // dbang dang man ngag ma thob par// dbang bskur rab gnas sbyin sreg sogs
492b4(rgyud): sngags spyod ngal ba don med de// shi nas sems can dmyal bar skye// de phyir gtso bos dbang gsum gyi// man ngag yang dag bshad du gsol// rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa// dang por bum/
492b5(rgyud): dbang rim pa yang // gnas ni shin tu bsngags pa btsal// bkra shis yid dga' shin tu sdum// bkra shis bya rnams skad snyan sgrogs// dpag bsam shing rgyas yod par 'dod// gzhan yang
492b6(rgyud): dur khrod shing gcig gam// chu ngogs dag la sogs pa ru// sa bdag sa yi lha mo la// gtor ma sbyin sreg mchod yon gyis// sa bslang phyir ni mtho rnams gzugs// de nas dang po bsnyen pa
492b7(rgyud): dbul// bsnyen pa gsum ni rab 'bring tha// mtshan ma grangs dang dus su gsungs// re re la yang gsum gsum ste// mtshan ma gzugs dang 'od dang sgra// grangs ni stong dang khri dang 'bum/
493a1(rgyud): dus ni bco lnga bcu gsum dang // dus ni bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dang // lha rnams bsnyen pas mnyes byas nas// lha dang slob ma rdzas rnams kun// lhag par gnas pa
493a2(rgyud): tshul bzhin bya// bkra shis lo grangs ldan pa yi// bu mo ku sha'i phyogs mthun pa'i// ku sha btsal la mtshan ma brtags// so shing rtse mor me tog dri// srung skud la sogs mtshan ma brtag
493a3(rgyud): dbang gi dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya// dkyil 'khor slob ma rab 'bring tha// ting 'dzin me tog rdul tshon rim// gang dang ldan pa de nyid do// de nas mchod rdzas rim pa dgram// khaM bi ra yi sngag
493a4(rgyud): kyis kyang // de la rdo rjes byab par bya// de nas ku sha la sogs la// spogs pa'i cho ga dang bcas bya// gzhan yang sngon du 'gro ba'i rdzas// bla ma mnyes par bya ba dang // dkyil 'khor lha
493a5(rgyud): rnams mchod pa'i phyir// rta dang glang po ma hA dang // rin chen la sogs gter rnams dang // spos dang mar me la sogs pa// brgya 'am stong ngam khri 'am 'bum// bla re rgyan dang ba dan sogs/
493a6(rgyud): byin brlabs tshogs bsags phyi ru dgod// de nas slob ma gzhug par bya// khrus dang yan lag dri yis byug/ kye ho khyod ni ji lta bu// 'jig rten 'khrul pa las sad na// he ru kar grags na
493a7(rgyud): chen po yi// dkyil 'khor chen por khyod rol lam// dad pa dang bcas spro bar gyis// rnam rtog dang bral rdo rje sems// dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa po// rdo rje 'dzin pa dgongs su gsol// byang
493b1(rgyud): rlub chen por lung ston pa// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo// dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol// byang chub sems ni bdag la stsol// pad+ma las byung bdag la stsol// gsang ba las byung ba dag la
493b2(rgyud): stsol// thar pa chen po'i grong mchog tu// mgon pos bdag ni gzhug tu gsol// legs so legs so rigs kyi bu// rgyal sras kun gyi nang na mchog/ rnam rtog thams cad 'jig byed pa// gnyis
493b3(rgyud): med khyod kyis blang bar bya// mi bskyod bcom ldan dang mtshungs pa'i// zil gyis mi non khyod kyis blang // dam tshig spyod pa spyad na ni// mchog gi de nyid blang bar bya// thabs dang shes rab zung du 'jug
493b4(rgyud): nam yang khyod kyis spang mi bya// tshangs spyod de bzhin bsam gtan la// 'bad pas sems ni brtan par bya// chang ni rtag btung khro ma bya// de bzhin sha yang shes par bya// gzhan gyi phyag rgya brten par
493b5(rgyud): bya// 'di ni dam tshig brgyad yin no// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro// thun mong sdom dang sems bskyed sbyin// bskor ba lan gsum phyag gsum bya// yol bas bar du gcad nas ni// mig la
493b6(rgyud): sogs pa lnga bkab la// lha grangs du yod me tog sbyin// kun byed chu yis bsal dag bya// me tog dang bcas rdo rje yang // de yi snying la bzhag la bsgom// slob dpon la ni brnyas byed sogs// lhung ba'i
493b7(rgyud): nyes pa brjod par bya// phyi yi rdo rje 'dzin pa dbab// sngon du sdig pa lan gsum dral// mig gis gzugs rnams mthong ba dang // rna bas sgra dang sna yis dri// lce yis ro dang lus kyis reg/ dngos grub 'phrin
494a1(rgyud): las so so ru// mkhas pas shes shing brtag par bya// me tog dor te lha yang sbyin// 'khor rnams gtso ba'i yan lag yin// gtso bo'i mtshan nyid shes par bya// ji ltar gso
494a2(rgyud): ba'i spyan pa yis// dbang po lnga yi zug rngu 'byin// de bzhin sems dpa' chen po yis// mi shes pa yi rab rib kun// rgyal ba rnams kyis yang dag bsal// de la gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bstan//
494a3(rgyud): dbang gi dkyil 'khor byang shar du// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa ru// bzhag la rig pa'i dbang lnga bskur// chu khams mi bskyod ma long gis// rdo rje rigs kyi 'phrin las 'grub// dbu rgyan rin chen 'byung ldan te// maH
494a4(rgyud): nyid ye shes rang bzhin gyis// rin chen rigs kyi 'phrin las 'grub// 'od dpag med pa rdo rje'i dbang // so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin gyis// pad+ma'i rigs kyi 'phrin las byed// dril bu don yod grub pa ste/
494a5(rgyud): bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis// 'phrin las sna tshogs byed par 'gyur// rigs las dras nas ming gi dbang // rdo rje dang sbyar rdo rje sems// rnam snang chen po'i ngo bo ste// chos dbyings ye shes rang bzhin
494a6(rgyud): las/ de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid 'dzin// mi 'jigs seng ge'i khri stengs su// rig byed slob dpon dbang sbyin bya// bdud bzhi 'joms pas rgyal mtshan bzhi// chos rnams mi nub rgyal mtshan 'dzugs
494a7(rgyud): chos kyi sku yis kun la khyab// gdugs kyis steng nas dgab par bya// rdo rje dril bu brtul zhugs gnyis// phyag rgya'i dam tshigs gsum yin te// dbugs dbyung ba dang lung bstan dang // rjes su gnang dang /
494b1(rgyud): phyir mi ldog/ brtan par byed dang rnam pa lnga// gzhan yang rdzas kyi bye brag rnams// rin chen 'dun la sogs pa kun// thun mong yin par nga yis gsungs// bum pa'i dbang la rnam gsum ste// dkyi/
494b2(rgyud): 'khor du 'jug dang po yin// gnyis pa rig pa'i dbang yin te// brtan par byed pa gsum pa'o// de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba// lus ni ri rab lhun po la// byang chub sems kyi gnas bcas nas/
494b3(rgyud): bde ba'i stan la gnas nas su// gsang ba'i dbang gis rten gyur pa// rig ma dang po btsal bar bya// dang po shes pas brtag pa dang // bdag dbang yod par blang ba dang // nyes pa dag par
494b4(rgyud): sbyang ba dang // dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya ba dang // bar chod bgegs rnams zhi ba dang // srung dang de la tshogs kyis mchod// dri yi thig le du ma bya// g.yon na gnas pa de nyid dang // srub dang
494b5(rgyud): bsrub thabs sbyor ba dang // bsrubs las bde ba'i chu rgyun gyis// lus kun khyab na gsang ba ru// dkar la rtsa dmar lta bur 'dzag/ dkyil 'khor du 'jug gong dang 'dra// ro ma'i 'khor lor d+ha/
494b6(rgyud): bsams la// lci de bad+mar byin brlabs te// kye yi rtse mo zla bsams la// sa drug pur 'dres pa yis// bya la gzhag sa de la bstim// sor gnyis longs spyod mnyam sbyor la// dbus su mi rdzo /
494b7(rgyud): sgom par bya// gsang ba'i dbang la rnam gsum ste// rdo rje gtso mos sbyin pa dang // khro mo sbom pos sbyin pa dang // rdo rje gre tshangs sbyin pa'o// shes rab ye shes dbang la yang // dang por shes rab brtag
495a1(rgyud): pa mi lus dang ngag dang yid dang gsum// mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya// de nas khyad par lnga brtags te// rigs dang lang tsho longs spyod dang // rgyan dang gzugs kyi
495a2(rgyud): khyad par lnga// phyi yi brtag pa yin par gsungs// sems brtan rdo rje yi ni rigs// khyad par yin par nga yis gsungs// rnam rtog chung ba'i rdo rje yi// lang tsho'i khyad par yin par gsungs// mi rtog pas
495a3(rgyud): brgyan shes pa ste// rdo rje'i rgyan gyi khyad par yin// de nyid dus gsum du mi 'gyur// mi nub chos kyi rgyal mtshan te// rdo rje'i gzugs kyi khyad par yin// chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid// de yi ro la log
495a4(rgyud): spyod pas// rdo rje'i longs spyod khyad par ro// kun 'dar ma ste thugs kyi rigs// rigs kyi khyad par yin pa'o// de nyid mda' ltar mkhrang ba ni// thugs kyi lang tsho'i khyad par ro// rtsa de dmar la dngas pa dang /
495a5(rgyud): byang chub sems ni dkar la dngas// gnyis su med la dkar ba'i tshul// dper na nor bu ke ke ru// dar la brgyus pa ji bzhin du// thugs kyi gzugs kyi khyad par ro// la la nA dang ra sa nA// a bad+hU tIH
495a6(rgyud): gnyis med la// spyod thugs longs spyod khyad par ro// dang por phyi la gnyis pa nang // gsum pa gsang ba'i brtag pa'o// lus brtag pa ni sku yin te// ngag brtag pa ni gsung du 'gyur// yid brtag
495a7(rgyud): thugs su 'gyur ba'o// sgyu ma tsam gyi dgongs pa'i don// kun la khyab par shes par bya// lus kyi drug la ngag gi bdun// sems kyi bdun po sgyu ma'i tshul// dang por smig rgyu chur 'khrul dang // gnyis pa
495b1(rgyud): smig rgyu nyid yin te// gsum pa smig rgyu mi snang bzhin// de bzhin zhal nas shes par bya// chu la bdun no mar la gcig/ dri ni bdun te sha la gnyis// sgong bzhi ste 'o ma gsum// 'di rnams btsal
495b2(rgyud): ba'i rten gyur pa// lo ni gsum bzhi yin par gsungs// ka ra gnyis te bu rab gcig/ chang ni gnyis su shes par bya// rgyan ni bye brag sna tshogs so// dgun dang de bzhin ston gyi sha// zhag gcig/
495b3(rgyud): na ni bcud dang ldan// dbyar dang dpyid kyi sha rnams kyang // drod dang ldan zhing bcud dang ldan// rang bzhin shi ba'i sha yin te// 'dun pa byas na dam tshig nyams// rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag bcas// gzhan
495b4(rgyud): yang 'bras bu la sogs sman// mar dang bcas pas sbyar bar bya// sha yang mar gyis de bzhin no// kha bas kun gyi bcud spyad de// mngar ba kun gyis ro rtsa byed// bcud skyed sha ni gzhon nu ste/
495b5(rgyud): ro rtsa sha ni bco lnga yin// bcud skyed sha dang mar gnyis kyang // lnga dang lnga yi cha yis bsres// chang ni mnyam por gsungs pa'o// ro rtsa ba yi sha la yang // 'o ma sgo nga cha mnyam par// lnga gsum lnga/
495b6(rgyud): gnyis gtso bor bya// kha ra'i chang ngam 'o ma 'am// sha dang mnyam por sbyin par bya// 'di ni yan lag spros bcas so// de nas mtshams gcad bsnyen pa dang // dam tshig sna tshogs bya ba yang // spros
495b7(rgyud): pa med pa'i yan lag yin// dbang bskur sngon du sgom pa'i don// dbang thob phyir ni nga yis gsungs// rig ma gtad dang man ngag sbyin// brda rnams bya zhing 'dod pa'i rtags// rtag pa shin tu
496a1(rgyud): spros pa med// phyag dang zhabs la sogs pas 'byung // dang po'i sbyor thabs zhes gsungs so// dbu rgyun mgul rgyan la sogs pa// sbyor thabs chen po zhes bya ste// langs pa
496a2(rgyud): tsog pa gan rgyal dang // kha spu ba 'phreng dang lnga yin te// 'di rnams kun gyi dgongs pa zab// dgongs med spyad pa spyod byed pa// 'di ni mnar med skye ba'i rgyu// tha mal pa las brgya 'gyur gyis// bum pa'i dbang
496a3(rgyud): dang 'brel ba'o// bum pa dang ni gsang ba ste// gsang ba las gzhan gsum pa ste// de yi rnam smin brjod mi lang // dkyil 'khor du 'jug rim pa ni// bla ma'i zhal las shes par bya// yan lag bdun bsgom/
496a4(rgyud): sbyor ba dngos// khyad par rnam pa gsum las byung // sngags dang sman ni dang po ste// gnyis pa sgor thabs yin par gsungs// gsum pa ting 'dzin len pa ste// sngags dang sman gyis kun dra dang // rked shing
496a5(rgyud): dang gnas pa'i tshad// drang ba'i tshad rnams shes par bya// 'byung ba bzhi dang rigs mthun pa'i// rked shing rked pa'i tshad dang mnyam// sor gsum sor bzhi dar ram men// gnas pa'i tshad ni rnam pa drug/ rnam thar
496a6(rgyud): gsang ba'i pho brang gnas// skye mched rig par gnas pa'o// stong pa rta mgrin 'khor lor gnas// khams rnams gsang ba bde skyong gnas// 'dab la sprul pa'i 'khor lo gnas// yang dag spong ba snying khar gnas
496a7(rgyud): he ru kar ni ma gshegs shing // rdo rje mda' yis ma brgyab pa'o// drang ba'i tshad ni sor bzhi dbyug/ dang por khrus byas gnyis pa la// sman dang snum dang dri dang gsum// sum cha sum gnyis stod smad du/
496b1(rgyud): lus la bsku zhing me la bdug/ rtse gsum rtse ni shin tu zab// ba spu ba dang lta ba dang // ra mnye ba dang nye'u shing dang // ra mo shags dang yan lag bcas// rdo rje la sogs lnga sbyar dang // gzhan yang /
496b2(rgyud): spyan dang snum dang dri// dar la sogs pa'i nang du blugs// sgo gnyis nas ni tho ltos bdug/ zab pa'i sngags btab bsgoms byas nas// dang por mtshan ma shes par bya// chags pa'i gzi ldan sna
496b3(rgyud): tshogs 'byung // tha ma'ang gsum mam bdun na 'byung // dgongs pa'i bye brag shes gyur nas// sngags dang sman gyi khyad par ro// dgongs pa mi shes 'dod chags phyir// sman la sogs pa btsal mi
496b4(rgyud): bya 'di yi sdig pa bsam mi khyab// gdug pa'i sbyor thabs shes gyur na// dbus kyi rtsa yi kha 'byed pa// sbyor thabs khyad par yin par gsungs// bde chen go bzlog sbyor ba dang // 'khor lo'i
496b5(rgyud): go bzlog sbyor ba dang // sku yi go bzlog sbyor ba dang // ye shes go bzlog sbyor ba dang // 'byung ba go bzlog sbyor ba dang // yum gyi go bzlog sbyor ba dang // thig le go bzlog sbyor ba dang // bsam gtan
496b6(rgyud): go bzlog sbyor ba dang // yi ge go bzlog sbyor ba dang // stong pa'i go bzlog sbyor ba dang // dbugs kyi go bzlog sbyor ba dang // dga' ba'i go bzlog sbyor ba dang // gtum mo'i go bzlog sbyor ba dang //
496b7(rgyud): yi go bzlog sbyor ba dang // byang sems go bzlog sbyor ba dang // g.yas g.yon go bzlog sbyor ba dang // brda yo go bzlog sbyor ba dang // rten gyi go bzlog sbyor ba rnams// kun mkhyen gyis kyang ma gciH
497a1(rgyud): pa/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs kyi gsang // byang chub sems dpa' kun gyi yum// sras rnams thun mong ma yin bskyed// ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par ro// 'di yi khyad
497a2(rgyud): par ma dpags par// zab pa'i don ni yod ma yin// dbang bskur ba yi sngon du yang // gdams ngag sbyin par gsungs pa yin// gdams ngag de yis dbang thob 'gyur// shes rab ma brten nas
497a3(rgyud): su 'bade ba'i ye shes bskyed pas na// shes rab ye shes dbang du gsungs// si h+la ga pur shes rab ste// de yi bde ba ye shes yin// si h+la shes rab ces bya ste// ga pur ye shes su ni bshad
497a4(rgyud): rtswartsa gsum 'dus pa shes rab ste// de yi thig le ye shes yin// la la nA ni ye shes so// ra sa nA ni shes rab ste// rtsa ni shes rab ces bya ste// byang chub sems ni ye shes so// mkha' 'gro ma
497a5(rgyud): ni shes rab ste// dpa' bo ye shes su ni bshad// dga' ba gsum ni ye shes te// rang bzhin dga' ba shes rab yin// 'og ni shes rab ces bya ste// snang la ye shes su yang bshad// g.yon pa
497a6(rgyud): shes rab ces bya ste// g.yas pa ye shes su yang bshad// chos dbyings shes rab ces bya ste// ye shes bzhi ni ye shes yin// phyag mtshan ming dang yi ge rnams// gzhan yang bye brag shes par bya//
497a7(rgyud): shes rab ye shes la yang gsum// tshig la bslab pa'ang gnang ba yin// gzugs brnyan la ni bshad pa ste// mngon par rtogs pas bsgom pa gsungs// e baM ma ya'i rnam pa yang // e ni sa ste/
497b1(rgyud): bai ni chu// ma ni me ste ya ni rlung // e ni snying rje ba ni byams// ma ni dga' ba la btang snyoms// e ni spyan baM mA ma kI// ma ni gos dkar ya sgrol ma// e ni sbyin pa 'i tshul khrims// ma ni bzod pa la
497b2(rgyud): bsam gtan// e ni phyag rgya chen po ste// baM ni dam tshig phyag rgya yin// ma ni chos kyi phyag rgya ste// ya ni shes rab phyag rgya'o// e ni shar te baM lho phyogs// ma ni nub ste ya byang phyogs// e ni sku yi
497b3(rgyud): thig le ste// baM ni gsung la ma ni thugs// ya ni ye shes thig le'o// e ni sngon po po ljang ku// ma ni dmar po yi ser po// e ni mkha' 'gro ba lA ma// ma ni dum skyes ya gzugs can// e ni ye
497b4(rgyud): shes mkha' 'gro ste// baM ni rdo rje'i mkha' 'gro yin// ma ni sha za'i mkha' 'gro ste// ya ni las kyi mkha' 'gro'o// e ni 'gog pa baM ni lam// ma ni sdug bsngal ya kun 'byung // e ni bde chen baM/
497b5(rgyud): longs spyod// ma ni chos la ya sprul pa// e ni mtshan ma baM stong pa// ma ni rnam thar ya dpe byad// e ni rnam pa sna tshogs te// baM ni rnam par smin pa'o// ma ni rnam par nyed pa ste// ya ni rnam pa
497b6(rgyud): mtshan nyid bral// e ni chung ngu ba 'bring po// ma ni lhag pa ya cher lhag/ e ni g.yas nas me rgyu ste// baM ni g.yon nas rlung rgyu'o// ma ni 'og nas sa rlung rgya// ya ni steng nas chu rlung n+ya// e ni gnas
497b7(rgyud): brtan baM phal chen// ma ni bkur ba ya thams cad// e ni bsnyen pa baM nye bsnyen// ma ni sgrub pa ya sgrub chen// e ni shar lho baM lho nub// ma ni shar mtshams ya nub mtshams// a ni rgyud la baM ni/
498a1(rgyud): sngags// ma ni ye shes ya gsang ba// e ni snang ba baM snang mched// ma ni snang thob ya 'od gsal// e ni bdag gi bzang po yin// baM ni dus kyi bzang po yin//
498a2(rgyud): ma ni ye shes bzang por gsungs// ya ni rlung gi bzang po yin// e ni bdag gi gnas yin te// bi ni rnal 'byor gnas su bstan// ma ni gzhan gyi gnas yin te// ya ni rgyud kyi gnas yin//
