498a3(rgyud): no// e ni dga' ba baM mchog dga'// ma ni lhan cig ya dga' bral// e ni me long baM mnyam nyid// ma ni kun rtogs ya nan tan// e ni chos sku baM longs spyod// ma ni sprul sku ya bde chen/
498a4(rgyud): e ni zhi ba baM ni dbang // mu ni rgyas pa ya gsod pa// yi ge btus pa'i sngags tshan gsum// oM ni sku yi 'khor lo ste// AHnI chos gsung 'khor lo'o// hU~M ni thugs kyi 'khor lo yin// oM ni
498a5(rgyud): rnam snang AH'od dpag med// hUM ni mi bskyod rang bzhin no// oM ni phyag g.yon hUM ni g.yas// AHni dbus kyi snying ka yin// oM ni g.yon gyi spyan yin te// hUM ni g.yas pa AHdbus ma// oM ni
498a6(rgyud): srog la hUM rtsol ba// AHni gnas par shes par bya// oM ni sku la hU~M ni thugs// AHni gsung du shes par bya// oM ni lus la AHni ngag/ hUM ni yid du shes par bya// oM ni thabs la hUM shes rab/
498a7(rgyud): AHni gnyis su med pa'o// oM ni g.yon gyi la la nA// AHni a ba d+hU tI yin// oM ni g.yas kyi ra sa nA// hU~M ni g.yon gyi la la nA// AHni de bzhin dbus na gnas// oM ni ga pur hUM sih+la// AHni dkar
498b1(rgyud): dmar rtsa dag yin// oM ni mchog dga' hUM khyad dga'// AHni rang bzhin dga' ba'i don// dga' ba lhan cig skyes dgar 'gyur// lhan cig skyes pa dga' bar 'gyur// rgyu la 'bras bu sbyor/
498b2(rgyud): ba dang // 'bras bu la ni rgyu sbyor dang // rgyu la rgyu yi sbyor ba dang // 'bras bu la yang 'bras bur sbyor// rgyu 'bras gnyis su med par sbyor// thabs la shes rab sbyor ba dang // shes rab la yang
498b3(rgyud): thabs kyis sbyor// thabs la thabs kyis sbyor ba dang // shes rab shes rab sbyor ba dag/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis med sbyor// sbyor ba 'di yi dgrongs pa yang // kun mkhyen gyis kyang rtog
498b4(rgyud): par dka'// oM ni rnam snang mi bskyod pa// na ro rin chen 'byung ldan te// zla tshes 'od dpag med pa yin// thig le don yod grub pa'o// oM ni bde gshegs lnga rang bzhin// zhabs bskyed don yod/
498b5(rgyud): grub pa ste// 'a ni de bzhin 'od dpa go med// ha ni rnam par snang mdzad de// zla tshes rin chen 'byung ldan yin// thig le mi bskyod rang bzhin no// zhabs bskyed sgrol ma'i rang bzhin te// 'a ni gos
498b6(rgyud): dkar ngo bo yin// ha ni rdo rje dbyings phyug ma// bla tshe sa mA ma kI rang bzhin// thig le spyan du shes par bya// 'byung ba lnga dang sku lnga dang // 'khor lo lnga dang dga' ba lnga// go rims bzhin du shes par
498b7(rgyud): byal zhabs bskyed bya ba nan tan yin// Sha ni mnyam nyid ye shes so// ha ni chos kyi dbyings yin te// zla tshes so sor rtog pa'o// thig le me long ye shes so// 'di dag kun gyi dgongs pa'i don//
499a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs kyi gsang // kun tu gsang zhes dpyad par dka'// miga'i tshul gyis rgyas btu bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po dang /
499a2(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs kyis mchod pas mchod nas mi sdang bar gyur to// mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// paN+Di ta ga yad+ha ra /
499a3(rgyud): lots+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// @rgya gar skad du/ shrI rat+na mA le tAn+ta rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal rin chen 'phreng ba'i rgyud kyi
499a4(rgyud): rgyal po// dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// lha mos gsol pa rdo rje 'dzin// dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa ru// rin chen 'phreng ba'i don ma rtogs// khyed kyis bdag la bshad du gsol/
499a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig lha mo spyan bzang ring // dpal ldan 'khor lo sdom pa ru// ma gsungs nga yis khyod la bshad// rin po che ni rnam pa gsum// de yi 'phreng ba'ang
499a6(rgyud): rnam pa gsum// dang po snod kyi rin po che// gnyis pa bcud kyi rin po che// snod bcud gnyis dang rang bzhin bral// de ni rin chen gsum pa yin// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// rnam pa gsum du/
499a7(rgyud): gsungs pa las// de rnams rin chen ji ltar lags// de yi 'phreng ba ji ltar lags// de rnams su yi spyod yul lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dang po snod kyi rin po che// rnam pa lnga/
499b1(rgyud): du shes par bya// ka ka ru ni dkar po che// mi bskyod pa yis byin brlabs te// dbyibs ni klagam lta bu la// rab ni ngang pa'i sgong tsam// 'di ni rin chen 'bar ba ste// ba dkar ra dkar lug dkang mog
499b2(rgyud): 'o ma bslu zhing spangs pa dang // mi bskyod pa la mchod par bya// de nas spyi bor gdags pa'o// mchod pa'i bye brag kun la bya// shar gyi gdon rnams thub pa dang // gang la yod pa de la skyob// 'bring ni
499b3(rgyud): gzhan skyes sbom po tsam// 'di ni rin chen dge ba ste// dngul chu rnam pa gnyis blugs la// rkyen gyi rdzas rnams tshang ba dang // kha yi nang du gzhug pa ste// ro ma'i 'khor lo lces mnan la// de nas dal
499b4(rgyud): gyis bskyod pa dang // gsang ba'i rdo rje'i sna rtse ru// bde ba chen po skyes tsam na// ro ma'i 'khor lor dog pa mnan// dper na sbrul gyi sha zos pa// mgo bo mnan pas phyi ru 'byung // de bzhin mnan pas
499b5(rgyud): byang chub sems// sna rtse las kyang gyen la ldog/ til dang til mar bzhin du gnas// khyad par bde ba gyen la ste// bde ba ster phyir rin po che// de yi phye ba du mar bshad// tha ma skyes pa'i khro mo tsam//
499b6(rgyud): e ran la sogs sman lnga dang // spyi bo'i gtsug tu btags gyur na// lus kyi gnyer ma zad par byed// de nas yang dag gnyis pa yang // be DUR+Ya ni sngon po ste// rin chen 'byung ldan byin brlabs te//
499b7(rgyud): dbyibs ni sogs ka lta bu ste// rab kyi tshad ni glang po'i mig/ 'di ni rin chen myu gu ste// ngang pa'i sgo nga ldong ros dang // spang sha ma dang gsum sbyar nas// de gdugs rna ba g.yas su gdags// lho yi gdon
500a1(rgyud): rnams thub par gsungs// gang la yod pa de la skyob// 'bring ni ngang pa'i sgo nga tsam// 'di ni rin chen e ran da// ga pur rak+ta dngul chu gsum// de yi nang blugs lce lkog tu//
500a2(rgyud): gyegyin thur gnyis ni sna dang 'jug/ de yis byang chub sems bzung ste// mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du gnas// tha ma bye'u sgong tshad tsam// a ru ra dang skyu ru ra// ba ru ra dang ldong ros rnams// bsres te lus
500a3(rgyud): la rab byugs te// 'di ni d+han d+ha kas pu ra// lus kyi srin bu 'byer bar byed// de nas yang dag gsum pa yang // pad+ma rA ga dmar po ste// dbyibs ni zlum po lta bu la// 'od dpag med kyis byin brlabs te//
500a4(rgyud): rab ni kar sha pa Na stong // gur kum ga pur lnga sbyar la// de la bsku zhing byug bya'o// lte ba'i dbus su bzhag la bcing // 'di ni rat+na ke ru ra// nub kyi gdon rnams thub par gsungs// 'bring ni kar sha pa Na ste/
500a5(rgyud): 'di ni rat+na ka ra ste// mar dang sa le sbram dang lnga// bzo ru byas pa'i dngul chu rnams// de yi nang blugs lte bar mnan// 'di yis byang chub sems gzung ste// chu la chu bzhag ji bzhin no// tha ma kar sha ba/
500a6(rgyud): Naste/ 'bras bu gsum dang ru rta dang // mar gi snying po dang sbyar te// spyi bo'i gtsug tu sba ba dang // 'di ni rat+na bde bas// skra dkar med par byed pa'o// de nas yang dag bzhi pa yang // de ni margad ljang ku ste/
500a7(rgyud): dbyibs ni gru bzhi lta bu ste// don yod grub pas byin brlabs te// rab ni ba con dbyug pa tsam// 'di ni rat+na ga ga ni// rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag bcas// bskus la rna ba g.yon du gdags// 'di yis byang gi gdon
500b1(rgyud): rnams thub// 'bring ni bya mo'i sgong tsam// ma sna ba u ma de// gnyis kyi ga pur rak+ta yis// byugs la lte ba'i nang du gzug/ gapur si zla gnyis ka 'dzin// tha ma gzhan gyis skong tsam// ldong rom/
500b2(rgyud): ser po gser dang gsum// man cha gcig ni byin nas ni// 'di ni e ru na ra ste// srin bu mi skye bde dang ldan// 'di ni rat+na san da ha// de nas yang dag lnga pa yang // kha dog dbyibs ni du mar snang // rnam par
500b3(rgyud): snang mdzad byin brlabs te// de rnams so so du ma byed// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// ma 'ongs so so skye bo yis// rin chen gnas rnams gang nas btsal// rin chen me 'tshal ji ltar lags/
500b4(rgyud): rin po che ni ji ltar brtag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rgya mtsho chen po'i phyi rol na// rin po che yi gling yod de// de yi gnas nas btsal bar bya// gzhan yang rin chen gnas rnams ni/
500b5(rgyud): gser dngul la sogs rdo rnams ni// gser dngul kun na yod par gsungs// rin chen shes pa rnam pa lta// dang por rgyud rnams thams cad la// rmongs pa med pas shes pa dang // bla ma'i man ngag
500b6(rgyud): shes pas thob// gnyis pa rnal 'byor bcas pas shes// gsum pargyud kyi man ngag la// zhugs pa'i tshong dpon chen pos shes// bzhi pa yon tan kun ldan pa'i// rgyal po chen po des shes so//
500b7(rgyud): lnga pa rnal 'byor mkhas pa dang // rgyal po dang ni 'brel ba yi// gser mgar mkhas pas rtogs par 'gyur// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// dang po'i man ngag ji ltar yin// gnyis pa
501a1(rgyud): rnal 'byor ji ltar lags// gsum pa rgyud ni ji ltar lags// bzhi pa'i yon tan ji ltar lags// lnga pa 'brel ba ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
501a2(rgyud): dadang po man ngag shes pa yang // rin chen ngo bo gcig nyid la// yon tan du mar shes pa ste// dper na rdzas kyi pha lam bzhin// chu la mi 'bying 'bigs la sogs// du ma shes pa man ngag yin//
501a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor shes pa rtse gcig ste// de yis thams cad shes pa yin// rgyud kyi don ni shes pa yi// tshong dpon de yis shes pa yin// sngags dang rgyud la sogs pa yi// yon tan kun ldan rgyal
501a4(rgyud): pos shes// rgyal po rnal 'byor dang 'brel ba'i// sa 'og gser gyi rlang pas shes// gser mgar de yis shes pa'o// brtag pa rnam pa gnyis yin te// mngon sum dang ni mtshan ma ste/
501a5(rgyud): rdo rje pha lam la sogs dang // e ran d+ha la sogs pa yi// mngon sum gtan la phab pa yin// ma hA nI la la sogs pa// gdon rnams thub cing lha rnams skyob// dam tshig nyams pa gso ba
501a6(rgyud): dang // tshe rnams ring ba la sogs so// drang por gdon gyi mtshan ma ni// mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya// de nas rten gyi mtshan ma la// de nyid cho ga tshul bzhin bya// de nas chu mig gtsang ma/
501a7(rgyud): ru/ gtor ma btang la chu gtsang blang // gser dngul snod du chu blugs la// lha 'am klu 'am gnod sbyin sogs// mtshan ma gnyis kyi maN+Dal la// rnal 'byor pa yis gzhag par bya// gom pa gsum
501b1(rgyud): gyis gcad par bya// g.yon gyi maN+Dal thog tu ni// chu yi nang du me long gzhag/ phyi ru gtor ma cha gcig gzhag/ nang du yol ba dkar pos gcad// de ru tshogs dang bkra shis gzhag/ rnal
501b2(rgyud): 'byor yan lag khrus byas la// lha yi rnal 'byor rdzogs pa dang // khro bos drag tu mtshams gcad la// sbom po khro mo lha ru bsgom// de yis rin chen dang po gzung // de nas sor bzhi 'phyang du
501b3(rgyud): gzhug/ thub pa mi thub la sogs pa// mkhas pas brtags shing shes par bya// dbyibs dang kha dog rin po che// yon tan med pa ga la srid// dper na bu gcig skyes gyur na// pha med pa yang ga la
501b4(rgyud): srid// de bas mkhas pas brtag par bya// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// gser dngul la sogs ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gser ni rnam pa gnyis yin
501b5(rgyud): te/ rang bzhin dang ni bzor byas yin// rang bzhin gyis ni 'chi ba bslu// bzo byas pa ni rnam pa gnyis// gesar 'gyur gser gyi rgyan yin te// bdar ba'i lam ni srid lam 'gegs// lo dang /
501b6(rgyud): zla ba zla ba phyed// mkhas pas brtags shing shes par bya// dngul la sogs pa'ang de bzhin te// mdor na snang zhing srid pa'i rdzas// thams cad rin po che yin te// man ngag can gyis shes par 'gyur//
501b7(rgyud): de nas bcud kyi rin po che// lus kyi ri rab lhun po la// rin chen gser gyi dbye ba yang // thabs dang shes rab rin po che// shes rab rtsa yi rang bzhin te// thabs ni byang chub sems yin no// dmar
502a1(rgyud): dang dang ba shes rab ste// dkar dang dang ba thabs su gsungs// a ba d+hA tI rin chen las// thig le ru ma 'phreng ba yin// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// a bad+hU tI dzi ltar/
502a2(rgyud): lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// a bad+hU tI'i rang bzhin las// steng du sgo lnga yang dag gnas// bar dang 'og tu'ang de bzhin te// bskyed dang rdzogs dang rang bzhin las// yin tan ston
502a3(rgyud): gyi mtshan nyid do// bde chen thig le haM yin no// oM dang A hUM haM dang bzhi// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo ru// sku gsung thugs dang bde ba che// 'bar ba bzhi ru yang dag pa shad// sku gsung thugs dang bde ba che/
502a4(rgyud): mgrin pa ru ni 'jug pa bzhi// snying kar yang ni 'dzag pa bzhi// sprul pa ru yang de bzhin te// chos kyi sku ni rin chen la// stong pa bcu drug 'phreng bar bshad// de nas shin tu gsang ba'i don// pad+ma rdo rje gnyis pa
502a5(rgyud): la/ a ba d+hU tI rin po che// a phaT e dang baM dang bzhi// gsang ba'i thig le bzhi ru bshad// a ni me long lta bu ste// phaT ni bya ba nan tan yin// e ni so sor rtog pa ste// baM ni mnyam nyid ye shes so// rin
502a6(rgyud): chen chos dbyings ye shes te// rnam par thar dang stong pa dang // mtshan dang de bzhin dpe byad rnams// a ni 'khor lo 'byung ba bzhi// phaT kyi gnas su ye shes lnga// e yi gnas su snyoms 'jug dag/ baM gi
502a7(rgyud): gnas su lnga bcu brgyad// de kho na ru shes par bya// k+Sha e e ta sa bon bzhi// yon tan skyon gyi mtshan nyid kyis// kun la khyab cing shes par bya// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// 'di yis gdon rnams
502b1(rgyud): ji ltar thub// byang sems dgag pa ji ltar lags// skra dkar gnyer ma ji ltar zhi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rnam par rtog pa gdon yin te// mtshan dang dpe byang spong ba dang // phung po/
502b2(rgyud): lnga ni bdud rtsi lnga// skye mched de ni lnga ru 'gyur// khams rnams rten gyi ngo bo ste// de rnams rten rtsa'i ngo bo ste// rnam rtog spong phyir rin po che// byang chub sems dgag rim pa yang // g.yas brkyang bas ni thabs
502b3(rgyud): kyis te// g.yon gyis shes rab rtsa mdud dgag/ sa gas nam mkha' dgag par bya// zlum pos gsang ba'i sna rtser dgag/ la la nA dang ra sa nA// a ba d+hU tI'i nang chud pa// de ni nam mkha' zlum po ste// dper na/
502b4(rgyud): sbrul gyi lce gnyis la// dug dang sman ni yod pa bzhin// gzhan yang 'dug stangs bye brag gis// dgag pa'i bye brag shes par bya// 'gag pa srog dang rtsol ba'i rten// de ltar dbus su gnas pa dang // rim
502b5(rgyud): nas rim par gyen la drang // skad cig nas bzung lo yi bar// skra dkar gnyer ma'i rang bzhin 'gag/ gang la brten pa de yi tshad// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// dbus su gnas pa ji ltar lags//
502b6(rgyud): rim nas rim du ji ltar drang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// thabs zhes bya ba rtag pa'i mtha'// shes rab ces pa chad pa'i mtha'// snyoms par zhugs pa dbu ma'i don// g.yas kyi srog ni
502b7(rgyud): rtag pa'i mtha'// g.yon gyi rtsol ba chad pa'i mtha'// de gnyis gnas pa dbu ma'i don// ro ma rtag pa'i byang chub sems// brkyang ma khrag ni chad pa'o// kun d+har ma ru gang gnas pa// de ni dbu mar shes par
503a1(rgyud): bya mchog gi dga' ba rtag pa'i mtha'// bral ba'i dga' ba chad pa'i mtha'// lhan cig dga' ba dbu mar bshad// oM dang hUM ni mtha' gnyis te// A yi rnam pa dbu mar
503a2(rgyud): gnas// A li kA li mtha' gnyis te// ma ni yi ge dbu ma yin// skyes pa bud med mtha' gnyis te// ma ning gnyis su med par gsungs// 'di ni sgom pa zung du 'jug/ de ni gnas pa dbu ma'i don/
503a3(rgyud): shes rab pha rol phyin pa ru// 'brel pa zung du 'jug par gsungs// bya ba'i rgyud dang rnal 'byor rgyud// snang ba zung du 'jug par gsungs// dpal ldan gsang ba 'dus pa ru// steng sgo dbugs la
503a4(rgyud): zung du 'jug/ shes rab rnal 'byor bla ma ru// sih+la ga pur zung du 'jug/ rim nas rim du dang ba yang // gsang ba'i 'khor lo a la ni// bde ba rdzogs pa'i tshad bstan pa// pad+ma rdo rje 'gas pa snyam// de ni/
503a5(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshad// de nas gsang ba'i 'khor lo nas// bde chen 'khor lo'i bar du drang // dang por de ltar shes par bya// de ltar sems ni brtan 'gyur ni// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo nas/
503a6(rgyud): gsang ba'i sna rtse'i bar du drang // lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// bcud kyi rin chen gang na gnas// de ni shes pa su yis shes// de yi brtag pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis
503a7(rgyud): bka' stsal pa// spyi bo tshangs pa'i bu gnas// gsang ba'i 'khor lo yan chad du// a ba d+hU tI'i tsan dan gnas// la la ras sbrul ltar gnas// gzhan rnams pa thag khug par gnas// 'di rnam
503b1(rgyud): rang bzhin kun la gnas// rtsa dang 'khor lo 'di rnams ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying por gsungs// phyi yi rtsa dang nang gi rtsa// gsang ba de bzhin mthar thug ni// man ngag yod pas shes/
503b2(rgyud): par gsungs// brtag pa rnam pa gnyis su bstan// dang po lus kyi brtag pa ste// gnyis pa dag tu shes par bya// lus la spyi dang bye brag gnyis// spu ni rlung gi rang bzhin te// yan lag zung na chu yi
503b3(rgyud): khams// yan lag rgyas pa sa yi khams// sman zheng chen me yi khams// sna tshogs du ma nam mkha'i khams// spyi ru dkar ba chu yi khams// dmar ba me ru shes par bya// ser ba de bzhin sa yi
503b4(rgyud): khams// sngon rlung du shes par bya// yang na rlung gi khams yin te// drod rnams chen me yi khams// brtan pa sa yi khams su gsungs// chu khams chen chu yi khams// de rnams kun ldan nam/
503b5(rgyud): mkha'i khams// 'jug pa bde chen sa yin te// ldog pa sprul pa chu ru gsungs// rnal 'byor rgyud ni bye brag gis// sems kyi gnas pa shes par byed// shu kra rlung la si h+la me// sprul dang chos
503b6(rgyud): su sbyar ba yin// gzhan yang mkhas pas shes par bya// de nas bye brag gsungs pa yin// dbyibs dang kha dog mtshan ma gsum// kun la mkhas par shes par bya// dang por dbyibs kyi
503b7(rgyud): brtag pa yang // dpral ba'i dbyibs la rnam pa bzhi// gru bzhi zlum po zla gam dang // gru gsum du yang shes par bya// dkar po la sogs de dang 'dra// rna ba nas bzung rkang pa'i bar// kun la brtag
504a1(rgyud): cing shes par bya// skad ni phra dang sgom pa dang // ring du 'don dang thung ba dang // 'dar ba la sogs bye brag rnams// mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya// rtags de brtag/
504a2(rgyud): pa'i mtshan ma ni// rnam pa gsum du shes par bya// 'dod chags sku dang zhe sdang thugs// mun pa gsum du shes par bya// dang po 'dod chags dbye ba yang // yar ngo mar ngo mtshams dang gsum//
504a3(rgyud): dbyibs dang kha dog skad gsum la// mkhas pa 'dod pa skye ba brtag/ nyin par bzhi dang mtshan par bzhi// de bzhin skad cig thang cig rnams// mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya// mig 'dzun
504a4(rgyud): ba spu ldang la sogs// dbyibs kyi 'dod pa skye ba dang // 'dod pa'i gzugs ldan cung zhig dmar// sna bug dkar la sogs pa dang // skad 'dar kha ni skam la sogs// 'dod pa skyes pa'i rtags su/
504a5(rgyud): bshad// gzhan yang 'dod pa skyes pa'i rtags// kha dog dbyibs la brtag par bya// sra phyir 'dod pa sa yi rtags// chu la sogs pa de bzhin no// gsung dang thugs la'ang shes par bya// lha mos gsol ba
504a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das// 'dod chags zhes pa ji ltar lags// de yi chen po ji ltar lags// zhe sdang la sogs ji ltar lags// sku gsung thugs ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
504a7(rgyud): 'dod chags nyon mongs 'khor ba ste// gab pa'i gsang ba ma rtogs par// sbas pa'i gsang ba la zhen nas// srid pa'i sa bon mi zad par// dper na rgyud kyi mda' bzhin du// 'bras bu mnar med dmyal
504b1(rgyud): bar skye// chen po mi rtog rang bzhin te// 'bras bu gnyis med ye shes bskyed// 'dod chags zhes pa spang bya ste// de yi chen po gnyen por gsungs// 'dod chags zhes pa me tog ste// de yi chen po dri/
504b2(rgyud): dang 'dra// gzhan yang bye brag shes par bya// zhe sdang la sogs gong dang 'dra// thams cad rten pa sku ru bstan// brjod pa dang bral gsung du bstan// rnam rtog bral ba thugs su shes// rnam rtog chung
504b3(rgyud): zhing gtong phod che// bla ma la gus snying rje che// gzhan yang bye brag kun shes pa// 'di la bstan gyi kun la gsang // bla ma yon tan kun ldan zhing // dbang dang man ngag 'brel shes dang // gsang ba'i
504b4(rgyud): don la ma rmongs shing // thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas// chos la ser sna med pa dang // gsal la gsong por smra ba dang // rigs bcas kun gyis bkur ba dang // las kyi phyag rgya 'chang ba dang /
504b5(rgyud): dam tshig dang ldan bla ma ste// 'di la bkur gyi thams cad la// bsnyen cing bkur bar bya ba min// de nas rin chen gsum pa ni// gnyis med lhan cig skyes pa ste// rtog bral spros pa med pa
504b6(rgyud): yin// de rtogs rin chen 'phreng ba'o// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// gab pa zhes pa ji ltar lags// de yi 'bras bu ji ltar smin// sbas pa zhes pa ji ltar lags// de yi 'bras bu ji lta/
504b7(rgyud): lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gab pa zhes pa ye shes te// sum cu rtsa bdun sku gsung thugs// chos dang longs spyod sprul sku gsung // dga' ba bzhi ru mdor bsdus pa/
505a1(rgyud): dmigs pa'i rkyen ni gsang ba'o// bdun dang ldan phyir chen po yi// sum cu rtsa bdun la sogs pa'i// gnyen po stobs kyis ma zhugs pa// sbas pa pad+ma rdo rje gnyis// snyoms
505a2(rgyud): par zhugs na 'dod pa skye// 'di ni rkun mo ma rus pa// dper na ljon shing rtsa ba las// yalag me tog thams cad skyes// nyon mongs rtsa ba 'dod rags la// dug gsum la sogs thams cad de/
505a3(rgyud): sbas pa'i gsang ba'i 'khor ba ste// gab pa mya ngan 'das par gsungs// 'khor ba mnar med dmyal ba dang // dur khrod brgyad po dregs pa can// snying rje med cing sha khrag za// shing rta'i 'khor lo/
505a4(rgyud): bzhin du gnas// mya ngan 'das pa sku gsum sa// skyob pa mya ngan 'das gyur kyang // 'khor lo 'khor ba'i tshul du ni// tshogs kyi shugs kyi mthu yis su// sems can don la yang dag 'jug
505a5(rgyud): chos su spos bral nam mkha' bzhin// sku gnyis sprin dang char lta bu// sku gnyis sems can don mdzad pa// sems can las dang smon lam stobs// de yi stobs kyis snang ba las// yang dag/
505a6(rgyud): nyid la snang rgyu med// sku gsung de nyid bzhi bcu'i don// dur khrod la sogs brda ru shes// sum cu rtsa gnyis chos sku'i brda// rgyan ni gzugs sku gnyis kyi brda// gzhan yang brda yi bye brag ni// sgom/
505a7(rgyud): po gsang ba'i rdo rje'i brda// khro mo gsang ba'i pad+ma'i brda// sku dang drang ba yon tan skyon// mdzub mo le rten mthe'u chung ni// nga yi gan du tshur shog yin// mthe bong la brten mdzub mo bar// khyod kyi
505b1(rgyud): gan du 'ong gis yin// mthe bong mdzub gnyis zur gsum ni// b+ha ga rgyas sam dri ba yin// b+ha ga rgyas pa zlum por ston// bde ba'i gnas su 'du ba yang // srod dam na ma gung tho rangs gsum// mdzun
505b2(rgyud): tshigs dang po nas bzung nas// tha ma'i bar du brda yin no// sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs kyis// lan gsum bar du nan tan gnang // gzhan yang brda yi bye brag rnams// rgyud rnams kun tu ma gsum
505b3(rgyud): pa/ gnas ni thabs kyi 'dug stangs so// nye gnas shes rab 'dug par gsungs// zhing ni thabs kyi bza' ba'i tshogs// de bzhin shes rab nye ba'i zhing // 'du ba thabs ni 'ong ngo ste// shes rab 'ong
505b4(rgyud): banye 'du yin// tsAn+do thabs kyi star dang rgya na// shes rab de bzhin nyid tsAn+do// dur khrod thabs kyi rnam rtog bral// de bzhir shes rab nye dur khrod// gzhan yang badz+ra yi bye brag rnams// kha dog de bzhin
505b5(rgyud): dbyibs dang yang // yan lag tshul las shes par bya// de nas lha mo la sogs pas mchod pa sna tshogs pas mchod nas mi snang bar gyur to// dpal rin chen 'phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po
505b6(rgyud): gsang ba yang gsang bste rang bzhin gyis gsang ba rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po rin chen rdo rje dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la
505b7(rgyud): phab pa'o// slad kyis kyang dpe phyi mo la gtugs nas bcos pa'o// rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA sa ma ya dan+da rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal dam/
506a1(rgyud): tshig chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
506a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha gA la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po dang / rnal 'byor ma grangs med pa'i nang /
506a3(rgyud): nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying po la zhal 'dzum pa mdzad nas/ dam tshig gi rim pa bka' stsal pa/ dam tshig dang ni mi ldan na// bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te// rgyu med pa yi 'bras
506a4(rgyud): bu bzhin// tshe yi dus byas dmyal bar 'gro// de phyir dam tshig shin tu bsrung // sangs rgyas bla ma las thob phyir// thun mong ma yin bla ma yi// lnga bcu'i bdag nyid bsrung bar bya// thun mong brgyad dang bcu
506a5(rgyud): bzhi ste// de rnams nges pas shes par bya// de rnams spyi yi dam tshig ste// bye brag dam tshig bsrung bar bya// phung po lnga ni rigs lnga ste// 'byung ba lnga ni yum lnga'o// skye mched sems dpa' sems ma/
506a6(rgyud): yin// gzugs phung rnam par snang mdzad la// brjed dang brnyas pa la sogs spong // de la mchod dang bstod sogs bya// don dam par ni rang rig ste// tshogs bsags phyir ni nga yis gsungs// tshor//
506a7(rgyud): bal sogs de dang 'dra// sa ni sangs rgyas spyan yin te// spyod lam gsum du ma yengs shig/ gong du gsungs pa'i tshul bzhin bsrung // chu la sogs pa de bzhin no// mig la sogs pa de bzhin no// gzugs/
506b1(rgyud): la sogs pa de bzhin bsrung / dkyil 'khor du zhugs rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhin du mchod// brnyas shing gshe ba la sogs spyang // sems can po dang mo kun la// dpa' byo pa' mo ma tshig/
506b2(rgyud): bsrung // bka' ba la sogs dus su yang // bdud ni sbyor bas dam tshig bsrung // shAlnga bdud rtsi lnga rnams la// rang gi sbyong dang gzhan spyod la// rjes su yi rang dam tshig yin// mdor na snang zhing srid pa
506b3(rgyud): rdzas 'dam tshig bsrung zhing mchod pa'i phyir// lus kyi nyos sdom sku yin to// ngag gnyis sdom gsung du gsungs// yod kyi nyes sdom thugs su gsungs// oM gyi 'od zer dkar po yis// 'dod lam
506b4(rgyud): dag par gyur pa ni// sku yi dam tshig bsrung ba'o// de la mchod dang bstod sogs bya// bsdu ba'ang oM du shes par bya// AHmi kha dog dmar po yis// gzugs khams dag pa'i gsung dam tshig/ d+h+r-i gi la rdo/
506b5(rgyud): nag po yis// gzugs med dag pa dam tshig go/ oM ni spyi bor yang dag gnas// AHni de bzhin mgrin par gnas// hUM ni snying kar spro dang bsdu// sku yi mkha' 'gro bcu gnyis su// 'dod khams dam pa'i
506b6(rgyud): dam tshig go// gsung gi mkha' 'gro bcu gnyis su// gzugs khams dag pa'i dam tshig yin// thugs kyi mkha' 'gro bcu gnyis su// gzugs med dag pa'i dam tshig ste// oM dang AHdang hUM la bsdu/
506b7(rgyud): oM ni rgyu yi sku bcu gnyis// AHni lam gyi sku bcu gnyis// hUM ni 'bras bu'i sku bcu gnyis// bde ba chen po'i sku gsung thugs// ye shes gcig sbyor sdom pa'o// dpal ldan chos kyi sku gsung thugs//
507a1(rgyud): ye shes gcig sbyor sdom pa'o// longs spyod rdzogs pa sku gsung thugs// ye shes gcig sbyor sdom pa'o// sprul pa yang ni sku gsung thugs// ye shes gcig sbyor sdom pa'o//
507a2(rgyud): bde chen snying po hUM nyid la// sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yang // ye shes dang ni rnam pa bzhi// oM dang AHdang hUM dang yang // yan lag bzhi bzhir thub pas gsungs// rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu la/
507a3(rgyud): bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad shes par bya// aM dang haM gnyis rang bzhin gyi// sngags kyi ngo bor shes par bya// sngags kyi grangs ni nyi khri sbyong // drug brgya bzlas par shes par bya// lag pa bskyod pa rang bzhin gar// rkang pa/
507a4(rgyud): rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ro// de ltar gnas ni dam tshig go// gzhan yang dam tshig bye brag yang // 'jig rten tha snyad spang ba'i phyir// mi bskyod rnam snang la sogs dang // dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma zhes pa// gas
507a5(rgyud): ba'i rdo rje pad+ma dang // ji ltar rol pa'i spyod pa kun// tha snyad kyang ni lam la 'jug/ gzhan yang gsang ba'i dam tshig ni// rtsa ba bzhi dang yan lag bcu// theg pa che la smod pa dang // gsang ba'i don la skur
507a6(rgyud): 'debs dang // rnal 'byor kun la gnod pa dang // sems can kun la 'tshe byed pa// 'di bsad pa ni dam tshig yin// sbas pa bsrung ba'i rim pa yang // ma byin blang ba'i dam tshig ste// 'dod pa chen po dang ldan pa/
507a7(rgyud): 'dod chags spyod pa'ang de dang 'dra// rang gi dam tshig bsrung ba'i phyir// brdzun du smra ba bzhi pa yin// ro tsa'i sha dang bcud kyi sha/ kha ba'i chang dang mngar ba'i chang // mar la gcig ste 'o ma gnyis// gzhan ni gsum ste
507b1(rgyud): yan lag bcu// 'di ltar dam tshig yin par gsungs// bdud rtsi nyid la dus gsum du// bcom ldan sku gsung thugs kyi ste// dang por yungs kar tha ma yang // byi la'i kham gyi tshul du bza'// mtshan mo shes rab sku
507b2(rgyud): gsung thugs// nyin mo thabs kyi sku gsung thugs// nyi ma nub dang nyi ma shar// nyi ma gung gi thabs kyi dus// nam srod nam ni langs pa dang // nam gyi gung ni shes rab dus// dus drug mchod pa rgyun mi 'chad// dam tshig
507b3(rgyud): 'di las ma nyams na// phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi// mchod dang srung ba la sogs bye// gzhan yang gsang ba'i bye brag la// gsang ba sgom pa'i rnal 'byor pas/
507b4(rgyud): lus la me dang khrag mi gdon// srog gam zug rngu'i phyir ma gtogs// srog chags 'dod pa spyod mthong na// rang gi rnal 'byor shor mi bya// dam tshig bsrung phyir dben par 'dug/ las su rung na g.yeng bar 'khyam/
507b5(rgyud): 'di skad ces bya yan lag brgyad// bdag gis bcu bzhi yin par gsungs// thos pa'i dus gcig lnga bcu'i don// bcom ldan 'das ni rtsa ba bzhi// de bzhin gshegs pa yan lag bcu// sku gsung thugs ni lus ngag
507b6(rgyud): yid/ rdo rje mi phyed phyir dam tshig/ btsun mo dam tshig gis brgyan mdzes// b+ha ga mnyam par 'jog pas so// snyoms pa dus gsum mi 'gyur ba// bzhugs pa bde ba'i ngo bo la'o// rdo rje snying po la sogs pa/ bye bran
507b7(rgyud): yin par nga yis gsungs// e ni yan lag brgyad yin no// baM ni bcu po'i rang bzhin te// ma ni lnga bcu'i rang bzhin no// ya ni gzhan rnams yin par gsungs// e ni srog chags gsod pa ste// baM ni ma byin lan
508a1(rgyud): pa'o/ ma ni brdzun du smra ba'o// ya ni 'dod chags spyod pa'o// a ni sku yi dam tshig ste// baM ni gsung gi dam tshig go/ ma ni thugs kyi dam tshig ste// ya ni bza' ba'i dam tshig go/
508a2(rgyud): dus gsum dam tshig ma bsrungs na// 'jig rten pa dang 'bum 'gyur bas// rnam smin che bar nga yis gsungs// dam tshig nyams pa'i mtshan ma ni// lus kyi nyes pa sna tshogs 'byung // ngag gi nyes pa sa
508a3(rgyud): tshogs smra// kha dog dbyibs rnams 'gyur bas dang // lag gis rdzas rnams mi thub cing // 'bras dang shu ba la sogs 'byung // de tshe rnal 'byor nyams pa des// dam tshig nyams pa shin tu bsam// bla ma rdo rje spun
508a4(rgyud): gral du// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor sprul byas la// gser dngul la sogs brgya 'am stong // rta dang glang po la sogs dang // bai DUR+Ya dang man shel dang // gdugs dang rgyal mtshan brgya 'am stong // mar me la sogs/
508a5(rgyud): de bzhin no// tshogs kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor// tshogs bsags pas ni nyams pa gso// gal te nyams pa ma gsos na// nyams pa de dang rnal 'byor gzhan// gnas gcig dang ni chu gcig gam// yul dang lam
508a6(rgyud): gyi gnas gcig gam// skad cig tsam yang 'dug mi bya// 'dug na nyes pa bsam mi khyab// rab gnas sbyin sreg dbang bskur dang // gtor ma mchod dang bzlas pa dang // ril bu mig sman la sogs dang // zhi rgyas la
508a7(rgyud): sogs las rnams dang // 'jig rten mtshan ma brgyad dag dang // 'jig rten 'das pa'i mtshan ma bzhi// sangs rgyas pa yi mtshan ma gcig/ gzhan yang dngos grub ma lus pa// dam tshig 'di las 'byung bar 'gyur//
508b1(rgyud): smyarnamapa sna tshogs skye 'byung ba/ nani chenas las skyes pa dan// dam pa skra gsung thugs yin te// de las 'das na tshig pa shAr// de rdzun me dpal khyis// sem thag tu slong par 'gyur//
508b2(rgyud): na dam tshag 'di ma na// yanar med sems can dmyal bar ste// pi wang gling bri sbyor kun sags// d+ha dang bral na badrang mi rung // de bzhin dam chig med gyur na// sngags panas sdom pa la sogs pa/ 'jas
508b3(rgyud): bu med par brlag par 'gyur// nas las nas kyi myu gus+t+wa~M// dam tshig las ni rdo rje 'byung / tsho 'dir thob par gsungs pa ste// dus ni gzhan min rtsod ldan dus// bstan pa gzhan min nga yis te// skye ba gzhan min pa/
508b4(rgyud): d+yung ma/ yan dag gzhan monas ma la// bzhin len par gsungs pa'o// de ltar dam tshig dang ldan pa// bud med 'dra zhing dga' bar 'gyur/ mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma mo ste// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan mar bldan/
508b5(rgyud): nor dang bran dang g.yog 'khor dang // rgyal po'i 'khor yul la sogs 'du// ngag ni snyan cing bde bar 'gyur// srog gcod la sogs tshig smras kyang // sems can skrag par mi 'gyur ro// lus kyis sems can
508b6(rgyud): sad byas kyang // rnam smin 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// sku ni thob par gsungs pa'o// ngag gis phra ma'i tshig smras kyang // nyes par mi 'gyur gsung thob 'gyur// yid kyis mnang sems bsam byas kyang / nyes
508b7(rgyud): bar mi 'gyur thugs thob 'gyur// dam tshig ldan pa'i yon tan no// e ma'o rgyud ni ngo mtshar che// dpal dam tshig chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang /
509a1(rgyud): lo nu ba dge slong shA g+h+ra ye shes kyis bsgyur bya'o// rgyag swA du/ mthapa la tan+da nas/ bod ga du/ dpal nabs
509a2(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal sdom pa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i byang chub sems
509a3(rgyud): dpa' rdo rje snying po la sogs pa dpa' bo'i tshogs dang / lA ma la sogs pa mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs dang / rnal 'byor ma dang / ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor nas btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par zhugs so// 'jig rten na
509a4(rgyud): cher grags pa// dgra ni chen po drug yin te// ji ltar nyi ma nub pa'i tshe// grong khyer gyi ni mi rnams kyis// rta dang glang po la sogs pa// rdzas rnams yongs su 'phrog par byed// thams cad dbul por skye bar 'gyur
509a5(rgyud): de bzhin yul drug gi ni dgras// shes rab nyi ma nub pa'i tshe// ma rig pa yi mun pa la// so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis// ye shes lnga la sogs pa yi// rdzas rnams yongs su 'phrog par byed// bde ba med pa
509a6(rgyud): gnas su skye// dgra de yongs su gzhom pa'i phyir// mchod pa med cing bzlas pa med// gtor ma sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor med// klog dang sgom pa bsam gtan med// g.yeng ba'i tshes dang skar ma'i sogs// thams
509a7(rgyud): cad spangs te bde ba yi// stan la bdag nyid legs 'dug ste// shes rab ye shes bsrub par bya// shing rta yi ni 'khor lo ltar// yul la yang dag rgyug pa'i sems// de dag las ni bzlog nas su//
509b1(rgyud): las kyi rlung ni chen po g.yos// ye shes me ni chen po 'bar// rnam rtog sreg ste bdud rtsi'i ros// til gyi 'bru bzhin gang ba ste// skye ba med pa'i gnas su gzung // de nas sems ni brtan gyur nas// mtshan mar/
509b2(rgyud): snang ba 'gag par 'gyur// de nyid las ni bzlog nas su// rang sems stong par bsgom par bya// chos la bdag med rtogs pa na// de tshe sems ni rtogs par 'gyur// thams cad stong par ros gang ste// bde ba
509b3(rgyud): chen po'i sku zhes brjod// shes rab pha rol phyin pa ste// 'di la bsal ba ci yang med// bsnan par bya ba ci yang med// de nyid mthong bas rnam par grol// rigs gcig dang ni rigs gsum dang // rigs lnga rigs ni
509b4(rgyud): brgya la sogs// de nyid 'di la tha dad med// ji ltar glang po rnyed gyur nas// glang po'i rjes ni mi btsal ltar// sems kyi de nyid rnyed gyur na// rnam rtog gang yang mi btsal lo// ji ltar dug ni 'dod pa la// sman nyid drug tu sbyar
509b5(rgyud): te sbyin// sman las dug 'byung skyong ba yang // sman pa mkhas pas sbyor ba shes// gzhan yang mar dang khar dang // mar gyi snying po la sogs pa// 'thungs te zhun smar du 'gyur// de bzhin nga yis gsungs pa yang // drang
509b6(rgyud): ba'i don dang nges pa'i don// sgra ni ji bzhin ji bzhin min// dgongs pa dang ni dgongs pa min// bsregs bcad bdar ba'i gser bzhin du// yongs su brtags nas nga yi bka'// blang bar bya yis mos pa 'am/
509b7(rgyud): gzhan gyis mkhas pa 'jug mi bya// ji ltar skye bo blun po ste// dgra ru 'gyur ba'i skye bo yis// sman yin byas te dug byin na// sman du dmigs te dug zos na// zos pa'i rjes la 'chi bar 'gyur// thabs rnams
510a1(rgyud): thams cad sgyu mar shes// shes rab brjod du med par gsungs// ji ltar rig pa mkhas pa yis// dug ni dug gis 'byin par byed// ji ltar me yis tshig pa la// de bzhin me yis gdung
510a2(rgyud): bar bya// ji ltar 'dod chags che ba la// 'dod chags nyid kyis spang bar bya// ji ltar zhe sdang che ba la// zhe sdang nyid kyis spang bar bya// de bzhin gti mug che ba la// gti mug nyid kyis spang bar bya// dper na rlung ni/
510a3(rgyud): mar me 'jig pa'i rgyu// de nyid nags sreg me yi grogs su 'gyur// de bzhin 'dod la rten pa bde ba'i yul// drug gis dgra rnams bcom nas gnyis med thob// ril bu mig sman la sogs pa// 'di nyid las ni
510a4(rgyud): thams cad 'byung // ji ltar pha rol thabs ldan pas// gzings la brten nas pha rol 'gro// pha rol phyin nas 'dor bar byed// de bzhin rang rig 'tshol bas kyang // bud med sgyu ma la brten te// rang rig ye shes
510a5(rgyud): thob par bya// rang rig ye shes thob pa dang // bud med sgyu ma dor bar bya// zab mo'i dgongs pa ma shes shing // zab mo 'di dgongs pa ma rtogs par// zab mo'i spyod pa spyod par byed// sems can dmyal ba chen po//
510a6(rgyud): lhung 'ji ltar ri yi rtse mo nas// skyes bu 'ga' zhig lhung gyur na// de ni ltung ba chen por 'gyur// gzhan yang dar gyi srin bu yis// rang la rang gis 'ching bar byed// mtshan mo me yi srin bu yang // rang gis rang ni
510a7(rgyud): sreg par byed// sgyu ma tsam gyi tshul gnas shing // mtha' bzhi las ni rnam par grol// spros pa thams cad nye bar zhi// mtshon cha mtshon byed ma yin te// lta ba'i dbus na gnas pa yi// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'o//
510b1(rgyud): dpal stobs po che'i rgyud las/ mngon par rtogs pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// gang zhig brtag par byed pa ma yin te// gnas nas shin tu brtags pa ra// khru ba yi maN+Dal
510b2(rgyud): lang dang po ba yi rnam lnga yis// sor gcig tsam du byug par bya// de nas dri chen dri chu yis// byugs te me tog sngon po dgram// rgyan la sogs pas mdzes par brgyan// bum pa lnga ni phyogs dang dbus// de
510b3(rgyud): nas bzlas pa khri 'am 'bum// bdud rtsi chu ru byin brlabs te// gang zhig brtag pa'i mi de la// dang po mtshams gcad khrus byas te// smag pa nag po phyir bzlog gyon// sgra ni gyen bcings sha bcings dang //
510b4(rgyud): ber ka thogs te shar sgor gzhag/ tshil chen me mar shar du bstan// nub tu me long dngul la sogs// dag pa de la sman lnga dang // dri lngas byugs te bkru bar bya// de nas me long nang du yang /
510b5(rgyud): gdon gyi mtshan ma brtag bya ste// gtso bo'i sngags kyi mtha' ru ni// gdon gyi ming dang sngags brtags na// lha yi gdon la sogs pa kun// mtshan ma 'byung ba the tsom med// mi de rgyan ni tha dad de//
510b6(rgyud): lha la sogs mthong bye brag go/ dus ni 'byung po'i nyi ma sogs// mtshan ma sna tshogs byung ba'i tshe// de tshe gdon ni dbang du bsdu// tshe dang bsod nams longs spyod dang // mdza' bshes zug rngu
510b7(rgyud): la sogs pa// gdon la sogs pa bsal ba'i phyir// dpal ldan mkha' 'gro ma la sogs// brtag pa'i rdzas kyi bye brag kyang // mchod dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo sogs// bskor la mtshan
511a1(rgyud): ma brtag par bya// dbang bskur dus su ye shes kyang // dbab po de bzhin sdig la sogs// mtshan ma me long dag la ni// brtags te gzhan yang ci 'dod pa'i// mtshan ma/
511a2(rgyud): brtag pa bla ma yi// zhal nas yang dag shes par bya// nad kyi zug rngu dbyung ba'i phyir// gso ba'i rig pa las gsungs pa'i// rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa dang // 'dus pa dang ni yan lag
511a3(rgyud): bcas// gnas bzhir 'khor lor gnas pa ste// lus kun khrus byas gnas bzhi ru// sngags pas lag pas mnye bya ste// mi long dkyil du brtag byas na// rlung la sogs pa shes par nges//
511a4(rgyud): de rjes 'khor lo de nyid la// gso ba'i sbyor ba shes par bya// dug gi brtag pa'i rim pa yang // nang khrol yan lag thams cad la// gang du dug zhugs mtshan ma brtag/ de nas gso ba'i//
511a5(rgyud): sbyor ba yang // sman dang sngags dang chu sbyar te// mkhas pas brtags nas gso bar bya// dpal stobs po che'i rgyud las mtshan ma thams cad brtag pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// /
511a6(rgyud): gang zhig bsrung ba'i rten de yang // gang dang ldan pa'i rim pa yis// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo brtsam par bya// gtso bo'i bzlas pa khri 'am 'bum// bsnyen par byas te/
511a7(rgyud): de nas yang // gser ram dngul las bzo byas te// nang du dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa 'am// yang na 'dab brgyad lte bar bcas// rdo rje ra ba la sogs bya// yungs kar la sogs 'bru lnga dang // rin chen
511b1(rgyud): lnga dang sman lnga dang // de nas bzhag ste rab gnas bya// yongs su rdzogs nas bcing bar bya// gzhan yang gro ga 'am shing shun nam// dur khrod dag gi ro ras la// bsang dang
511b2(rgyud): bgegs bskrad tshul bzhin bya// bzlas pa gong dang 'dra ba ste// dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs gyur na// sngags kyang yongs su rdzogs par bri// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo yis// lus
511b3(rgyud): ngag yid la bsrung bar bya// yongs su ma rdzogs zur drug la// dpa' bo drug gi sngags bris te// bsrung bya'i lus la mtshan par bsgom// rtsibs mtshan drug la g.yung drung gi/ yi ge drug ni bris
511b4(rgyud): pa ste/ bsrung bya'i lus la mtshan par bsgom// dbus su yi ge k+Sha bris te// bar chad thams cad bsal bar bsam// cho ga yongs su rdzogs bya ste// bzo byas snod ni kha dog sbyar// legs par
511b5(rgyud): spang ste spyi bo 'am// mgrin pa de bzhin dpung pa yi// tshangs pa'i bu gar longs spyod mnyam// sor bzhi dag tu bcing bar bya// gzhan yang nad pa'am rnal 'byor pa// dag la srung na dang po yang /
511b6(rgyud): gdon bsal bsangs te gnas gsum du// thig le gsum byas sngags gsum dgod// gzhan yang gnas ni sum cu bdun// thig le byas te sngags rnams dgod// de nas go cha mtshon cha
511b7(rgyud): yang / tshul bzhin mthun par shes par bya// de nas stan nam mal chal// oM AHbadz+ra rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM phaT/ bsgom mam gzhan la'ang bri bar bya// gzhan yang lag pa g.yas pa
512a1(rgyud): ya~M mthil du gur kum dag sbyar te// g.yon gyi sbom po khro ma yis// spyi bo dpral ba rna ba mig/ sna dang kha dang mgrin pa dang // dpung pa snying ka lte ba dang /
512a2(rgyud): 'og gi snod gnyis yan lag la// sngags dang bcas nas legs par 'tsho// gzhan yang skud pa sna lnga la// sngags dang bcas na srung bar 'gyur// dpal stobs po che'i
512a3(rgyud): rgyud las srung ba'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / mgon po thugs rje che ldan pa// de nyid la ni phyag 'tshal te// rdo rje snying pos yang zhus pa/
512a4(rgyud): srung ba'i 'khor lo de ltar ni// ye shes bye brag ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ye shes kyi ni de nyid kyi// rtog pa rab tu bshad par bya// de la ye
512a5(rgyud): shes kyi ni gnas// rnam pa lnga ru shes bya ste// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang // rab tu gsang dang gsang ba che// nga yis bshad kyis legs par nyon// de la phyi yi ye shes
512a6(rgyud): ni sku mdog phyag mtshan dang 'brel ba'o// de ltar rtogs pa phyi'i ye shes// nang gi phung sogs lha ru rtogs// de nyid dang bral ye shes so// de nas gsang ba'i ye
512a7(rgyud): shes ni// rtsa dang rlung dang thig ler rtogs// rtog pa de dang bral ba ni// gsang ba'i ye shes yin par bshad// dga' ba mchog dang bral ba'i dga'// lhan cig
512b1(rgyud): skyes dga' gang yin pa// bde bar rtog pa rnam rtog ste// de spong rab gsang ye shes so// de nas ye shes chen po bzhi// dang po ro mnyam mtha' spangs pa'i// ye shes
512b2(rgyud): de nyid yod pa la// rnam rtog spong ste de bzhin 'jog/ de nyid rang rig chen po ste// de nyid ye shes chen po'o// de ltar shes na rdor 'dzin gyi// sa ni nges par thob pa'o//
512b3(rgyud): dpal stobs po che'i rgyud las/ ye shes brtag pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas ye shes chen po yi// brtag pa de nyid bshad par bya// dang por
512b4(rgyud): ro mnyam gyur pa'o// stong pa nyid kyi ro mnyam la// sku mdog phyag mtshan la sogs pa// phung po khams dang skye mched sogs// rtsa dang rlung dang thig le dang // dga' dang
512b5(rgyud): mchog dga' bral ba dang // de la sogs pa thams cad kun// sgyu ma tsam du shes par bya// de nyid gzhan rig ces bya ste// rang rig sems kyi de nyid la// gnyis su med par
512b6(rgyud): sgom pa ni/ de nyid ye shes chen po ste// mthar phyin brtag pa rdzogs pa'o// dpal stobs po che'i rgyud las/ ye shes chen po brtag pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//
512b7(rgyud): de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang / rdo rje snying po la sogs pa dpa' bo dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / rnal 'byor ma dang / ma mo'i tshogs thams cad
513a1(rgyud): rjes su yi rang nas phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas/ g.yon phyogs nas lan gsum bskor ba byas nas mi sdang bar gyur to// dpal stobs po che'o/
513a2(rgyud): rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// / paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsA ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// /
513a3(rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+nyA na gu h+ya tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang
513a4(rgyud): chub che phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi// rang lus rtsa 'khor bzhi yi gtso bo yi// snying po de la yang dag phyag 'tshal lo// dbang bzhi'i de nyid bdag la gsungs// nyon tsog
513a5(rgyud): rdo rje snying po'i bdag/ bskyed pa'i rim pa'i lha rnams kyi// de nyid dang por bshad bya ste// drug cu rtsa bzhi dpe byad yin// sum cu rtsa bdun byang chub phyogs// lnga ni ye
513a6(rgyud): shes lnga yin te// dpa' bo gcig pa chos kyi dbyings// phyag mtshan sku mdog gzhan nas gsungs// gu h+ya'i rdo rje dril bu'i tshad// nas dang sor tshigs yin par 'dod//
513a7(rgyud): de nyid thabs dang shes rab yin// don dam nyid la dbyer med de// bsgom bya med de sgom pa med// bsgoms pas thob pa ci yang med// rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed du med// sems kyi gzhi/
513b1(rgyud): la mra lnga dang / non pa med cing bstan pa med/ 'jigs dang rnam chog kun dang bral/ nyid bzhi pa'i dacid do// dang po rlung gi nyid do// thogatshul banyis ni a dang // man
513b2(rgyud): chos rnams thog sa nas// ma sres pa yi don yin no// ci ni gzung 'dzin gnyis kyis skyong // ljang 'dug gsum ni sku gsung thugs// sems kyi gzhi dang sbrulnga dang // rnam par bar dang /
513b3(rgyud): stong ba dang // de bzhin mtshan dang dab byad sogs// de dag rlung gi de nyid de// de nas thig le'i de nyid kyang // ti zla thabs dang shes rab ste// sngags kyi 'phreng ba mtshan dpe yin// thig
513b4(rgyud): le ye shes lnga rang bzhin// gnyis su med pa'i de nyid yin// phra mo la sogs gzhan nas shes// de nas 'og gi sgro dag ni// de nyid yang dag bshad bya ste// rtsa gsum sku gsung
513b5(rgyud): thugs ngo bo rtsa lnga ye shes lnga yin no// tsaN+Da lI ni nyi shu bzhi// de nyid ye shes nyi shu bzhi// chos sku'i 'phrin las nyi shu bzhi// kha sbyar thabs dang shes rab ste// 'dzag
513b6(rgyud): dang 'bar ba gnyis med yin// 'khor lo bzhi ni sku bzhi ste// drug ni de nyid drug yin te// sgrol ma rlung gi de nyid de// me ni gos dkar ngo bo nyid// bcu drug stong pa bcu drug yin/
513b7(rgyud): bzhi ni ye shes bzhi yin no// rnam par thar dang stong pa dang // de bzhin mtshan dang dpe byad dang // rig sngags snyoms 'jug phra ba dgu// ye shes lnga bcu la sogs pa// rtsa 'dab
514a1(rgyud): de nyid yin par nges// rtsa de gnas pa'i rim pa yang // 'khor lo ba thag khug pa las// g.yas g.yon sbrul lngar 'khril ba ste// phyi yi g.yas g.yon
514a2(rgyud): gzhu lta bu// gsum pa'i dbang gi de nyid kyang // sih+la shes rab chos dbyings te// ga pur thabs kyi ye shes bzhi// rtsa ni 'og min gnas yin te// dga' ba mchog dga' byang chub
514a3(rgyud): phyogs// rang bzhin dga' ba chos sku ste// bral ba'i dga' ba gzugs sku gnyis// bcu drug stong pa bcu drug go// rgyud kyi tshul du sgyu ma tsam// gang zhig rang rig 'dod pas kyang //
514a4(rgyud): dang por ngo bor shes bya ste// de nas de nyid shes par bya// gal te de nyid mi shes par// zab mo'i lam nyid sgom byed na// 'bras bu med cing rlag par nges// lha yi de nyid ma
514a5(rgyud): shes na// dur khrod gnas pa'i srin po 'dra// de bzhin dur khrod srin mo 'dra// spyod pa'i de nyid ma shes na// grong khyer gnas pa'i smyon pa 'dra// khyi phag srin po rak+Sha 'dra// phyag
514a6(rgyud): mtshan de nyid ma shes na// brgya byin lag na mtshon thogs 'dra// phyag rgya'i de nyid ma shes na// rgyal po phang gi btsun mo 'dra// rlung gi de nyid ma shes na// brgya byin spyi bo'i dung
514a7(rgyud): pa 'dra// rtsa yi de nyid ma shes na// tsan dan shing gi sbrul sogs 'dra// lus kyi gnyer ma dag dang 'dra// lus kyi dri ma chu dang 'dra// thig le'i de nyid ma shes na// tsan dan shing
514b1(rgyud): gi 'dzer pa 'dra// 'khor lo 'di nyid ma shes na// brgya byin lag na 'khor lo 'dra// de bzhin sring pa'i 'khor lo 'dra// pad+ma'i de nyid ma shes na// 'dam bu tshal gyi pad+ma 'dra/
514b2(rgyud): stug po'i de nyid ma shes na// mchod rten gyi ni 'khor lo 'dra// kha sbyor de nyid ma shes na// thal mo g.yas g.yon sbyar ba 'dra// gnas kyi de nyid ma shes na// 'khor lo sgyur
514b3(rgyud): rgyal po brang 'dra// byang sems de nyid ma shes na// mi gtsang sgo yi lud pa 'dra// si h+la'i de nyid ma shes na// mtshon sogs las byung khrag dang 'dra// dga' ba'i de nyid ma shes na//
514b4(rgyud): smad 'tshong ma yi 'dod chags 'dra// spang bya'i de nyid ma shes na// grong khyer med pa'i rgyal po 'dra// gnyen po'i de nyid ma shes na// rgyal po med pa'i grong khyer 'dra// rang rig de nyid ma
514b5(rgyud): shes na// 'dus byas nam mkha' stong pa 'dra// gzhan yang de nyid bco brgyad ni// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// thams cad sgyu ma'i tshul dang ni// rmi lam glog dang sprin lta bu// de nyid
514b6(rgyud): shes na grol bar 'gyur// kye ho mgon po thugs rje che// rang rig ye shes 'tshol ba la// rang dang gzhan gyi sde pa la// 'di la khyad par med dam ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
514b7(rgyud): khyad par chen po de nyid de// gzhan ni khyad par dbang bzhi dang // de yi lam gyi de nyid brtags// chad pa bdag dang dbang phyug dang // phya dang byed pa po nyid las// rgyu sogs rgyud las khyad par
515a1(rgyud): 'phags// gang zag bdag dang bral ba'i phyir// nyan thos rang rgyal theg chen dang // rlung sogs chos kyi bdag gis bcings// dman pa rnams kyi snang bas
515a2(rgyud): khyab/ theg chen rang bzhin lha yis khyab// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor chen po sogs// de nyid kyi ni khyad par che// legs par bstan gyis legs par zung // de nas 'khor thams cad dga' zhing
515a3(rgyud): yi rangs par gyur to// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ye shes gsang ba'i khon nyid kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// rnal 'byor ma tsan+da mu le dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong shAkya ye
515a4(rgyud): shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+nyA na mA le tan+t+ra rAdza/ bod skad du/ dpal ye shes 'phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/
515a5(rgyud): dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// kye lags gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin// gsang ba bla na med pa yi// lta ba zhes pa gang zhig lags// spyod pa gang dang gang lags pa// gtso bos
515a6(rgyud): bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lta ba shes rab pha rol phyin// gdod nas spros bral lhun gyis grub// rang gis ye shes dbyings na gsal// ma rig
515a7(rgyud): mun pas bsgribs pa med// shes rab snying po rtser byung ba// lta ba kun gyi yang rtse yi// don dam rang rig ye shes la// blang ba med cing dor ba med// dman dang gya nom gnyis ka med// sgom
515b1(rgyud): pa po med bsgom bya med// dmigs med gnas su snying rje dang // dmigs med gnas su shes rab gnyis// blo dang lhan cig gcig gyur pa// nam mkha' nam mkha'i rang bzhin no// rang
515b2(rgyud): rig ye shes gang 'dod pas// mtshan ma'i rnam rtog sgom pa min// dman pa rnams la skur mi gdab// de nyid la yang sgo mi gdags// dang por bskal par bsgoms pa dang // rang rig
515b3(rgyud): skad cig thob pa nyid// brgya stong la sogs char mi phod// dpe dang bgrang bar mi nus te// dper na mtsho dang rlabs rjes bzhin// dngos po bsgom pa sgom pa min// dngos dang dngos
515b4(rgyud): med ro mnyam na// ma bsgoms na yang sgom pa nyid// sgom dang mi sgom gnyis ka med// 'od gsal de la sems zin na// gzung 'dzin dgra yi dpung rnams 'joms//
515b5(rgyud): phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams bcas pa'i// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro mchod pa'i gnas// rab kyis mnyam gzhag rjes thob spang // 'bring gis rjes thob stong par blta// tha mas
515b6(rgyud): rjes thob sgyu mar blta// seng ge lta bu'i lta spyod ni// bzhi pa yin par nga yis gsungs// de nas spyod pa'i rgyal po bshad// spyod pa rnam pa gsum yin te// kun tu bzang po 'bu
515b7(rgyud): su ku a ba d+hU tI gsum yin no// spyod pa'i dus dang gnas dang zas// gang zag dang ni dbye ba dang // ngo bo dang ni tshad dang yang // thabs dang dgongs pa dgongs pa dang / mkhas
516a1(rgyud): pas kun la sbyar bar bya// sangs rgyas rigs dang rdo rje'i rigs// rin chen rigs dang pad+ma'i rigs// las kyi rigs dang spyod pa lnga/
516a2(rgyud): kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yin// sdom pa gsum la gnas pa dang // dkon mchog gsum ni 'dzin pa dag/ sangs rgyas kyi ni mchog gi spyod// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya 'dzin/
516a3(rgyud): bla ma 'dzin pa rdo rje'i spyod// dam tshig yid 'ong dus bzhi ru// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rin chen spyod// theg pa gsum dang dam chos 'dzin// pad+ma gar gyi spyod pa yin// dam tshig
516a4(rgyud): thams cad ldan pa dang // ma grol la sogs dgrol ba yin// rta yi rgyal po'i spyod pa na// za ba nyal ba 'chag pa gsum// rnal 'byor chen pos gnas bya ste// g.yeng
516a5(rgyud): ba g.yeng ba spong ba ni// 'bu su ku yi spyod pa'o// rgyan 'chang ba dang bdud rtsi myang // phyag rgya bsten dang rnam pa gsum// a ba d+hU tI'i spyod pa ste// rgyan la drug ste/
516a6(rgyud): phyag rgya lnga// bdud rtsi bcu ste mi gtsang bas// mi gtsang 'khrud pa'i spyod pa'o// gnas ni kha na ma tho med// phyi nang g.yeng med gnas yin no// rtog pa 'joms pa slob pa'i
516a7(rgyud): dus// grub na rdzu 'phrul ston pa'i dus// thabs ni gzhan gyis mthong ba dang // sgro dang skur pa med pa'o// dgongs pa mnyen pa'i stobs yin te// rnyed dang bkur sti grags pa/
516b1(rgyud): dang / zug rngu'i kha zas ma yin te/ bla ma'i dus thabs legs bsten blang // kha zas rnam rtog chung ba yi// las dang po yis bya bar gsungs// dbye ba
516b2(rgyud): gsum dang bye brag ni// gong du gsungs pa kho na'o// ngo bo rtog med sems de nyid// gtsang sme 'gags dang sprul pa ston// 'di nyid grub pa'i tshad yin no// dgos
516b3(rgyud): pa la yang gnyis yod de// gtsang sme spangs pa'i dgos pa las// dgos pa dngos la rnam pa bzhi// rang sems brtan g.yo brtag pa dang // phyag rgya khyad par 'tshol ba
516b4(rgyud): dang / des 'dul gang zag gzhug pa dang // mi mos skur dag pa'o// gsang sngags rgyal po'i lta spyod kyis// 'khor gyi dpa' bo mkha' 'gro tshogs/
516b5(rgyud): dus dang brgyal dang 'gyel gyur pas// dbugs dbyung ba yi ting 'dzin gyis// thams cad dran pa slar rnyed nas// thams cad mgrin gcig 'di skad gsol//
516b6(rgyud): dngos po ro mnyam gyur pa yi// lta ba 'di yang ngo mtshar che// g.yeng bas g.yeng ba spong ba yi// spyod pa 'di yang ngo mtshar che// chos rnams spong bar ro mnyan/
516b7(rgyud): na lha dang mi lta ga la yod// gtsang sme bdud rtsi ro gcig la// spyod dang mi spyod ga la yod// dbang bskur ba dang rdo rje 'dzin// mnyam gzhag rjes thob ga la yod// thams cad
517a1(rgyud): #/ sems kyi ngo bo la// gzung dang 'dzin pa ga la yod// 'jigs byed chen pos bka' stsal pa// 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas// lhan cig skyes pa'i
517a2(rgyud): bsgribs g.yogs kyis// rin chen sems ni dri can byas// zla ba rab rib sel byed de// mig gis rang gi rdul ma mthong // sems kyi de nyid ma rtogs par// tha dad gzung 'dzin sna tshogs
517a3(rgyud): 'dzin de phyir lta ba'i rgyal po bstan// mi shes pa yi rab rib kyis// bdud rtsi'i de nyid ma shes te// gtsang dang mi gtsang la sogs brtags// de phyir spyod pa'i rgyal po bstan// gnas
517a4(rgyud): pa'i rkyen dang g.yeng ba'i rkyen// de phyir zung 'jug rgyal po bstan/ rkyen dang dbang po rab 'bring gis// mnyam gzhag rjes thob rgyal po bstan// mi shes pa yi rab rib kyis// 'khrul/
517a5(rgyud): pas gzung 'dzin gnyis su brtags// de phyir sems kyi rgyal po bstan// lta spyod 'di la nan tan gyis// de nas thams cad dga' zhing mgu nas yi rangs te/ phyi nang gi mchod
517a6(rgyud): pas mchod nas mi snang bar gyur to// dpal ye shes 'phreng ba rgyud kyi rgyal po lta spyod zung du 'jug pa rdzogs so// / rnal 'byor ma tsan+da ma le dang /
517a7(rgyud): dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// /
